nbl: eminyakeni ematjhumi amabili kusukela umadiba atjhatjhululwa, inarha yekhethu itjhuguluke khulu.

nbl: umongameli umandela wabumba inarha le ngerhuluphelo lesewula afrika engabandlululi ngobulili nangobuhlanga kodwana kube yinarha ephumelelako yentando yenengi.
ven: mahoḽa, ro tshenzhela u tsa ha ikonomi lwa u tou thoma kha miṅwaha ya 17. tshiwo tsho lozwisa ikonomi yashu mishumo ya vho 900 000. vhunzhi ha vhe vha fhelelwa nga mishumo vho vha vhe vhafaramiṱa i shayaho.

nbl: njengalokha sigidinga ukutjhatjhululwa kukamadiba namhlanjesi, asizibophelele kabutjha ukwakhela amasewula afrika ikusasa elihle, abanzima nabamhlophe.

nbl: irhuluphelo yomphakathi wentando yenengi nokhululekileko, lapha boke abantu bahlala ngokuthula banamathuba alinganako.
ven: rothoma u lwa na u tsa ha ikonomi kha kushumisele kwa masheleni nga muvhuso, nga maanḓa kha themamveledziso.

nbl: malunga ahloniphekileko,sibize ukuhlala ngokuhlanganyela entambama ngombana sifuna bonyana inengi labantu enarheni yekhethu, abasebenzi nabentwana besikolo babeyingcenye yomnyanya lo.
ven: u itela u vha na vhuṱanzi ha tsireledzo yo ḓitikaho kha vhashai, ro fhirisela phanḓa u gonyiswa ha ndambedzo ya tshitshavha, na u engedza ndambedza ya u unḓa ṅwana kha vhana vha miṅwaha ya nṱha ha 14. kha miṅwaha miraru i ḓaho, hu ḓo ḓadziswa vhana vha miḽiyoni mbili u bva miṱani i shayaho na miḓini, miṅwaha ya 15 u ya kha 18, vha ḓo vhuelwa u bva kha ndambedzo ya u unḓa ṅwana.

nbl: siyawathabela amajadu atjengiswe lilutjha ngomnyanya lo.
ven: tshiimiswa tsha mveledziso ya indasiṱeri tsho vhetshela thungo r6biḽiyoni u thusa dzikhamphani dzi khou lemelwaho.

nbl: abentwana abamakhulu amabili namatjhumi asithandathu nesithandathu abasuka kizozoke iimfunda bazibandakanye kukulumopikiswano eyandulela ukwethulwa kwekulumo yesitjhaba ngendima yelutjha epini yokulwa nomtlhago.
ven: muvhuso u khou thoma “zwikimu zwa vhugudisi” u itela u fha vhashumi u nanga tshifhinga tsha vhugudisi nṱhani ha u fhelelwa nga mushumo.

nbl: sithokozisa umfundi obabethe ehloko, ucharlotte le fleur wesikolo sesekhondari se-worcester, naboboke abangenele iphaliswaneli ngokusebenza kabudisi.
ven: u lwisa hohu ho ṱuṱuwedzwa nga mbekanyamushumo ya mishumo ya muvhuso.

nbl: ukufadalala komnotho wethu kwenza bonyana kulahleke imisebenzi engaba ma-900 000. inengi lalabo abalahlekelwa misebenzi babantu abondlako ngekhaya.
ven: lushaka lu ḓo zwi humbula uri mulaedza wa lushaka wa 2009, ndo ḓivhadza uri mbekanyamushumo ya mishumo yo engedzeaho ya muvhuso i ḓo sika zwikhala zwa mishumo zwa 500 000 nga nyendavhusiku 2009. hezwi ndi zwikhala zwa mishumo zwo sikelwaho u ṋetshedza vhathu vha sa shumi muholo, tshenzhemo ya u shuma na zwikhala zwa vhugudisi.

nbl: kumhlolanja wonyaka ophelileko, abajameli bakarhulumende, amabubulo, abasebenzi nomphakathi bavumelana ngamagadango wokwehlisa izinga lobudisi.
ven: miraḓo i ṱhompheaho, maafurika tshipembe vhashu,ri a takala u ḓivhadza uri mafheloni a nyendavhusiku, ro vha ro no sika zwikhala zwa mishumo ya muvhuso zwi fhiraho 480 000, ine ya vha 97% ya phimo ye ra ta.

nbl: sithome ukusebenzisa indlela enamandla elwa nokwehla komnotho ekusetjenzisweni kweemali ngurhulumende, khulukhulu kumthangalasisekelo.
ven: ro topola vhupo vhune ha ṱoḓa u khwiniswa, hune ra ḓo lwisa u isa phanḓa, zwo katela u vha na vhuṱanzi ha u shuma tshoṱhe kha thandela.

nbl: ukwenzela abatlhagako ubulula, singezelele isikhathi sokukhulisa imali yesibonelelo sabentwana, begodu sadlulisela isibonelelwesi ebantwaneni abaneminyaka engehla kweli-14.
ven: ri a zwi ḓivha uri haya maga na maṅwe a nga si fhungudze masiandoitwa a u tsa ha ikonomi.

nbl: eminyakeni emithathu ezako, abentwana abaziingidi ezimbili abavela emindenini etlhagako, beminyaka eli-15 ukuya kweli-18, bazakuzuza emalini yesibonelelo sabentwana.
ven: ri a livhuwa muya wa muṱa, tshitshavha na mishumo ya u ḓiṋekedza i ṱuṱuwedzaho vhathu vhanzhi u thusa avho vho kwameaho nga tshiwo, nga hezwi zwifhinga zwi konḓaho.

nbl: ihlangano ethuthukisa amabubulo ibekele ngahlanye iingidigidi ezi-r6 ukusiza iinkampani ezisebudisini.
ven: miraḓo i ṱhompheaho,zwisumbedzisi zwa ikonomi zwo sumbedzisa uri zwa zwino ri khwine kha tshiimo tshe ravha ri khatsho.

nbl: urhulumende wethula ?
ven: mushuma wa ikonomi u khou gonya afurika tshipembe, nahone ri khou lavhelela nyaluwo u ya phanḓa.

nbl: imizamo le ithuthukiswa lihlelo lethu lezemisebenzi yombuso.
ven: mbalo mbalo dza zwa mishumo dzo bviswaho nga ḽavhuvhili, dzi sumba uri ikonomi i khou sika mishumo madzuloni a u i fhelisa.

nbl: isitjhaba sizakukhumbula bonyana ekulumeni yesitjhaba yonyaka we-2009, ngamemezela bonyana ihlelo elandisiweko lemisebenzi yesitjhaba lizakuveza amathuba wemisebenzi ema-500 000 kunobayeni enyakeni we-2009.
ven: fhedzi ha, hu kha ḓivha nga matsheloni, u vha na vhuṱanzi ha maga a u vha khwine.

nbl: silemuke imikhakha etlhoga ukuthuthukiswa, esizasebenza ngayo ngokukhamba kwesikhathi, ukufaka hlangana amathuba angezelelelweko wamaphrojekhthi wemisebenzi.
ven: mbekanyamushumo dzashu dza pfunzo na zwikili dzi ḓo alusa zwibveledzwa na vhuṱaṱisani.

nbl: siyazi kobana imizamo le namanye amagadango ngeze yarhobhisa ngokuzeleko umthintela wokwehla komnotho.
ven: mbekanyamaitele ya phoḽisi ya indasiṱeri na u lumbama hashu huswa kha mishumo ya vhuponi, zwi ḓo fhaṱa indasiṱeri dzo khwaṱhaho dzine dza ḓo ḓisa mishumo.

nbl: sithokoza ummoya wobuntu wemindeni, imisebenzi yomphakathi neyokuzinikela ekhuthaza inengi labantu ukusiza labo abathintwa budisobu bomnotho, eenkhathini ezibudisi.
ven: mbekanyamushumo dza u bveledzisa vhuponi ha mahayani dzi ḓo khwinisa zwibveledzwa zwa mahayani, na matshilo a vhadzulapo vha vhuponi ha mahayani.

nbl: malunga ahloniphekileko,iinkomba zezomnotho zitjengisa bonyana sekuba ngcono.
ven: u khwaṱhisa maano ashu a u vha khwine na u aluwa ikonomi, ndi mbekanyamushumo yashu ya u bindudza masheleni.

nbl: imisebenzi yezomnotho iyanda esewula afrika begodu silindele ukukhula komnotho okuragela phambili.
ven: miṅwaha miraru i ḓaho, muvhuso u ḓo shumisa r846 wa biḽiyoni kha themamveledziso dza tshitshavha.

nbl: iimbalobalo zemisebenzi ezikhutjhwe ngelesibili, zitjengisa bonyana njenganje umnotho uveza amathuba wemisebenzi kunokuyiphelisa.
ven: ri ḓo khwaṱhisedza uri tshumelo ya zwiporo zwashu ndi ine ya thembea, zwo tea nahone zwo ṱanganaho na vhuima zwikepe.

nbl: kusesemsinya, nokho, ukobana singabanesiqiniseko ngebelo letuthuko.
ven: u khwathisa tshumelo ya muḓagasi i thembeaho, ro thoma komithi yo ṱanganelanaho ya dziminisiṱa kha fulufulu, u bveledza puḽane yo ṱanganaho ya miṅwaha ya 20. vhukati ha zwiṅwe zwinzhi, hezwi zwi ḓo lavhelesa kha u shela mulenzhe ha vhabveledzi vha fulufulu vho ḓiimisaho, na u tsireledza vhashai kha mitengo i khou gonyaho ya muḓagasi.

nbl: urhulumende ngeze awalisa amagadango wokusekela.
ven: ri ḓo thoma sisteme ya muṋetshedzi o ḓiimisaho, yo bviswaho kha vhafari vha eskom.

nbl: gadesi kusikhathi sokwenza isisekelo sokukhula komnotho begodu ukukhula okuveza imisebenzi.
ven: eskom i ḓo bvela phanḓa na u fhaṱa nyengedzedzo ya u ḓadzisa u bveledza muḓagasi khathihi na u khwinisa u londola zwiṱitshi zwayo zwa muḓagasi.

nbl: ihlelo lethu lomthangalasisekelo wesikhathi eside lizakusiza umnotho wethu bonyana uhlume ngebelo.
ven: u khwathisa u alusa zwa ikonomi yo katelaho, u thusa nyaluwo na u bveledziso, ro thoma khoro ya vhueletshedzi ha u maanḓafhadza ikonomi ya vharema yo ṱanḓavhuwaho, ine mudzalatshidulo ha vha muphuresidennde.

nbl: ihlelo lethu lokuthuthukisa iindawo zemakhaya, lizakuthuthukisa umkhiqizo wemakhaya namaphilo wabantu.
ven: tshivhalo tsha vhathu vhaswa vha sa shumi tshi khou aluwesa nga u ṱavhanya u fhirisa mbalotshikati.

nbl: isisekelo samano wethu wokuvuselela umnotho, kulihlelo lethu lokutjala iimali.
ven: madzinginywa a ḓo adzwa u itela u fhungudza mutengo wa u thola vhashumi vhaswa, u ṱuṱuwedza dzifeme u dzhia vhashumi vha si na tshenzhemo.

nbl: mayelana neeenthuthi, sizakutjheja begodu sinabise ithungelelwano lethu leendlela.
ven: miraḓo i ṱhompheaho,musi vhulanguli uvhu vhu tshi dzhena ofisini mahoḽa, ro ḓi vhudza u shumesa u itela u fhaṱa muvhuso u bvelelaho.

nbl: sizakuhloma umsebenzisi wegezi ozijameleko, onganatjhebiswano ne-eskom holdings.
ven: muvhuso u fanela u shuma nga u ṱavhanya, nga maanḓa nahone nga vhuronwane.

nbl: i-eskom izakuragela phambili nokwakha amandla angezelelweko nokuthuthukisa itjhejo leentetjhi zegezi.
ven: ri khou fhaṱa muvhuso wo simaho kha kushumele, u khwinisa kupuḽanele khathihi na vhusedzi na tsedzuluso ya kushumele.

nbl: njengendlela yokuqinisekisa ukuthuthukiswa kokukhula komnotho ohlanganyelweko, sihlome umkhandlu wokweluleka ngokuthuthukiswa komnotho onabileko wabantu abanzima.
ven: ri khou ṱoḓa u dovha ra ṱanganya zwikalo zwa ndinganyiso ya mbeu kha mbekanyamushumo ya kushumele ya muvhuso.

nbl: umnqopho omkhulu norhabako mayelana nokutjhugululwa kwemithethomgomo kufanele kube kungenelela okunqophe ukuvezela ilutjha amathuba wemisebenzi.
ven: kushumele hoku ku ḓo ita uri vhafumakadzi, vhana na vhathu vha vhaholefhali vha kone u swikela zwikhala zwa mveledziso.

nbl: amazinga welutjha elingasebenziko aphezulu kunokulindelekileko.
ven: ri a takala u ḓivhadza nḓila ntswa ya u ita zwithu muvhusoni.

nbl: lokhu kufaka hlangana amaphrojekthi womthangalasisekelo weendawo zemakhaya, iinkolo, ifundo ephakemeko nehlelo lokusiza ngokufundisa, amakhaya wetjhejo, ukutjhejwa kweenkolo namahlelo wokuthuthukisa abentwana abasakhulako.
ven: mishumo ya mihasho i ḓo kalwa nga mvelele, dzo bveledziswa nga sisteme ya vhusedzi na tsedzuluso ya kushumele.

nbl: silayele i-ejensi le bonyana isebenze ngokurhabileko ukuhloma izakhiwo zayo enarheni mazombe, ukwenzelela bonyana ikghone ukusisiza ukulinganisa amahlelo karhulumende anqotjhiswe ekuthuthukiseni ilutjha.
ven: dziminisiṱa dzi re na vhuḓifhinduleli kha iyo mvelele, vha ḓo saina thendelano yo ṱanḓavhudzwaho na muphuresidennde.

nbl: sathi uzakuba mbuso oqalelela iimfuneko neenrhuluphelo zabantu begodu osebenza ngcono norhabako.
ven: sa izwi vha tshi zwi ḓivha, ro ḓi vhofha nga zwa ndeme zwiṱanu:pfunzo, mutakalo, mveledziso ya vhuponi ha mahayani na tshanduko ya mavu, u sika mishumo i ḓivhaleaho na u lwa na vhugevhenga.

nbl: unyaka lo, wee-2010, uzakuba ngunyaka wokwenza.
ven: u ḓadzisa izwo, ri ḓo shuma u khwinisa nḓisedzo ya khwine kha mivhuso yapo, u bveledzisa themamveledziso na vhudzulo ha vhathu.

nbl: itshwayo elibonakala khulu ngombuso lo kukobana wazi lapha abantu bahlala khona, uzwisisa iimfuneko zabo begodu uphendula msinya.
ven: ri ḓo dzhenelela kha zwimvumvusi zwa tshivhalo uri ri kone u swikela hedzi mvelele.

nbl: urhulumende kufanele asebenze msinya, khulu begodu kuhle.
ven: ro vhea pfunzo na mveledziso ya zwikili vhukati kha phoḽisi dza muvhuso.

nbl: sizakulindela isigungu nemisebenzi yomphakathi ukukhambisana nenembombono le.
ven: kha mbekanyamushumo yashu ya 2010, ri ṱoḓa u khwinisa vhukoni ha vhana vhashu ha u vhala, u ṅwala na u vhalela mbalo kha miṅwaha ya mutheo.

nbl: sakha inarha enzinze ekusebenzeni ngokuthuthukisa ukuhlela kunye nokutjhejisisa ukusebenza nokuhlolisisa.
ven: ra sa tou ita hezwi, ri nga si khwinise tshiimo tsha nyimele ya pfunzo.

nbl: ufanele sihlanganise neenlinganiso zobulili ehlelweni likarhulumende lokusebenza.
ven: phimo dzashu dza pfunzo dzo leluwa, fhedzi ndi dza vhuṱhogwa.

nbl: isenzwesi sizakuqinisekisa bonyana abomma, abentwana nabantu abakhubazekileko bathole amathuba wetuthuko.
ven: ri ṱoḓa vhana na vhadededzi vha tshi vha vha tshikoloni, kilasini, nga tshifhinga, vha tshi khou guda na u funza lwa iri dza sumbe kha ḓuvha.

nbl: siyathaba ukumemezela indlela etjha karhulumende yokwenza izintoumsebenzi weminyango uzakulinganiswa ngemiphumela, ezabe itlanywe ngehlelo lethu lokuhlolisisa nokutjhejisisa.
ven: ri ḓo thusa vhadededzi nga u vha fha puḽane dza zwidodombedzwa zwa ngudo ḓuvha na ḓuvha.

nbl: abongqongqotjhe abaqalene nomphumela othile, bazakutlikitla isivumelwano sokwenza imisebenzi nomongamel.
ven: kha matshudeni, ri ḓo ṋetshedza bugu dza u shumela khadzo dzo leluwaho u shumisa nga nyambo dzoṱhe dza 11. u bva ṋanwaha u ya ho ya, vhagudiswa vhoṱhe vha gireidi ya 3, 6 na 9 vha ḓo ṅwala mulingo wa u vhala na u ṅwala na ḓivhambalo dzo ṱolwaho thungo.

nbl: njengalokha nazi, sizibophelele kumaqalontangi amahlanu:ifundo, zamaphilo, ukuthuthukiswa kweendawo zemakhaya nokutjhugululwa kwenarha, ukudala imisebenzi enetlha, nokulwa nobulelesi.
ven: ri khou pika u engedza tshivhalo tsha maphasele kha hei milingo u bva kha mbalotshikati ya zwino ya vhukati ha 35 na 40% u ya kha 60% nga 2014. mvelele dzi ḓo rumelwa kha vhabebi u itela u londa mashumele.

nbl: ngaphezu kwalokho, sizokusebenzela ukuthuthukisa ukusebenza ngefanelo kwaborhulemende bemakhaya, ukuthuthukiswa komthangalasisekelo nokuhlaliswa kuhle kwabantu.
ven: u ḓadzisa, tshiṅwe na tshiṅwe tsha zwikolo zwa 27 000 tshi ḓo ṱolwa nga vhaofisiri u bva kha muhasho wa pfunzo ya mutheo.

nbl: sizakwenza imisebenzi ethile eqakathekileko kobana sifikelele kumiphumela le.
ven: hezwi zwi ḓo rekhodiwa kha muvhigo wo ṱoliwaho wo tuo ṅwaliwaho.

nbl: sibeke ifundo nokuthuthukiswa kwamakghonofundwa ekabeni yemithethomgomo karhulumende lo.
ven: ro pika u engedza mbalo ya matshudeni a murole wa fumi vhane vha ḓo wana thendelo ya yunivesithi u ya kha 175 000 nga ṅwaha wa 2014. ri ṱuṱuwedza vhabebi uri vha shume na riṋe u ita uri hezwi zwi bvelele.

nbl: ehlelweni lethu lonyaka we-2010, sifuna ukuthuthukisa ikghono lokufunda ebantwaneni bethu, ukuthi bakghone ukutlola nokubala eminyakeni yesigabasisekelo.
ven: ri ṱanganedza tshiṱaṱamennde tsha ṅwedzi wo fhiraho nga madzangano a vhadededzi mararu, naptosa, sadtu na saou, vha tshi khou khwaṱhisedza u ḓivhofha kha fulo ḽa ndeme ḽa u guda na u funza u bva mathomoni a 2010. miraḓo i ṱhompheaho,ri khou ṱoda u bindudza kha vhaswa vhashu u khwaṱhisa uri ri na vhashumi vha re na zwikili na vhukoni u itela u tikedza nyaluwo na u sika mishumo.

nbl: sifuna abafundi nabotitjhere babe sesikolweni, ngetlasini, ngesikhathi, bafunde begodu kufundiswe ama-iri alikhomba ngelanga.
ven: zwenezwo ri puḽana u engedza vhugudisi ha miṅwaha ya 16-25 kha zwiimiswa zwa pfunzo ya phanḓa na zwiimiswa zwa vhugudisi.

nbl: sizakusiza abotitjhere ngokubanikela amahlelo weemfundo wamalanga woke anemininingwana epheleleko.
ven: hezwi zwi ḓo ita uri ri kone u ṋetshedza tshikhala tsha vhuvhili tsha pfunzo kha avho vha so ngo swikelaho u ṱanganedziwa yunivesithi.

nbl: sizakunikela abafundi iincwadi zokusebenzela ezisetjenziswa lula ezitlolwe ngawo woke amalimi ali-11.
ven: ri khou shuma na zwiimiswa zwa pfunzo ya nṱha u khwaṱhisedza uri matshudeni vho teaho vha wane thuso ya masheleni, nga tshikimu tsha thuso ya masheleni kha matshudeni tsha lushaka.

nbl: ukuthoma unyaka lo kuya phambili, boke abafundi bebanga lesi-3, 6 nele-9 bazakutlola ukuhlola kokufunda neembalo ezilinganiswe ngokuzijameleko.
ven: ro dovha ra ḓiitela zwipikwa zwa nṱha zwa u bveledzisa zwilkili, u bveledza iṅwe mbalo ya dziinzhinia na vhorathekhiniki, na u engedzadza vhadededzi vha re na ndalukanyo vha mbalo na saintsi.

nbl: sinqophe ukungezelela izinga leenhlahlubo lezi ukusukela ezingeni lagadesi elihlangana namaphesente ama-35 kuya kama-40 ukufikela okungasenani kumaphesente ama-60 ngonyaka wee-2014.
ven: ri tea u dovha ra engedza tshivhalo tsha vhaswa vho dzhenaho kha zwa ngudamishumo kha sekithara dza phuraivethe na dza tshitshavha.

nbl: ngaphezu kwalokho, isikolo ngasinye eenkolweni zethu ezima-27 000 sizakuhlolwa ziimphathimandla ezibuya kumnyango wezefundo esisekelo.
ven: iṅwe mvelele ya ndeme ndi u khwaṱhisedza uri maafurika tshipembe vhoṱhe vha na mutakalo na vhutshilo vhulapfu.

nbl: lokhu kuzakurekhodwa eembikweni otloliweko begodu ohlolekako.
ven: ri ḓo bvela phanḓa na u khwinisa sisteme yashu ya zwa mutakalo.

nbl: sihlose ukungezelela isibalo sabafundi bebanga letjhumi nambili abaneemfanelo zokwamukelwa eyunivesithi bafike eenkulungwaneni ezili-175 000 qobe ngonyaka bekube ngunyaka we-2014.
ven: hezwi zwi katela u fhaṱa na u khwinisa zwibadela na dzikiḽiniki, na u dovha u khwinisa nyimele ya mashumele a vhashumi vha zwa mutakalo.

nbl: sikhuthaza ababelethi ukusebenzisana nathi ukwenza lokhu kubey ipumelelo.
ven: ri tshi khou shumisana na vha bannga ya mveledziso ya tshipembe ha afurika u itela u khwinisa kushumele kwa zwibadela zwa muvhuso na ofisi dza dzingu.

nbl: samukela isitatimende senyanga ephelileko esikhutjhwe ziihlangano zabotijhere zontathu, i-naptosa, i-sadtu ne-saou, baqinisekisa ukuzibophelela kujima lekhwalithi yokufunda nokufundisa ekuthomeni konyaka we-2010.
ven: ri khou dovha ra farisana na vha dbsa na tshumisano ya mveledziso ya zwa indasiṱeri, kha mbekanyamushumo ya u shumisana ha phuraivethe na tshitshavha, hu u itela u khwinisa zwibadela na u ṋetshedza masheleni kha thandela.

nbl: ngalokho-ke sihlela ukungezelela ibandulo labaneminyaka ehlangana ne-16 ukuya kuma-25 eenkhungweni zefundo nebandulo.
ven: miraḓo i ṱhompheaho,ri tea u livhana na ngoho ya uri miṅwaha ya vhutshilo u bva mabeboni yo tsa u bva kha 60 nga 1994 u ya kha 50 ṋamusi.

nbl: lokhu kuzasisiza ukubanikela ithuba lesibili lefundo, labo abanganamfanelo zokufunda eyunivesithi.
ven: zwenezwo ri khou lingedza u dzhenelela u fhungudza tshivhalo tsha vhana vhane vha lovha vha tshi khaḓibva u begwa, u fhungudza u kavhiwa huswa ha hiv na dzilafho ḽa vhuḓi na u lwa nga maanḓa na lufhia.

nbl: sisebenzisana namaziko wefundo ephakemeko ukuqinisekisa bonyana abafundi abafaneleko bakghone ukuthola isizo leemali elivela kusikhwama sesizo leemali labafundi benarha.
ven: ri ḓo fhungudza mpfu dza vhana nga mbekanyamushumo nnzhi dza u haela.

nbl: sibeke neminqopho ephezulu yokuthuthukiswa kwamakghonofundwa, ukuthola abosonjiniyera nabasebenzi besiterhiniki nokungezelela isibalo sabotijhere abaneziqu zeembalo nesayensi.
ven: ri ḓo vusuludza mbekanyamushumo dza mutakalo zwikoloni.

nbl: sifanele singezelele isibalo selutjha elizakuthola umsebenzi wokufunda basebenza emikhakheni yombuso nemabubulweni wangeqadi.
ven: ri ḓo ita zwoṱhe zwe ra vhofha nga ḓuvha ḽa aids ḽa ḽifhasi zwi tshi tshimbilelana na maga maswa a u thivhela na u lafha hiv.

nbl: omunye umphumela oqakathekileko kuqinisekisa ipilo ehle kiwowoke amasewula afrika.
ven: mushumo vhukuma u nḓilani u khwaṱhisedza uri hoyu mushumo u tshimbile nga tshifhinga.

nbl: sizakuragela phambili nokuthuthukisa ihlelo lethu lezamaphilo.
ven: ri ḓo bvela phanḓa na ndugiselo dza u bveledza sisteme ya ndindakhombo ya zwa mutakalo ya lushaka.

nbl: lokhu kufaka hlangana ukwakha nokulungisisa iimbhedlela nemitholapilo, begodu nokuthuthukisa ubujamo bomsebenzi kubasebenzi bezamaphilo.
ven: maafurika tshipembe vha hashu,ri khou shuma vhukuma u khwaṱhisedza uri muṅwe na muṅwe afurika tshipembe a pfe o vhulungea nahone o tsiredzea.

nbl: sihlanganyele nebhanka yetuthuko ye-afrika engesewula ukuthuthukisa ukusebenza ngokuzeleko kweembhedlela zombuso nama-ofisi weeyingi.
ven: ri ḓo dovha ra takula mushumo washu u itela u fhungudza vhugevhenga vhu shushaho ha dzikhakhathi, na u khwaṱhisedza uri maitele a zwa vhulamukanyi a khou shuma lu fushaho.

nbl: begodu sisebenzisana nebhanka yetuthuko ye-afrika engesewula nehlangano ethuthukisa amabubulo ngetjhebiswano ehlelweni lamabubulo wangeqadi nombuso ukuthuthukisa iimbhedlela nokusekela amaphrojekhthi ngeemali.
ven: ri khou ita puḽane dza u engedza nomboro ya mapholisa a vhanna na vhafumakadzi nga 10% kha miṅwaha miraru i ḓaho.

nbl: malunga ahloniphekileko,kufanele siqalane neqiniso lokobana isikhathi sokuphila kusukela ekubelethweni, sehlile ukusuka eminyakeni ema-60 ngonyaka we-1994 ukuya ngaphasi kweminyaka ema-50 namhlanjesi.
ven: ro dzhiela nṱha zwa u lwa na u hombokiwa, u ṱangulwa mabinduni na miḓini, khathihi na vhugevhenga vhu itwaho muthu a hanefho sa u vhulaha, u binya na u rwa, sa zwiṅwe zwa ndeme khulwane.

nbl: sizakwehlisa nokuhlongakala kwamasana ngehlelo elidephileko lemijovo.
ven: kha ri dzule ro lugela u ṋetshedza mapholisa vhuṱanzi nga ha zwiito zwa vhugevhenga.

nbl: sizakuvuselela amahlelo wezamaphilo eenkolweni.
ven: nga u shuma roṱhe ri ḓo kunda vhutshinyi.

nbl: sizaphetha zoke iinthembiso ngelanga lephasi lentumbantonga mayelana neendlela ezitjha zokuvikela ingogwana yentumbantonga namagadango wokwelapha.
ven: vhafunashango ḽashu na vhaeni vhaḓivhalea,mivhuso yapo i fanela u shuma.

nbl: sewuthomile umsebenzi ongeneleleko ukuqinisekisa kobana lokhu kwenziwe ngesikhathi.
ven: mimasipala i tea u khwinisa nḓisedzo ya dzinnḓu, maḓi, tshampungane, muḓagasi, vhulangi ha malatwa na dzibada.

nbl: sizakuragela phambili namalungiselelo wokuhlonywa kwehlelo letjhorensi yezamaphilo yenarha.
ven: ro fara muṱangano na dzimeyara na vhalangi vha mimasipala mahoḽa.

nbl: zakhamuzi zesewula afrika,sisebenza ngamandla ukuqinisekisa ukobana woke umuntu esewula afrika uzizwa aphephile begodu uphephile.
ven: ro dovha ra dalela zwitshavha na mimasipala yo fhambanaho, ho katelwa na balfour ngei mpumalanga na thembisa kha ḽa gauteng.

nbl: sizakuragela phambili nomsebenzi wethu ukwehlisa ukurhagala kobulelesi obunenturhu, siqinisekise kobana ihlelo lezobulungiswa lisebenza ngefanelo.
ven: nga murahu ha u dalela balfour, ro rumela miraḓo ya ṱahe ya dziminisiṱa u dalela vhupo uvho u amba nga ha mbilahelo dzo bviselwaho khagala vhadzulapo.

nbl: sihloma amano wokungezelela isibalo samapholisa ngamaphesente ali-10 eminyakeni emithathu ezako.
ven: vhunzhi ha mbilaelo dzo no tandululwa.

nbl: sitshwaye ipi eqalene nokuthathelwa iinkoloyi, ukungenelwa emakhaya nemabubulweni,nobulelesi bokuthintana njengokubulala, ukukata nokulimaza, njengamaqalontangi.
ven: ndo laela dziminisiṱa uri vha sedze zwo salaho.

nbl: soke sinendima ekufanele siyidlale.
ven: ri a dovholosa hafhu uri a hu na zwililo zwine zwa tendela khakhathi na u tshinyadzwa ha zwifhaṱo.

nbl: asizibandakanye eenhlanganweni zomphakathi zokuphepha.
ven: nga nyendavhusiku, 2009, khabinethe yo tendela maano a vhuṱali a u rembulusa zwithu kha mivhuso yapo.

nbl: asilise ukuthenga ipahla eyetjiweko.
ven: hezwi zwi ḓo khwaṱhisedza uri mivhuso yapo i na vhulangi ho teaho, vhulanguli na zwikili zwa thekhiniki zwo teaho.

nbl: bakwethu neemvakatjhi ezihloniphekileko,kufanele urhulumende wemakhaya asebenze.
ven: tshihulwane tsha izwi hu ḓo vha u kona u katela vhathu vha ne miholo yavho ya vha nṱha kha u wana ndambedzo ya muvhuso, fhedzi havho vhane miholo yavho ya vha miṱuku nga maanḓa uri vha swikele tshikolodo tsho ḓoweleaho tsha bannga.

nbl: kufanele abomasipala bathuthukise ukunikelwa kwezindlu, amanzi, ukukhanjiswa kwendle, igezi, ukulawulwa kweenzibi neendlela.
ven: ri ḓo ta tshikwama tsha thendelo tsha r1 biḽiyoni u ṱuṱuwedza bannga dza phuraivethe na sekhithara dza dzinnḓu, u bveledza zwirengiswa zwiswa u itela u swikela thoḓea ya dzinnḓu.

nbl: ngonyaka ophelileko saba nomhlangano nabosodorobha nabaphathi babomasipala.
ven: vhafunashango ḽashu,mahoḽa ro ri, vhathu vha vhuponi ha mahayani na vhone vha na pfanelo ya u vha na muḓagasi, maḓi, mabunga a maḓi na dzibada.

nbl: lokhu kwasinikela ilwazi elidephileko ngeenkinga zikarhulumende wemakhaya.
ven: ra ri vha fanela u vha na dzisenthara dza mitambo na dza mavhengele dza khwine u nga havho vha dziḓoroboni.

nbl: savakatjhela imiphakathi ehlukahlukeneko nabomasipala, ukufaka hlangana nebalfour empumalanga netembisa egauteng.
ven: kha heḽi fhungo, ro thoma sa u tou edzisa mbekanyamushumo yo angaredzaho ya mveledziso ya mahayani ngei giyani, kha ḽa limpopo, nga ṱhangule mahoḽa.

nbl: iinkinga ezimbalwa kilezo ezavezwako sele zitjhejiwe.
ven: u kona u swikela zwiimiswa zwa mutakalo na zwa pfunzo ho khwinifhadziwa.

nbl: ngiyalele abongqongqotjhe kobana baqalane nezisasaleleko.
ven: ri khou thoma mbekanyamushumo dzi fanaho na dzenedzi kha vhuṅwe fhethuvhupo ha sumbe kha shango ḽothe, zwi vhuedzaho wadi dza 21. nga 2014, ri khou pika u vha na fhethuvhupo vhuṅwe kha wadi dza 160. ri khou ṱoḓa miṱa ya 60% kha fhethuvhupo hovhu i tshi swikela thoḓea dza zwiḽiwa kha zwibveledzwa zwa vhone vhaṋe nga 2014. nga zwiṱuku nga zwiṱuku zwi ḓo vhuya zwa luga, sa zwine ḽiambele ḽa bula vhafunashango ḽashu, panḓa i thoma nga ṱhoṱha.

nbl: siyabuyelela ukobana akunamiraro enikela ilungelo lokwenza inturhu nokoniwa kwepahla.
ven: ri dovha ra tea u khwinisa zwa u ṱanganyisa tshanduko ya mavu na mbekanyamushumo dza thikhedzo ya zwa vhulimi.

nbl: siyalele abasebenza ngomthetho ukuthatha amagadango aqinileko lokha nakwephulwa umthetho ebalfour nakezinye iindawo.
ven: u bvelela hashu kha hezwi zwi ḓo elwa nga u engedzea ha vhalimi vhaṱuku vhane vha vha vha tshipiḓa tsha nyaluwo ya ikonomi.

nbl: kunobayeni enyakeni wee-2009, isigungu saphasisa amano wesikhathi esibekiweko mayelana norhulumende wemakhaya.
ven: mulangadzulo a ṱhompheaho na mudzulatshidulo wa ncop,shango ḽashu a ḽo ngo pfuma kha maḓi.

nbl: lokhu kuzaqinisekisa bonyana urhulumende wemakhaya unamakghonofundwa afaneleko wokuphatha, wekambiso newesiterhiniki.
ven: fhedzi ha, ri tambisa maḓi manzhi nga dziphaiphi dzi bvuḓaho na themamveledziso dzi so ngo fhaṱiwaho zwone.

nbl: enyakeni lo wokwenza, asisebenzeni soke ukwenza urhulumende wemakhaya abemthwalo wethu soke.
ven: ri ḓo vha ri tshi khou vhea maga a u fhungudza u tambisea ha maḓi nga hafu nga 2014. miraḓo i ṱhompheaho,sa tshipiḓa tsha nungo dzashu u ṱuṱuwedza nyaluwa ya ikonomi nga hu hulu, ri khou shuma u fhungudza u ḓurelwa kha zwa vhudavhidzani.

nbl: umzamo omkhulu kuzaba kutjheja abantu labo imirholo yabo ephezulu khulu kobana bangathola isizo leemali lakarhulumende, kanti ngakelinye ihlangothi umrholwabo mncani kobana bangathola isizo leemali lebhanka.
ven: tshitshavha tsha afurika tshipembe tshi nga lavhelela u fhungudzwa hafhu ha mitengo ya tsumbatshiga, ṱhingothendeleki, ṱhingo dza nḓuni na dza tshitshavha.

nbl: sizakuhloma isikhwama sesiqinisekiso se-r1 bhiliyoni ukusiza ukubulunga imali kwangeqadi nebubulo lezindlu , ukuthuthukisa iindlela ezitjha zokuhlangabezana neemfuneko zezindlu.
ven: ri ḓo shuma u engedza luvhilo lwa tsumbatshiga,na u khwaṱhisedza vhuimo ha nṱha ha tshumelo ya inthanethe, zwi tshi tshimbilelana na maitele a ḽifhasi ḽothe.

nbl: bakwethu,enyakeni ophelileko sathi, abantu bemakhaya nabo banelungelo lokuba negezi, amanzi, ukukhanjiswa kwendle neeendlela.
ven: maafurika tshipembe vha hashu,hoyu muvhuso u ḓo khwaṱhisedza uri ndaka yashu ya vhuponi na tshomedzo dza mupo zwo tsireledzea, na u dzula zwi tshi ṱhogomelwa.

nbl: sathi kufanele babe neendawo zemidlalo neentolo ezikulukazi ezenziwe ngcono njengezemadorobheni.
ven: ri tshi khou shumisana na brazil, india na china, ha dovha ha dzhena na united states, ḽine ḽa imela mashango o bvelelaho, ro ita nḓisedzo ya ndeme kha thendelano ye ra dzhia ye ya ṱanganedziwa kha dzulo la tshanduko ya mutsho ngei copenhagen nga nyendavhusiku mahoḽa.

nbl: mayelana nalokhu, sahloma isiza sokuthoma sokulinga, ihlelo elidephileko lokuthuthukisa iindawo zemakhaya egiyani, elimpopo, ngorhoboyi unyaka ophelileko.
ven: naho zwi so ngo swika he zwa vha zwo tea, ndi ḽiga ḽa ndeme sa izwi zwi tshi vhofha mashango oṱhe u fhindula kha tshanduko ya mutsho.

nbl: sekube neragelophambili ekunikelweni komthangalasisekelo ozokusekela ituthuko kezokulima nokubandula amalunga womphakathi.
ven: sa afurika tshipembe, ro ḓiṋekedzela kha u ḓivhofha kha zwiṅwe zwipikwa zwa u fhungudza zwi tshikafhadzaho mupo, nahone ri ḓo bvela phanḓa na u shuma nga maano a vhuṱali a u fhungudza tshanduko ya mutsho.

nbl: ukufikelela iintlabagelo zezamaphilo nefundo sekwenziwe ngcono.
ven: miraḓo i ṱhompheaho,ri ḓo khwaṱhisedza nungo u alusa madzangalelo a maafurika tshipembe ḽifhasini.

nbl: sihloma amahlelo afanako eentandini ezilikhomba enarheni mazombe, lapho kuyokuzuza amawadi ama-21.
ven: ri ḓo tikedza nungo dza u ṱavhanyisa ṱhanganelo ya zwa poḽotiki na zwa ikonomi nga dzingu ḽa sadc, na u alusa mbambadzo na u bindudza nga ngomu ha dzingu.

nbl: nakufika unyaka wee-2014, sinqophe ukuba neentandi emawadini ali-160.
ven: afurika tshipembe ḽi ḓo bvela phanḓa na u vha murangi kha u dzhenelela kha nungo dza u khwaṱhisedza dzangano ḽa afurika na zwipiḓa zwaḽo, na u shumela vhuthihi.

nbl: sifuna imindeni emaphesente ama-60 eentandinezi ikghone ukuhlangabezana neemfuneko zabo zokudla njengemikhiqizo yabo ngonyaka wee-2014.
ven: ri ḓo lumbama kha fulufulu kha u vusuludza tshumisano ntswa kha mveledziso ya afurika, sa maano a vhuṱali kha mveledziso ya ikonomi kha dzhango.

nbl: sifuna begodu ukuhlanganisa kuhle ukutjhugululwa kwenarha namahlelo asekela zelimo.
ven: maafurika tshipembe vha hashu,mishumo ya muvhuso yo tea u aravha kha mbidzo hei u itela uri kotara hei i vhe iṅwe ya dzi ṱavhanyesaho kha kushumele na u khwinisa mashumele a muvhuso.

nbl: ipumelelo yethu emkhakheni lo izakulinganiswa ngokungezeleleka kwesibalo sabalimi abasakhasako abangakghona ukungenelela kezomnotho.
ven: ri ṱoḓa vhashumi vha muvhuso vho ḓiṋekedzaho, vha konaho nahone vha re na ndavha na thoḓea dza vhadzulapo.

nbl: somlomo ohloniphekileko nosihlalo womkhandlu wenarha owengamele iimfunda,asisiyo inarha enamanzi amanengi.
ven: muvhuso u kati na u shuma kha mveledziso na u thoma mbekanyamushumo ya mveledziso ya mishumo ya muvhuso, ine ya ḓo ta maitele na tshikalo tsha vhashumi vha muvhuso kha zwiimiswa zwoṱhe.

nbl: nofana kunjalo, silahlekelwa mamanzi amanengi ngonobangela wamaphayiphi avuzako nomthangalasisekelo ongasi sezingeni elinetlha.
ven: miraḓo i ṱhompheaho,ri bvela phanḓa na nungo dzashu u fhelisa vhuaḓa na vhufhura kha zwa u renga na matshimbidzele a dzithendara, na kha u ita khumbelo ya ḽaisentse dza u ḓiraiva, tshelede ya mundende na bugu ndaula, kha zwiṅwe zwinzhi.

nbl: sizakuthatha amagadango wokwehlisa ngengcenye ukulahlekelwa mamanzi ngonyaka wee-2014.
ven: ri a takala nga mvelaphanḓa ine muvhuso wa khou ita kha maṅwe masia.

nbl: malunga ahloniphekileko,njengengcenye yemizamo yethu yokuthuthukisa ukukhula komnotho, sisebenzela ukwehlisa iindleko zokuthintana.
ven: vhege yeneyi, ro fhelisa vhufhura ha 32 687 ha mbadelo ya tshelede ya mundende, ya ndeme ya r180 miḽiyoni.

nbl: sizakusebenzela ukungezelela ibelo lesithintanisi begodu siqinisekise izinga eliphezulu le-inthanethi, ukukhambisana nekambiso yeentjhabatjhaba.
ven: komithi yashu yo ṱanganelanaho ya dziminisiṱa ya zwa vhuaḓa i khou sedza nḓila dzo dziaho dza u fhenya vhuaḓa.

nbl: masewula afrika,urhulumende lo uzaqinisekisa ukobana amagugu webhoduluko newemvelo ayavikelwa, begodu athuthukiswe.
ven: nga u shuma roṱhe ri nga ita zwinzhi.

nbl: ngokusebenzisana nebrazil, i-india nechina, begodu kubalwa hlangana ne-amerikha, eyayijamele iinarha ezithuthukileko, sadlala indima eqakathekileko kusivumelwano esamukelwa e-copenhagen emhlanganweni wokutjhuguluka kobujamo bezulu ngonobayeni enyakeni ophelileko.
ven: vhafunashango ḽashu,sa izwi vha tshi zwi ḓivha, ro thoma luṱingo lwa muphuresidennde u itela uri muvhuso na ofisi ya muphuresidennde vha kone u swikelea nga zwitshavha na u thusa u vula afho ho valeaho kha zwa nḓisedzo ya tshumelo.

nbl: nanyana singangeneleli khulu njengokulindelweko, nokho kuligadango eliqakathekileko ngombana sibophelela zoke iinarha ukuziphendulela ngokutjhuguluka kobujamo bezulu.
ven: luṱingo lu sumbedza vhuḓiimiseli hashu u ita zwithu nga nḓila yo fhambanaho kha muvhuso.

nbl: sizasebenza ngamandla nabalingani bethu bangaphetjheya ukufikelela esivumelwaneni esinesibopho sangokomthetho.
ven: yo ita tshanduko kha matshilo a maafurika tshipembe vhanzhi.

nbl: sizakusekela imizamo yokurhabisa ukuhlanganiswa kwesifunda se-sadc ngokwepolotiki nezomnotho.
ven: ri nga bula vho-buziwe ngaleka vha mount frere, vhe luṱingo lwavho lwa vha nga ha mundende wa muṱahabvu mukalaha wavho lwa vha lwone lwe ra tou thoma u lu ṱanganedza nga ḓuvha ḽa u tou thoma ḽa tshumelo iyi.

nbl: isewula afrika iragela phambili ukubamba indima edosa phambili emizameni yekhontinenthi ukuqinisa ihlangano yobunye be-afrika nezakhiwo zayo, ukusebenzela ubunye.
ven: vha fhano vhukati hashu ṋamusi.

nbl: sizakunqophisa amandlethu ekuvuseleleni itjhebiswano elitjha letuthuko ye-afrika, njengeqhinga lokuthuthukisa umnotho kukhontinenthi.
ven: ri dovha hafhu ra vha na vho-nkululeko cele vhukati hashu, vhe vha thuswa u wana ḽiṅwalo ḽa vhuṋe, zwe zwa vha konisa u ḓiṅwalisa kha yunivesithi ya thekhinoḽodzhi ya tshwane.

nbl: masewula afrika,imisebenzi yombuso kufanele iphendule ngokurhabileko yenze isikhathesi kube ngesithuthukisa ukusebenza kombuso.
ven: hedzi dzi tou vha tsumbo mbili dza nganea nnzhi dzo bvelelaho.

nbl: sitlhoga ikghono elidluleleko nokusebenza ngamandla.
ven: u bva kha zwenezwi na dziṅwe tsumbo, ro topola vhushayanungo vhune ha tea u lulamiswa nga zwiimiswa zwo fhambanaho zwa muvhuso.

nbl: sitlhoga abasebenzi bombuso abazinikeleko, abanekghono nabatjheja iimfuneko zezakhamuzi.
ven: vhafunashango ḽashu na dzikhonani,ndo ṱanḓavhudza zwipiḓa zwoṱhe zwa vhuṱhogwa zwa puḽane dzashu dza 2010, u ḓivhofha hashu roṱhe sa muvhuso u ya kha vhathu vha afurika tshipembe.

nbl: urhulumende uqalene nokuthuthukiswa nokusebenzisa ihlelo letuthuko lombuso, elizakubeka ikambiso namazinga wabasebenzi bombuso kiyo yoke imikhakha.
ven: mulaedza wa lushaka u ṋetshedza kuvhonele kwo ṱanḓavhuwaho kwa mbekanyamaitele yashu.

nbl: malunga ahloniphekileko,siragela phambili nemizamo yethu youkuruthula ukukhohlakala nokukhwabanisa emisebenzini yokuthenga neyamathenda, nekwenzeni iimbawo zeencwadi zokutjhayela, iimbonelelo zesondlo, iimpasa, hlangana nokhunye.
ven: dziminisiṱa vha ḓo ṋetshedza zwidodombedza kha zwipitshi zwavho zwa mugaganyagwama.

nbl: siyathaba ngengepumelelo urhulumende ayenzako keminye imikhakha.
ven: miraḓo i ṱhompheaho, maafurika tshipembe vha hashu,ṋaṅwaha nga ḽara, ri ḓo vha ri tshi khou ita luswayo lwa u fhedza miṅwaha ya 150 ya u ḓa ha maindia afurika tshipembe.

nbl: iveke le, siphelise imbadela yesondlo ekhwayanisiweko ezii-32 687, elinganiselwa eengidini ezi- r180 .
ven: zwi ri ṋea tshikhala tsha u dzhiela nṱha zwe tshitshavha tsha maindia vha ṋetshedza zwa ndeme kha zwa mishumo, mabindu, saintsi, mitambo, vhurereli, vhutsila, mvelele na u swikela na u khwaṱhisedzo ya demokirasi yashu.

nbl: ikomiti yethu yabongqongqotjhe eqalene nokukhohlakala, itjheja iindlela zokuruthula ukukhohlakala.
ven: ndi ḓo dovha hafhu nda tama na u dzhiela nṱha muṅwe wa maafurika tshipembe vhane a vha kundelwi u thusa kha zwifhinga zwa zwiwo, na uri vha ri thusa u alusa bono ḽa lushaka lu re na ndavha.

nbl: ngokusebenzisana, singenza okunengi.
ven: ri ṱanganedza vho-dr imtiaz sooliman vha gift of the givers nḓuni ino ṋamusi.

nbl: bakwethu,njengalokha nazi, sethula inomboro yokurhabako kamongameli ukwenza urhulumende ne-ofisi kamongameli bafikeleleke emphakathini, nokusiza ukususa iinqabo zokulethwa kweensetjenziswa ebantwini.
ven: vhafunashango ḽashu,u farelwa ha tshiphuga tsha ḽifhasi tsha fifa fhano zwi ita uri zwa vhukuma 2010 u vhe ṅwaha wa kushumele.

nbl: umtato lo ujamele ukuzimisela kwethu ukwenza izinto ngokuhlukileko kurhulumende.
ven: ro fhedza miṅwaha minzhi ri tshi khou dzudzanyela tshiphuga tsha ḽifhasi.

nbl: wenze umahluko epilweni yamasewula afrika amanengi.
ven: ri tou vha na miṅwedzi miraru fhedzi uri ri thoma.

nbl: buziwe ngaleka wemount frere, umtatwakhe wawubika ngemali yomhlalaphasi womyenakhe owalalako.
ven: nahone ro ḓiimisela u ita uri zwi bvelele nga ngona.

nbl: ukhona hlangana nathi entambama namhlanje.
ven: sa lushaka, ri koloda ndivhuwo dzashu kha komiti ya u dzudzanya yapo ya 2010 kha vhukoni ha nungo dzavho.

nbl: begodu hlangana nathi kunonom.
ven: ri tamela mudzulatshidulo wa komiti ya u dzudzanya yapo, vho-irvin khoza, ceo vho-danny jordaan na khoutshara ya bafana bafana, vho-carlos alberto parreira, zwivhuya zwoṱhe kha miṅwedzi iḓaho.

nbl: kilezi nezinye iimbonelo, sitshwaya ubuthakathaka ekufanele bulungiswe mikhakha karhulumende ehlukeneko.
ven: vhafunashango ḽashu, kha ri tikedze thimu yashu ya lushaka ya bafana bafana.

nbl: ngokukhulumisana nosomlomo, simeme abajameli beenhlangano abasuka epalamende ukuvakatjhela iziko lemitato ukobana amalunga wepalamende ayozibonela ngokwawo umsebezi owenziwako.
ven: ndi muṅwe wa vhaṅwe vhane vha tenda uri bafana bafana vha khou ya u bveledza zwimangadzo.

nbl: bakwethu nabangani,ngendlale amaphuzu aqakathekileko wamahlelo wethu wonyaka ka-2010, ngokuzibophelela kwethu ngokuhlanganyela njengorhulumende wabantu besewula afrika.
ven: tsha vhuṱhogwa nga maanḓa, vhafunashango ḽashu, kha vha renge dzithikhithi.

nbl: ikulumo yesitjhaba inikela isithombe esinabileko sehlelo lethu lomsebenzi.
ven: kha ri renge thikhithi nga tshifhinga u itela u ya kha heyo mitambo.

nbl: abongqongqotjhe bazakwethula imininingwana eseleko eenkulumeni zabo zesabelomali.
ven: maafurika tshipembe vha hashu,musi ri tshi khou pembelela u vhofhololwa ha vho-madiba ṋamusi, ri a dovha ra ḓivhofha kha vhupfumedzani, lushaka lwo faranaho, u sa khethulula nga muvhala na u fhaṱa vhumatshelo ha khwine roṱhe sa maafurika tshipembe, vharema na vhatshena.

nbl: malunga ahloniphekileko, masewula afrika,kusinyikhaba kilonyaka ophezulu, sizatshwaya ilanga lokukhumbula unyaka we-150 selokho kwafika amandiya esewula afrika.
ven: ri dededzwa nga zwe vho-madiba vha amba vhe bogisini, uri nahone ndi tshi tou topola:"nga tshifhinga tsha vhutshilo hanga ndo ḓiṋekedzela kha nndwa hei ya maafurika.

nbl: lokhu kunikela ithuba lokutjheja ukuqakatheka komnikelo womphakathi wamandiya emikhakheni yemisebenzi, amabubulo, isayensi, imidlalo, ikolo, ubukghwari ngepumelelo yokuqinisa intando yenengi yethu.
ven: nda takalela muhumbulo wa dimokirasi na lushaka lwo vhofholowaho, hune vhathu vha dzula vhoṱhe ḽi ḽa maladze, nahone vha na zwikhala zwi linganaho.

nbl: bakwethu nabangani,angithathe ithubeli ngidlulise amezwi wethu wokutjhiriya okunezwelo kurhulumende nabantu behaiti ngehlekelele ebaveleleko.
ven: ndi muhumbulo une nda fulufhela u ḓo u tshilela, na u u swikela.

nbl: siyathaba ukobana iinqhema zethu zokuhlenga zakghona ukuyokusiza.
ven: fhedzi arali zwi tshi tea u tou ralo, ndi une ndo ḓiimisela u u fela.

nbl: ngithanda ukuhlonipha ngokukhethekileko umsewula afrika ohlala alisizo ngeenkhathi zehlekelele, athuthukise nenembombono yomphakathi otjhejako.
ven: "ndo ṱuṱuwedzwa nga muhali washu vho-madiba, ndi ṱhompho yanga u livhisa mulaedza hoyu wa lushaka wa 2010 kha vhahali vhashu vha vhanna na vha vhafumakadzi, vhe vha pfala na vha so ngo pfalaho, vha ḓivheaho na vha sa ḓivhei.

nbl: 13 feb 2014somlomo ohloniphekileko wesibethamthetho selizwe,sihlalo womkhandlu weemfunda (i-ncop).
ven: 13 feb 2014muṱhonifhei mulangadzulo wa buthano ḽa lushaka,mudzulatshidulo wa nnḓu ya lushaka ya mavunḓu (ncop),mufarisa mulangadzulo wa buthano ḽa lushaka na mufarisa mudzulatshidulo wa ncop.

nbl: sekela likasomlomo wesibethamthetho selizwe nesekela likasihlalo we-ncop.
ven: mufarisa muphuresidennde wa riphabuḽiki, muṱhonifhei vho kgalema motlanthe.

nbl: sekela likamengameli weriphabhliki, mhlonitjhwa ukgalema motlanthe.
ven: muphuresidennde wa kale vho baleka mbethe,muṱhonifhei muhaṱuli muhulwane wa riphabuḽiki, na miraḓo yoṱhe ya vhulamukanyi.

nbl: sekela likamengameli wangaphambilini ubaleka mbethe,jaji elikhulu elihloniphekileko leriphabhliki, nawo woke amalunga ahloniphekileko wezobulungiswa.
ven: minisiṱa dzi ṱhonifheaho na vhafarisa dziminisiṱa,vhalangamavunḓu na zwipikara zwa mavunḓu ashu.

nbl: bongqongqotjhe abahloniphekileko namasekela wabongqongqotjhe,bondunakulu abakhethekileko nabosomlomo beemfunda zethu.
ven: mudzulatshidulo wa salga, na vhurangaphanḓa hoṱhe ha muvhuso wapo.

nbl: sihlalo we-salga, nabo boke abarholi baborhulumende bemakhaya.
ven: mudzulatshidulo wa nnḓu ya lushaka ya vharangaphanḓa vha sialala.ṱhoho dza zwiimiswa zwa chapter 9. muluvhisi wa bannga ya mbulungelo,vharangaphanḓa u bva kha mabindu, zwa mitambo, sialala, vhurereli na sekithara dzoṱhe,miraḓo ya madavhi a vhudipuḽomati, vhaeni vho khetheaho,miraḓo i ṱhonifheaho,maafurika tshipembe sa nṋe,good evening, sanibonani, molweni, dumelang, riperile, ndi madekwana, goeienaand.

nbl: sihlalo wendlu yenarha yabarholi bendabuko.
ven: ndi tama u livhuwa vhatshimbidzi vhoṱhe kha u mpha tshikhala itshi tsha u amba na vhathu vha afurika tshipembe, kha vhuṱambo uvhu ha mulaedza wa lushaka wa u fhedzisela, wa muvhuso wa vhuṋa wa demokirasi.

nbl: ngithanda ukuthokoza iimphathiswa ezingameleko ngokunginikela ithubeli lokhuluma nabantu besewula afrika emnyanyeni lo wekulumo yobujamo benarha (i-sona) yokugcina ngaphasi kwelawulo lehlandla lesine lentando yenengi.
ven: ndi tama u livhisa ndiliso kha u ri sia ha munna wa vhaṋe muṱhomphei vho ben skhosana, muṅwe wavho shumesaho lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu vha dovha vha vha muraḓo muhulwane wa nnḓu ino ya khuliso vha dovha vha vha minisiṱa wa kale wa tshumelo dza ndulamiso.

nbl: ngithanda ukudlulisa amezwi wokutjhiriya kwethu okuvela emrajini wehliziyo ngokudlula ephasini kongasekho umhlonitjhwa unomzana ben skhosana, ongomunye wamalunga aphezulu nosebenze isikhathi eside ngendlini ehloniphekileko le begodu nowakhe waba ngungqongqotjhe wezokuvuselelwa kweemilo.
ven: ro vhaiswa vhukuma nga u ri sia havho.

nbl: sidlulisa amezwi wokutjhiriya emndeninakhe nakumdosiphambili we-inkatha freedom party (i-ifp), ushenge, nakumalunga woke we-ifp.
ven: ri tama u livhisa ndiliso dzashu zwi tshi bva vhuhoneni ha mbilu dzashu kha muṱa wavho na kha murangaphanḓa wa ifp, shenge, khathihi na miraḓo ya ifp.

nbl: somlomo ohloniphekileko,sihlalo we-ncop ohloniphekileko,ikulumo yobujamo benarha yanamhlanjesi ingeyokuthoma eyethulwa sele angasekho ephasini umengameli wethu omtlami wentando yenengi, umhlonitjhwa unelson rolihlahla mandela.
ven: mulangadzulo a ṱhonifheaho,mudzulatshidulo a ṱhonifheaho wa ncop,uyu ndi mulaedza wa lushaka wa u thoma u itwa ri si na muphuresidennde mutumbuli washu, muhulisei vho nelson rolihlahla mandela.

nbl: ukudlula kwakhe, ngaphambi kokugidingwa kweminyaka ema-20 yekululeko yethu nentando yenengi kwabangela ubuhlungu obukhulu ebantwini bekhethu nabangaphandle kwemikhawulo yelizwe lekhethu.
ven: u ri sia havho, musi ri tshi tou vha tsini na u fara miṅwaha ya 20 ya mbofholowo na demokirasi, zwo vhaisa vhathu vhashu vhukuma na vha nga nnḓa ha mikaṋo.

nbl: sitjhiriywa kukwazi bona umadiba uzakuhlala angeenhliziyweni zethu nokobana sijanyelwe msebenzi wokuragela phambili negugu asitjhiyele lona.
ven: ri wana khuthadzo nga kha nḓivho ya uri vho madiba vha ḓo dzula vha mbiluni dzashu, na uri ri na mushumo wa u isa phanḓa na zwe vha ri siela zwone.

nbl: malunga ahloniphekileko,ilizwe lekhethu livumbulula abomma nabobaba abakhethekileko, abasiza ngobudosiphambili ngeenkhathi ezibudisi.
ven: muṅwe wa vharangaphanḓa avho vho vha vho moses kotane, mufaragwama muhulwane wa kale wa anc vha dovha vha vha muṅwaleli muhulwane wa sacp.

nbl: omunye wabadosiphambili laba bekungunomzana moses kotane, umphathisikhwama wangaphambilini we-anc nobegade angunobhala zombelele we-sacp.
ven: ri pfa ro huliswa vhukuma u vha na mufumakadzi wavho, vho mme rebecca kotane, sa mueni washu o khetheaho madekwana ano.

nbl: sizizwa sihloniphekile ngokuvakatjhelwa mkakhe, umma u-rebecca kotane, njengesithekeli sethu esikhethekileko namhlanjesi ntambama.
ven: vho mme kotane vho fara ṅwaha wa vhu 102 mulovha, na uri ri vha tamela mashudu mavhuya.

nbl: umma ukotane bekagidinga iminyaka eli-102 izolo begodu simfisela okuhle kodwa.
ven: ri dovha ra khoḓa na u hulisa muphuresidennde wa kale wa anc vho oliver tambo, vho vhonaho uri ḓenzhe ḽa mbofholowo ḽi dzule ḽo funga fhano hayani na seli musi zwi tshi khou lemela nga tshifhinga tsha pfudzungule.

nbl: sihlonipha nomengameli we-anc wangaphambilini unomzana u-oliver tambo, owaqinisekisa ngokhanyisa ikesi yekululeko elizweni lekhethu nangaphetjheya ngeenkhathi ezazibudisi zomzabalazo.
ven: murwa wavho, vho dali na mufumakadzi wavho vho rachel ri navho kha vhuṱambo vhuno madekwana ano.

nbl: sihlonipha usolomon mahlangu, isokana elaya entanjeni ngesibindi ngonyaka we-1979 lapho alengiswa khona aneminyaka ema-23.
ven: ri saḽutha solomon mahlangu, munna wa muhali o yaho kha gallows nga 1979 he a vhulawa a na miṅwaha ya 23. o ri: “malofha anga a ḓo kanzwa muri une wa ḓo aṋwa mitshelo ya mbofholowo.

nbl: wathi: “iingazi zami zizakusezelaisihlahla esizakutlhurha sikhiqize iinthelo zekululeko.
ven: ni vhudze vhathu vhanga uri ndi avha funa.

nbl: sizizwa sihloniphekile ngokuhlanganela nonina, umma umartha mahlangu nomzukulwanakhe ubathabile.
ven: ro hulisea vhukuma u vha na mme awe fhano, vho mme martha mahlangu na muḓuhulu wavho bathabile.ṅwaha wa 2014 u swaya miṅwaha ya 40 ya u vhulawa lwa tshiṱuhu nga bomo ya phasela, ha muhulwane wa matshudeni, vho abram onkgopotse tiro nga 1974 ngei botswana.

nbl: sidlulisa amezwi wokuthokoza kwesitjhaba ngokuzinikela nokuzibophelela kukamnakwabo.
ven: ri ṱanganedza mukomana wavho vho mogomotsi tiro kha vhuṱambo vhuno.

nbl: sikhumbula labo abahlongakala ngonobangela wenturhu eyayiphehlwa mbuso ngeminyaka ye-1980 neye-1990 eenkomplasi nezabelweni zethu.
ven: ri humbula avho vho lovhaho nga tshifhinga tsha khakhathi dze dza vha dzo lambedzwa nga muvhuso dza 1980 na 1990 dziḓoroboni na mivhunduni yashu.

nbl: ukosazana jabu ndlovu, umjameli wabasebenzi wangaphambilini wenyonyana yabakhiqizi besimbi yesewula afrika (i-numsa), wabulawa ngokudunyuzwa ngomnyaka we-1988 emgungundlovu kunye nomyenakhe ujabulani nendodanabo.
ven: vho jabu ndlovu, muimeleli wa kale wa mbumbano ya lushaka ya vhashumi vha mugodini (numsa), vho thuntshwa vha lovha nga 1988 ngei pietermaritzburg na mukalaha wavho na ṅwana wavho wa mutukana.

nbl: samkela indodakazi yakhe uluhle nendodanakhe usanele, begodu sihlonipha yoke imindeni eyalahlekelwa ziinthandwa zayo ngonobangela wezehlakalo zepolitiki.
ven: ri ṱanganedza ṅwana wavho wa musidzana luhle na wa muṱhannga, sanele na u hulisa miṱa ya avho vhoṱhe vho ṱutshekwaho nga vhafunwa vhavho nga tshifhinga tsha phambano dza polotiki.

nbl: somlomo ohloniphekileko,sihlalo we-ncop ohloniphekileko,saphumelela ukuqalana nobuhlungu besikhathi esidluleko begodu sakha umphakathi ovuselelekileko.
ven: mulangadzulo a ṱhonifheaho,mudzulatshidulo a ṱhonifheaho wa ncop,ro kona u kunda vhuṱungu hoṱhe ha tshifhinga tsho fhiraho ra fhaṱa tshitshavha tshiswa.

nbl: sakhe amaziko aqinileko wentando yenegi.
ven: ro fhaṱa zwiimiswa na demokirasi yo khwaṱhaho.

nbl: sabulunga umbuso webandlululo, owawunganantando yenengi, obewunegandelelo nowawunekohlakalo yokutjheja idlanzana labantu.
ven: ro swiṱa muvhuso usi wa demokirasi, u si na vhuimeleli, u tsikeledzaho wa vhukhuruku we wa vha u tshi khou shumela vha so ngo vhalaho.

nbl: sakha umbuso obumbeneko, ongabandlululiko ngokobuhlanga nangokobulili noziphendulelako begodu ojamele woke amasewula afrika.
ven: ro sika muvhuso wa vhuthihi, usa khethululi mirafho, u sa khethululi mbeu, u fhinduleaho na u imeleleaho kha maafurika tshipembe vhoṱhe.

nbl: satlama intando yenengi yomthethosisekelo ethuthukako, enemikhakha yombuso esebenza kuhle– isibethamthetho, isigungu nebandla lezobulungiswa.
ven: ro sika demokirasi ya ndayotewa, i na mukonwo wa muvhuso u shumaho zwavhuḓi – vhusimamulayo, vhulanguli na vhuhaṱuli.

nbl: sineenhlangano zesigaba se-9 ezisekela intando yenengi begodu zivikele namalungelo wezakhamuzi.
ven: ri na zwiimiswa zwa chapter 9 zwi tikedzaho demokirasi na u tsireledza pfanelo dza vhadzulapo.

nbl: ikululeko nentando yenengi zivule ithuba lomphakathi onomdlandla neembikiindaba ezikhululekileko.
ven: mbofholowo na demokirasi zwo vulela tshikhala tshitshavha tshi shumaho na nyanḓadzamafhungo yo vhofholowaho.

nbl: ukujameleka kwabomma embusweni kukhule khulu ukusukela ekufikeni kwekululeko kanti nokusatjalaliswa kwezenzelo zomphakathi kwasiza nabomma.
ven: mbofholowo yo ḓisa lwa u tou thoma, pfulufhedziso ya ndinganyo ya mbeu.

nbl: woke amatshwayo la enze isewula afrika yaba lilizwe elingcono khulu ekungahlalwa kilo kunangaphambilini.
ven: vhuimeleli ha vhafumakadzi kha zwiimiswa zwa tshitshavha na hone ho engedzea u bva tshe ha vha na mbofholowo, na nyengedzeo ya tshumelo dza mutheo na dzone dzi vhuedza vhafumakadzi.

nbl: nokho ilizwe lekhethu lisaqalene neentjhijilo ezincantathu zomtlhago, ukutjhiyana ngezomnotho nokutlhayela kwemisebenzi, esiragela phambili ukulwa nazo.
ven: zwoṱhe hezwi zwo ita uri afurika tshipembe ḽi vhe fhethu ha khwine ha u dzula hone u fhira zwe ḽa vha ḽi zwone.

nbl: ukuqalana neentjhijilo lezi kummongo wayo yoke imibuso yentando yenengi.
ven: fhedziha, shango ḽashu ḽi kha ḓi vha na khaedu tharu, vhushai, vhushayandinganyo na vhushayamishumo, dzine ri kha ḓi isa phanḓa na u lwa nadzo.

nbl: sikhethe ukutjheja amaqalontangi amahlanu.
ven: u shumana na khaedu idzi zwo no tou vha zwe ra sedzesa khazwo kha vhuvhusi hoṱhe ha demokirasi.

nbl: zefundo, zamaphilo, ukulwa nobulelesi nekohlakalo, ukuthuthukiswa kweendawo zemakhaya nokubuyekezwa kwenarha kanye nokuvulwa kwemisebenzi enetlha.
ven: ro nanga u lumbama kha vhuvhekanyandeme vhuṱanu, pfunzo, mutakalo, u lwa na vhutshinyi na vhugevhenga, mveledziso ya mahayani na tshanduko ya mavu khathihi na u sika mishumo yavhuḓi.

nbl: sihlele kabutjha umbuso ngomnqopho wokwenza bona ibe ngcono indlela yokusebenza kwawo.
ven: ro dovha ra dzudzanyulula muvhuso u itela u khwinisa kushumele.

nbl: sitlame imisebenzi emibili eqakathekileko, ukuhlelela isikhathi eside kunye nokutjheja nokuhlunga.
ven: ro thoma khomishini ya u puḽana ha lushaka yo bveledzisaho tshiga tsha shango tsha puḽane ya mveledziso ya lushaka, mvetamveto ya ikonomi ya matshilisano na tswikelelo nthihi khulwane ya muvhuso uno wa vhuṋa.

nbl: satlama ikomitjhini yokutlama yelizweloke eveze umtlamo wokuthuthukiswa kwelizweloke obabazekako, okusitjhukumiso somnotho nezehlalakuhle begodu nokube yipumelelo ekulu yelawulo lehlandla lesine.
ven: puḽane iyi i sumbedzisa zwine ra tea u ita u fhelisa vhushai, u engedza u tholwa na u fhungudza vhushayandinganyo nga 2030. vhupimathengo na u monithara hashu hu sumbedzisa uri vhunzhi ha dzitshumelo dzi khou khwinifhala.

nbl: iqhingeli lihlathulula okufanele sikwenze ukuphelisa umtlhago, ukwandisa imisebenzi nokwehlisa ukutjhiyana ngezomnotho ungakafiki umnyaka wee-2030.
ven: tsumbo, magavhelo a mindende na maṅwalo a vhuṋe zwazwino a zwi tsha dzhia tshifhinga tshilapfu uri zwi bveledzwe.

nbl: ukutjheja nokuhlola kwethu kutjengisa bona iinsetjenziswa ezinengi zineragelophambili.
ven: fhedzi hu na zwinzhi zwine zwa kha ḓi tea u shumiwa.

nbl: ngizokwethula umbiko wamaqalontangi amahlanu, ngithome ngezomnotho.
ven: ndi ḓo vhiga murahu ngaha vhuvhekanyandeme vhuṱanu, tsha u thoma ndi ikonomi.

nbl: ngokulingeneko umnotho wethu ukhule ngamaphesende ama-3,2 ngonyaka ukusukela ngomnyaka we-1994 ukuya kewee-2012 kungakhatheleki ukuthi ukufadalala kwamandla womnotho ephasini kutjhabalalise imisebenzi eziingidi.
ven: ikonomi yo aluwa nga 3,2 phesenthe ubva 1994 u swika 2012 naho ho vha na resesheni ya ḽifhasi yo ṱuwisaho mishumo ya miḽioni.

nbl: ngokusebenzisana njengorhulumende, amabhizinisi, iinhlangano zabasebenzi nezomphakathi sikghone ukuhlenga umnotho bewaba sebujameni obungcono.
ven: u shuma roṱhe sa muvhuso, mabindu, vhashumi na sekithara ya tshitshavha, zwo ita uri ikonomi i vhuelele.

nbl: umnotho welizwe, nawulinganiswa nepahla epheleleko yangekhaya (i-gdp),ukhule waba ngaphezulu kwamathriliyoni ama-r3,5.
ven: lupfumo lwa muvhuso, lwo elwaho uya nga gdp, lwo aluwa u fhira 3.5 ṱhiriḽioni rannda.

nbl: sebaziingidi ezili-15 abantu abasebenzako ngelizweni, ekusibalo esiphezulu khulu emlandweni wethu.
ven: zwazwino hu na vhathu vha linganaho 15 miḽioni vhane vha khou shuma kha shango ḽashu, ine ya vha ya nṱhesa kha ḓivhazwakale yashu, na uri mahoḽa ho sikwa mishumo i fhiraho 650 000, uya nga stats sa.

nbl: iziko leembalobalo zesewula afrika lihlathulula bona ngonyaka ophelileko kwavulwa imisebenzi engaphezulu kweenkulungwana ezima-650.
ven: hezwi a zwi athu lingana.

nbl: ukungasebenzi kwelutjha ngesewula afrika kusesemnako omkhulu, njengephasini zombelele.
ven: ri khou dzhia maga o vhalaho, hu tshi katelwa mulayo wa ṱhuṱhuwedzo ya muthelo wa vhashumi u ṱuṱuwedzaho vhatholi uri vha thole vhaswa sa vhashumi.

nbl: kunamagadango esiwathathako, kufaka hlangana nomthetho wokubonelela ngentela okhuthaza abaqatjhi ukuqatjha abantu abatjha.
ven: hu ḓo phasiswa milayo ya u vhona uri izwi zwa si kwame vhashumi vha songo tikedzwaho kana vhashumi vha kale.

nbl: kuzakukhutjhwa imithetjhwana ezakuqinisekisa bona lokhu kungaba nomthelela omumbi kubasenzi abadala nabanganasekelo lombuso.
ven: maṅwe maga o katelwa kha thendelano ya vhaswa ya lushaka yo sainiwaho soweto mahoḽa nga lambamai.

nbl: amanye amagadango akhona kusivumelwano selutjha selizwe esatlikitlwa nyakenye ngosihlabantakana esoweto.
ven: mbekanyamushumo ya mishumo ya tshitshatsha yo engedzwaho na mbekanyamushumo ya mishumo ya tshitshavha dzi khou isa phanḓa na u vha dzibveledzaho kha vhashai na vhaswa.

nbl: sivule amathuba wemisebenzi aziingidi ezi-3,7 eminyakeni emihlanu edlulileko.
ven: ro sika zwikhala zwa mishumo zwa 3,7 miḽioni kha miṅwaha miṱanu yo fhiraho.

nbl: abantu bekhethu bazuza ingeniso namakghono ehlelweni lemisebenzi yomphakathi, ekuyindlela esetjenziswako ukufumana umsebenzi wasafuthi.
ven: vhathu vhashu vha wana miholo na zwikili kha mbekanyamushumo ya mishumo ya tshitshavha, zwine vha zwi shumisa musi vha tshi ṱoḓa mishumo ya tshoṱhe.

nbl: ikhabinethi inqophe ukuvula amathuba wemisebenzi aziingidi ezisithandathu ukuthoma enyakeni ophezulu ukuya kewee-2019, kutjhejwe khulu ilutjha.
ven: khabinethe yo ita gemo ḽa mishumo ya 6 miḽioni ubva ṋaṅwaha u swika 2019, ho sedzeswa kha vhaswa.

nbl: ihlelo lethu lesizo lezehlalakuhle eselifikelela ebantwini abaziingidi ezili-16, livikela iingidi zabantu, khulukhulu abentwana abadududu.
ven: mbekanyamushumo yashu ya thikhedzo dza matshilisano ine zwazwino yo no swikelela vhathu vha 16 miḽioni, i ṋetshedza tsireledzo kha vha dzimiḽioni, nga mannḓa vhana vha si na vhathusi.

nbl: imizi eminengi iyazuza ngeembonelelo zezehlalakuhle zombuso, imali yesondlo sombuso sabentwana, imali yomhlalaphasi yabalupheleko nesibonelelo sabakhubazekileko.
ven: miṱa minzhi i khou wana mbuelo nga kha magavhelo a muvhuso, magavhelo a vhana na a vhuholefhali.

nbl: urhulumende uzakuragela phambili ngokubhadela iimbonelelwezi njengombana imizi eminengi ithembele kizo khulu ngonobangela wokubujamo obufadaleleko bomnotho obenza kutlhayele amathuba wemisebenzi.
ven: magavhelo aya a ḓo ya phanḓa ngauri miṱa minzhi i a vhuelwa na u thusalea ngao vhunga hu si na mishumo kha tshifhinga tshino tshi lemelaho musi ikonomi itshi khou kundelwa.

nbl: amathuba la avulwa ngurhulumende asenza sizikhakhazise ngokuthi sithi siphila elizweni elingcono khulu nalimadaniswa nelangaphambi komnyaka we-1994.
ven: zwikhala izwi, zwine zwa khou ḓiswa nga muvhuso, zwi ri konisa uri ri ambe ri tshi ḓihudza uri afurika tshipembe ḽine ra khou tshila khaḽo ṋamusi ḽi fhira nga kulesa ḽe ra tshila khaḽo phanḓa ha 1994. vha hashu,ri kha ḓi vha kha tshifhinga tshine zwithu zwa khou lemela.

nbl: bakwethu,sisaqalene nesikhathi esibudisi.
ven: mvelaphanḓa kha ikonomi ya united states dzo ita uri hu vhe na u tsela fhasi ha tshihaḓu kha kharentsi ya mimakete ine ya khou bvelela, hu tshi katelwa na rannda.

nbl: izehlakalo zomnotho we-amerikha zenze bona amandla wemali wamazwe asathuthukako ehle msinyana, kufakwa hlangana namandla weranda.
ven: nga 2013, rannda yo tsa nga 17.6 phesenthe musi itshi vhambedzwa na us doḽa.

nbl: phakathi komnyaka wee-2013, amandla weranda ehla khulu ngamaphesende ali-17,6 nakamadaniswa nedola ye-amerikha.
ven: fhedziha, khamphani dza mbambadzelannḓa, nga mannḓa kha sekithara ya vhubveledzi, dzi tea u vhona izwo zwa rennde ire fhasi na mbuedzedzo yo khwaṱhaho ya ḽifhasi sa tshikhala.

nbl: nokho kufanele amakhampani athumela imikhiqizo ngaphandle kwemikhawulo asebenzise ithubeli lokwehla kwamandla weranda nokunzinza komnotho wephasi.
ven: musi ri na vhukonḓi uvhu, ri a zwi ḓivha uri ri nga tshila nazwo kha tshifhinga itshi tsha pfudzungule.

nbl: nanyana sinobudisi obungaka, siyazi bona sizakuphumelela esikhathini lesi sobujamo obumbi bezomnotho.
ven: ro ita ngauralo kha miṅwaha miṱanu yo fhiraho.

nbl: sikwenzile lokho eminyakeni emihlanu edlulileko.
ven: ri ḓo takuwa ro khwaṱha, arali ra ita zwithu zwo teaho.

nbl: sizakubonakala sinamandla nasenza izinto ngefanelo.
ven: ri khou tea u shuma roṱhe sa muvhuso, mabindu na vhashumi kha u alusa ikonomi yashu nga phimo dzi re nṱha ha 5 phesenthe uri ri kone u sika mishumo ine ra khou ṱoḓa.

nbl: kufanele sisebenzisane thina singurhulumende, amabhizinisi neenhlangano zabasebenzi ukukhulisa umnotho wethu ngamazinga angaphezulu kwamaphesende amahlanu ukuze sikghone ukuvula imisebenzi edingekako.
ven: zwi takadzaho ndi zwa uri vhushumisani uvho ho no vha hone.

nbl: ngathoma ukukhulumisana nebamabhizinisi ngonyaka ophelileko ngamagadango athile angathathwa ngurhulumende ngomnqopho wokwenza kube lula ukuvula amabhizinisi ngelizweni lekhethu.
ven: zwo tutuwa kha matshimbidzele ayo, zwazwino ro no vha na themendelo dza mulayo na thendelo dza ndingo ya tshanduko ya mupo, thendelo dza maḓi na thendelo dza migodi.

nbl: ngokomphumela wemikhulumiswano leyo sesilungelelanise imithetjhwana elawula ukunikelwa kwamalayisense ekuhlolisiseni umthelela kezebhoduluko nezeemayini.
ven: phalamennde i khou khunyeledza khwinisedzo kha mulayo uri u sedze kha mveledziso iyi yavhuḓi, ine ya ḓo tumula maḓuvha a fhasi ha 300, a tshifhinga tshine tsha dzhiiwa uri mugodi u thomiwe, ubva kha u ita khumbelo uya kha themendelo dza u fhedzisela.

nbl: ipalamende isekugcineni komsebenzi wokukhibelela umthetho ozakuqinisekisa umphumela omuhle lo ozakwehlisa ngaphasi kwamalanga ama-300 isikhathi sokuthoma imayini ukuthoma ngesibawo ukufikela lapho kukhutjhwa khona imvumo yokugcina.
ven: mufarisa muphuresidennde wa riphabuḽiki vha isa phanḓa na u tshimbidza nyambedzano vhukati ha muvhuso, khamphani dza migodi na vhashumi.

nbl: isekela likamengameli weriphabliki liragela phambili nokuhlahla imikhulumiswano phakathi korhulumende, amakhamphani weemayini neehlangano zabasebenzi.
ven: ndivho yazwo ndi u dzikisa vhushaka ha nḓowetshumo kha sekithara iyi ya ndeme kha ikonomi yashu.

nbl: imitjhagalo emkhakheni lo ibe mbalwa begodu ayikadosi isikhathi eside enyakeni odluleko.
ven: zwiṱereke kha sekithara iyo zwo vha zwi si zwinzhi na uri a zwongo vha zwa tshifhinga tshilapfu mahoḽa.

nbl: okuqakatheke khulu kukobana itjhebiswano lamabubulo likhamba ngokomthetho.
ven: na uri zwa ndeme hafhu, maitele a vhushaka ha nḓowetshumo a khou itea nga nḓila ya u tevhedzela mulayo.

nbl: singenelele eendabeni zeemayini ngombana ziyingcenye eqakathekileko yemisebenzi.
ven: ro dzhenelela kha zwa mogodi ngauri ndi tshiṅwe tsha zwitshimbidzi zwa ndeme zwa mishumo.

nbl: sidinga iziko leemayini eliphumelelako.
ven: ri khou ṱoḓa sekithara ya migodi ino shuma.

nbl: iimayini ziqatjha abantu abangaphezulu kwengcenye yesigidi.
ven: migodi i thola vhathu vhalinganaho hafu ya miḽioni.

nbl: iimayini zisiza khulu njengabathengi bemikhiqizo neensetjenziswa, begodu zisabalalisa ilwazi kamanye amaziko womnotho wethu namanye amazwe ephasini zombelele.
ven: ndi yone i wanesaho zwinzhi kha thengiselano ya mashangoḓavha kha shango ḽashu.

nbl: sitjhejisisa itjhebiswano nabathintekako ngomnqopho wokulungisa indaba yezezindlu emadorobheni akhelene neemayini.
ven: i dovha ya isa masheleni a swikaho 20 biḽioni rannda thwii kha mbuelo dza muthelo.

nbl: angikhumbuze amakhampani weemayini bona umnyaka wee-2014 ungewokugcina wokuthi bathuthukise ubujamo bezindlu nokuhlala kwabasebenzi beemayini ukobana kufikelelwe eminqopheni ethile.
ven: migodi i dovha ya shela mulenzhe nga nḓila khulwane sa murengi wa thundu na zwishumiswa, na muṋetshedzi kha dziṅwe sekithara dza ikonomi yashu na dziṅwe ikonomi u mona na ḽifhasi.

nbl: urhulumende uragela phambili nokuhlolisisa bekagandelele ukusetjenziswa kwamahlelo wamaqhinga wezehlalakukhle nemisebenzi ngokomtlolo weminqopho weemayini.
ven: ri khou wana vhashumisani na vhafaramikovhe kha u tandulula fhungo ḽa dzinnḓu kha migodi ya ḓorobo.

nbl: zakhamuzi zesewula afrika,malunga ahloniphekileko,ngaphandle kweemayini, satshwaya ezinye iindlela ezihlanu zokuvula amathuba wemisebenzi ngomnyaka wee-2009.
ven: kha vha ri ndi dovhe ndi humbudze khamphani dza migodi uri 2014 ndi ṅwaha wavho wa u fhedza kha u khunyeledza u khwiniswa ha dzinnḓu na nyimele dza kutshilele kwa vhashumi vha migodini na u swikelela magemo o vhalaho.

nbl: zona ngezevakatjho, zelimo, zomnotho otjheja imvelo nokukhiqiza.
ven: muvhuso u khou isa phanḓa na u monithara na u vhona uri huna u tevhedzela kha matshilisano a khamphani na puḽane dza vhashumi na magemo a thendelonzwiwa dza migodi.

nbl: ngomnyaka wee-2012, isibalo besele sikhule safika eengidini ezili-13.
ven: maafurika tshipembe sa nṋe,miraḓo i ṱhonifheaho,nga nnḓa ha zwa migodi, ro topola zwitshimbidzi zwiṱanu zwa mishumo nga 2009. zwine zwa vha, vhuendelamashango, vhulimi, ikonomi i bvelelaho, mveledziso ya themamveledziso na vhubveledzi.

nbl: sizakuragela phambili nokukhulisa ibubulweli, ngekghono elinalo lokuvula amathuba wemisebenzi.
ven: nḓowetshumo ya vhuendelamashango yo aluwa nga nḓila khulwane.

nbl: ngonyaka wee-2012 sahloma iqhinga lomthangalasisekelo welizweloke, elidoswa phambili ngumengameli ngaphasi kwekomitjhini kamengameli ehlanganisa imithangalasisekelo.
ven: nga 1993, afurika tshipembe ḽo ṱanganedza vhaeni vha bvaho kha mashangoḓavha vha linganaho 3 miḽioni.

nbl: bekube gadesi sesisise ngethriliyoni linye lamaranda kezomthangalasisekelo womphakathi esikhathini esiminyaka emihlanu edluleko.
ven: nga 2012, tshivhalo itsho tsho engedzea u ya kha 13 miḽioni.

nbl: amaphrojekthi amanengi sele aphelile namkha selazokuphela.
ven: ri ḓo isa phanḓa na u alusa nḓowetshumo iyi, ine mushumo wayo wa vha wa u sika mishumo.

nbl: amahlelo afana naleli ayakhiwa ekapa, e-tshwane, e-nelson mandela bay, e-buffalo city, ethekwini ne-rustenburg.
ven: nga 2012 ro thoma puḽane ya themamveledziso ya lushaka, yo rangwa phanḓa nga muphuresidennde nga kha khomishini ya pfananyo ya themamveledziso ya vhuphuresidennde.

nbl: amadoyelo nobungeno belizwe sele kwenziwe ngcono.
ven: ro bindudza ṱhiriḽioni ya dzirannda kha themamveledziso ya tshitshavha kha miṅwaha miṱanu yo fhiraho.

nbl: sakhe iphayiphi elikhambisa iimbaseli elimakhilomitha ama-700 elisuka ethekwini liye egauteng ngomnqopho wokukhambisa amakhyubhikhilitha amabhiliyoni amane wepetroli, idizili neembaseli zeemphaphamtjhini ngonyaka.
ven: tshumelo ya rea vaya ngei joburg zwazwino i khou shumiswa nga vhadzulapo vha gauteng vha fhiraho 100 000. tshumelo dzi fanaho na dzenedzo dzo fhaṱwa kha ḓorobo ya kapa, tshwane, nelson mandela bay, buffalo city, ethekwini na rustenburg.

nbl: pheze sekwakhiwe iindlela namkha imizila emitjha ebalelwa kumakhilomitha ayi-1500.
ven: ho khwiniswa vhuima zwikepe na vhuimangalavha ha shango.

nbl: iragelophambili leli lokungezelelwa kweendlela lisikhumbuza labo abakhe basebenzela urhulumende lo benzela ilizwe okuhle, njengongqongqotjhe wangaphambilini wezeenthuthi unomzana u-dullar omar.
ven: ro fhaṱa phaiphiledzi dza zwivhaswa dza 700 khiḽomitha ubva durban uya gauteng dza u endedza khyubiki dza ḽithara dza 4 biḽioni dza paṱirolo, dizili na zwivhaswa zwa jet nga ṅwaha.

nbl: umma wakwakhe ufarieda ungomunye weenthekeli zethu ntambama nje.
ven: ho fhaṱwa bada ntswa kana mikoto i swikaho kha 1500 khiḽomitha.

nbl: ukwakhiwa kwemizila yesiporo emitjha sekuthonyiwe empumalanga ngomnqopho wokwehlisa isiminyaminya eendleleni.
ven: mvelaphanḓa iyi maelana na bada iri humbudza avho vho shumelaho muvhuso vhe vha ṱoḓa uri uvhe wa zwivhuya fhedzi, u fana na minisiṱa wa kale wa zwa vhuendi vho dullar omar.

nbl: eminyakeni elitjhumi ezako i-ejensi yabakhweli beentimela yesewula afrika izokusebenzisa amabhiliyoni angaphezulu kwe-r120 eminyakeni elitjhumi ezako ukuthenga iintimela ezitja.
ven: mufumakadzi wavho vho farieda ndi muṅwe wa vhaeni vhashu madekwana ano.

nbl: i-transnet ihlome iqhinga layo elikhulukazi lokukhangisa elibiza amabhiliyoni ama-r300 wokwakha umthangalasisekelo weenthuthi odingeka khulu.
ven: u fhaṱwa ha ḽaini ntswa dza zwiporo ho thomiwa ngei mpumalanga, u fhungudza mutsiko ure dzibadani.

nbl: ukuze sifikelele ikghono lokukhula komnotho wetjingalanga kapa negu letjingalanga, sahloma ihlangano ethuthukisa indawo ye-saldanha begodu savula amabubulo amabili amatjha e-atlantis.
ven: thandela ya gautrain zwazwino i khou shuma lwa tshoṱhe na uri i hwala vhaṋameli vha linganaho 1,2 miḽioni nga ṅwaha.

nbl: njengendlela yokuthuthukisa ukunikelwa kwamanzi, kwakhiwe amadamu amakhulu amatjha , i-de hoop elimpopo ne-spring grove kwazulu-natala, kanti ingasikade kuzokuhlonywa isigaba sesibili se-lesotho highlands water project.
ven: zhendedzi ḽa reiḽi ḽa vhaṋameli ḽa afurika tshipembe ḽi ḓo shumisa masheleni a fhiraho 120 biḽioni ya dzirannda kha miṅwaha ya fumi iḓaho ya u renga zwidimela zwiswa.

nbl: ukwakha kuragela phambili eentetjhini zegezi ezitja i-medupi elimpopo nekusile empumalanga kanye ne-ingula hlanu kwemnambithi lapho kuqatjhwe abasebenzi abangaphezulu kwee-30 000. siragela phambili nokufunisisa eminye imithombo yokuphehla amandla ngokukhambisana nomtlamo weensetjenziswa zamandla.
ven: transnet i khou shumisa tshiṱirathedzhi tshayo tsha makete tsha 300 biḽioni, u fhaṱa themamveledziso ya vhuendi ine ya khou ṱoḓea vhukuma.

nbl: sekutjhejisiswe ubungozi namathuba, imithetjhwana yokugcina izakukhutjhwa msinyana begodu izakulandelwa kuqalisisisa nokukhutjhwa kwamalayisense.
ven: musi ro limuwa ngaha ha ndeme ya ikonomi ya kapa vhukovhela na kha phendelashango ya vhukovhela, ro rwelaṱari zounu ya mveledziso ya nḓowetshumo ya saldanha na u vula fekiṱhiri ntswa mbili ngei atlantis.

nbl: silindele ukuphelelisa ukuthengwa kwamamegawathi wamandla wenyutliya azii-9 600. abakhiqizi beembaseli zeentjalo sele bakhethiwe begodu bathomile ukusebenza.
ven: u khwinisa ṋetshedzo ya maḓi, ho mbo fhedziswa madamu mavhili maswa, de hoop ngei limpopo na spring grove ngei kwazulu-natal, ngeno luṱa lwa vhuvhili lwa thandela ya maḓi ya lesotho highlands itshi ḓo rwelwaṱari hu si kale.

nbl: malunga ahloniphekilekoilizwe lekhethu lisebenza ngamandla begodu liyindawo engcono khulu ekungahlalwa kiyo.
ven: u fhaṱa hu khou ya phanḓa kha zwiṱitshi zwiswa zwa muḓagasi, medupi ngei limpopo, kusile ngei mpumalanga na ingula tsini na ladysmith, hune ho no tholwa vhashumi vha fhiraho 30 000. ri khou isa phanḓa na u wana zwiṅwe zwiko zwa fulufulu, zwi tshi elana na puḽane ya tshomedzo dzo ṱanganelanaho ya fulufulu.

nbl: kufanele siragele phambili nokulitjheja.
ven: mveledziso ya peṱiroḽiamu, nga mannḓa gese ya shale i ḓo vhonalesa nga mannḓa kha dzingu ḽa karoo na kha ikonomi ya afurika tshipembe.

nbl: malunga ahloniphekileko,umnotho wethu omkhulu ungeniswa nge-inthanethi namkha ngehlelothungelelwano.
ven: musi ho sedzuluswa khombo na zwikhala, hu ḓo bviswa mulayo wa u fhedzisela hu si kale wa tevhelwa nga u ṋetshedzwa ha dziḽaisentsi.

nbl: sekundlalwe umtiya wamakhilomitha azii-37 000 wekhebula ngokusebenzisana kwamakhamphani wangeqadi nombuso eminyakeni emihlanu edlulileko.
ven: vhabveledzi vha zwivhaswakavhili vho nangiwa na uri vho no thoma mushumo.

nbl: ukwakhiwa kokuthoma kwetheleskophu yeenkotlelo ezima-64 ezandulela i-square kilometre array, i- meerkat, kuzakuphela ngekota yokuthoma yomnyaka wee-2014.
ven: ho vheiwa 37 000 khiḽomitha ya khevhele dza fibre-optic nga sekithara ya phuraivethe na ya tshitshavha kha miṅwaha miṱanu yo fhiraho.

nbl: malunga ahloniphekileko,isibonelelo sethu sokukhiqiza siveze imiphumela emihle.
ven: ri ḓihudza nga u bvelela hashu kha saintsi na thekhinoḽodzhi.

nbl: ihlelo letjalomali ekwakhiweni kweenthuthi elahlonywa ngomnyaka wee-2009 liphumelelise iimbonelelo ezibiza amabhiliyoni ama-r3,8 kumaphrojekthi ali-160.
ven: u fhaṱwa ha theḽesikoupu ya u thoma ya 64-dish forerunner uya kha square kilometre array, na meerkat, zwi ḓo khunyeledzwa kha kotara ya u thoma ya 2014. miraḓo i ṱhonifheaho,zwiṱuṱuwedzi zwashu zwa u engedza vhubveledzi zwo vhuisa mbuyelo.

nbl: amaphrojekthi la aphumelelisa imisebenzi ezii-50 000. amakhampani la azakukhiqiza iinkoloyi ezincani, iimbhesana zamateksi neembhesi.
ven: tshikimu tsha vhubindudzi ha automotive ho rwelwaho ṱari nga 2009 tsho themendela 3.8 biḽioni ya dzirannda ya zwiṱuṱuwedzi zwa thandela dza vhubindudzi dza 160. izwi zwi ita mishumo i fhiraho zwigidi zwa 50. dzikhamphani dzi ḓo vha dzi tshi khou bveledza goloi, zwibisana na dzibasi dza sedan.

nbl: sinzinzise ibubulo lezambatho, lamatjhila, leenkhumba nelamanyathelo egade sele aphungula abasebenzi.
ven: ro dziyisa sekithara ya zwiambaro, mawiviwa, mukumba na zwienda, ye ya vha ina ṱhahelelo ya mishumo.

nbl: amabubulo abalwako akhethelwe ukukhiqiza imikhiqizo yangekhayapha.
ven: nḓowetshumo dzo vhalaho dzo itelwa zwishumiswa zwapo.

nbl: imkhiqizo le ifaka hlangana iimbhesi, imirorho engemabhlegeni, izembatho, amatjhila, iinkhumba, amanyathelo neminye imikhiqizo.
ven: izwi zwi katela mabasi, miroho ya zwikoṱini, zwiambaro, mawiviwa, mikumba na zwienda na dziṅwe thundu.

nbl: eminyakeni emibili edlulileko kwaphela, kwakhiwa ngelizweni lekhethu iimbhesana zamateksi ezingaphezulu kwee--20 000 neembhesi ezima-330 begodu lokhu kwadosela ekutjalweni kwemali netuthuko ngemadorobheni wethu.
ven: kha miṅwaha mivhili yo fhiraho fhedzi, ho bveledzwa zwibisana zwi fhiraho 20 000 na mabasi a 330 fhano, zwo ḓisaho vhubindudzi na mveledziso kha ḓorobo dzashu.

nbl: eminyakeni emihlanu ezako umbuso uzakuthenga ipahla yawo ema-75% kubakhiqizi bangesewula afrika.
ven: kha miṅwaha miṱanu iḓaho, muvhuso uḓo vhuelwa nga 75% ya thundu na tshumelo dzawo ubva kha vhabveledzi vha afurika tshipembe.

nbl: zakhamuzi zesewula afrika,kufanele sisebenze khulu ngomnqopho wokuthuthukisa abosomabubulo abanzima abasakhasako.
ven: maafurika tshipembe sa nṋe,ro shuma vhukuma kha u bveledza vhoranḓowetshumo vha vharema vhane vho vha vha sa athu bvelela.

nbl: inengi labosomabubulo abanzima abanerhuluphelo balila ngobudisi abahlangabezana nabo ekufumaneni imali yokusungula amabubulo, wokufikelela iimakethe zabathengisi, nesekelo lokukhiqiza ngesiterhiniki.
ven: vhunzhi ha vho ranḓowetshumo vha vharema vha vhilaedzwa nga vhukonḓi vhune vha ṱangana naho musi vha tshi ṱoḓa u wana masheleni a nḓowetshumo, vhuṋetshedzi na mimakete ya thengiso, na thikhedzo ya mveledziso ya thekhiniki.

nbl: isikhwama sesekelo leemali selizwe loke, ihlangano ethuthukisa amabubulo ne-ejensi yesekelo leemali yamabubulo amancani zizakuragela phambili nokusekela ngeemali amabhizinisi aphumelelako wabanzima ukuthuthukisa imikhiqizo yamabubulo.
ven: tshikwama tsha u manḓafhadza lushaka, koporasi ya mveledziso ya nḓowetshumo na zhendedzi ḽa gwama ḽa mabindu maṱuku zwi ḓo isa phanḓa na u ṋetshedza masheleni kha mabindu a langwaho nga vharema u itela u alusa zwa nḓowetshumo.

nbl: ngaphezu kwalokho, sikhuthaze namabhizinisi asele anzinzileko ngomnqopho wokusekela ukuthuthkiswa kwamabhizinisi wabantu abanzima.
ven: hu tshi engedzwa kha zwezwo, ri ṱuṱuwedza mabindu o no bvelelaho uri a tikedze mveledziso ya mabindu a nḓowetshumo ya vharema.

nbl: zokulima zimthombo wemisebenzi eqakathekileko begodu zivula amathuba namabubulo.
ven: vhulimi ndi tshitshimbidzi tsha ndeme tsha mishumo na uri vhu ṋetshedza zwikhala zwa vhubindudzi.

nbl: ihlelo lethu lezokulima elisekela i-fetsatlala, likhiqiza abathengiseli bamazwe wangaphandle abatjha.
ven: mbekanyamushumo yashu ya thikhedzo ya vhulimi, fetsa tlala (fhedza nḓala), i khou bveledza vhavhambadzelannḓa vhaswa.

nbl: ngenyanga egadungileko abalimi abasakhasako abama-88 behlelo lamaplasi amancani bathumele amathani ama-268 womumbu neembhontjisi elesotho ngaphasi kwehlelo lokugoma lehlangano yeentjhaba ezibumbeneko.
ven: vhorabulasi vha 88 vha sa athu bvelelaho kha iyi mbekanyamushumo vho ṋetshedza mbekanyamushumo ya zwiḽiwa zwa ḽifhasi ya yuno thani dza 268 dza mavhele na ṋawa uri dzi rumelwe lesotho ṅwedzi wo fhiraho.

nbl: silindele bona isibalo lesi sikhule.
ven: ri khou lavhelela uri nomboro iyi i ḓo engedzea.

nbl: sizakuragela phambili ngokusekela ibubulo lezokuthiya, elingenisa okungenani amabhiliyoni asi-r6 emnothweni begodu lisiza ngemisebenzi ezii-27 000. malunga ahloniphekileko,sibe nepumelelo ehle ehlelweni lezokutjhugululwa kwenarha.
ven: ri ḓo isa phanḓa na u alusa sekithara yashu ya vhureakhovhe, ine yo ḓisa 6 biḽioni ya dzirannda kha ikonomi ya ṋetshedza mishumo ya 27 000. miraḓo i ṱhonifheaho,ho vha na mvelaphanḓa yavhuḓi kha mbekanyamushumo ya tshanduko ya mavu.

nbl: ukusukela ngomnyaka we-1994, pheze amaplasi azii-5 000, wamahekthara aziingidi ezi-4,2 adluliselwe ebantwini abanzima lapho kuzuze imindeni engaphezu kweenkulungwana ezima-200,000.
ven: ubva 1994, mabulasi a tsini na 5,000, a na egere dza 4.2 miḽioni, o iswa kha vharema, ha vhuelwa miṱa i fhiraho 200,000. mbilo dza mavu dza tsini na 80,000, dzi itaho egere dza 3.4 miḽioni, dzo khunyeledzwa ha vhuelwa vhathu vha linganaho 1.8 miḽioni.

nbl: pheze amatleyimu wenarha azii-80 000, zenani lamahekthara aziingidi ezi-3,4 aqediwe bese kwazuza abantu abasigidi si-1,8.
ven: vhuvhusi vhu ḓaho vhu ḓo tea u isa phanḓa na tshivhalo tsha mbekanyamaitele dzo vhalaho, vhusimamulayo na vhudzheneleli ha nḓowedzo, kha u isa phanḓa na u tandulula u dzhielwa vhathu mavu avho.

nbl: kufuneka bona umbuso olandelako uragele phambili ngeminye imigomo, imithetho neendlela kambiso zokungenelela ngomnqopho wokulungisa ukuthathelwa kwabantu bekhethu iinarha zabo.
ven: izwi zwi katela mafhungo a elanaho na u thomiwa ha ofisi ya muhulwane wa vhusengulusi ha ndeme kha u vulwa ha mbilo dzire hone.

nbl: lokhu kufaka hlangana iindaba zokuhloma i-ofisi lomhloli zombelele wezokubekwa kwentengo yenarha ngokwenza njalo kuvulelwe ithuba lokufaka iimbawo.
ven: miraḓo i ṱhonifheahoafurika tshipembe ndi ngoho ndi fhethu havhuḓi ha u dzula hone.

nbl: anginikele umbiko ngehlelo lethu lezokutjhugululwa kwezehlalakuhle.
ven: kha vha ri zwazwino ndi vhige ngaha mbekanyamushumo yashu ya tshanduko ya matshilisano.

nbl: siyathaba bona kukhona ukukhula esibalweni sabentwana abatloliswa ngeenkolweni, ukusukela eenkolweni zabasathomako ukufikela efundweni ephakemeko.
ven: pfunzo ndi yone i bvisaho vhathu kha vhushai kha vhathu vhashu vha dzimiḽioni.

nbl: isibalo sabentwana abafunda igreyidi r sibuyelelwe kabili, ukusukela ema-300 000 ukudlula ema-700 000 phakathi komnyaka wee-2003 newee-2011.
ven: ro takalela u vha hone ha nyengedzeo ya u ṅwaliswa ha vhana tshikoloni, ubva kha phuraimari ya u ranga uya kha ḽeveḽe ya theshiari.

nbl: itlhatlha lomthethomgomo osatlanywako mayelana nokufikeleleka okunabileko kugreyidi-1 sewufakiwe kugazede yombuso bona umphakathi uveze amazizo wawo ngawo, ngomnqopho wokwenza bona kukateleleke ukufunda igreyidi-r. bakwethu,abafundi abaziingidi ezibunane bafunda eenkolweni ezingabhadelisi imali yokufunda kanti abafundi abaziingidi ezilithoba bathola ukudla okunepilo eenkolweni okunikelwa ngurhulumende ukuqinisekisa bona bangabulawa yindlala begodu lokho kubasiza bona basebenze kuhle.
ven: nomboro ya vhana vhane vha khou dzhena gireidi r yo engedzea kavhili, ubva kha 300 000 uya kha 700 000 vhukati ha 2003 na 2011. ho gazetiwa mvetamveto ya muhanga wa mbekanyamaitele ya tswikelelo ya ḽifhasi kha gireidi r u itela uri tshitshavha tshi bvise vhupfiwa, ho sedzwa kha uri gireidi r i vhe khombe khombe.

nbl: izinga lokuphumelela kumethrigi likhuphuke ukusukela pheze ngama-61% ngomnyaka wee-2009 ukuya ema-78% ngonyaka ophelileko kanti ukuphumelela kokungena eyunivesithi kuya kukhula qobe minyaka.
ven: vha hashu,vha gudiswa vha miḽioni dza malo vha dzhena kha zwikolo zwi sa badelwi mitendelo, ngeno vhagudiswa vha miḽioni dza ṱahe vha tshi khou wana zwiḽiwa zwa pfushi tshikoloni, zwine zwa ṋetshedzwa nga muvhuso u tshi itela uri vha sa vhaiswe nga nḓala.

nbl: ukuze sithuthukise ukuhlanganyela ekuhlukeni, ikharikhyulamu yelimi lamatshwayo lesewula afrika izakufundiswa ngeenkolweni ukuthoma komnyaka ozako, wee-2015.
ven: nga kha ndingo ya lushaka ya ṅwaha nga ṅwaha, ri ima kha khwinisedzo na nzhenelelo dzi ṱoḓeaho, nga mannḓa kha mbalo na saintsi.

nbl: sikhulise isibalo sethu sabadala abakghona ukufunda ngehlelo le-kha ri gude ukusukela eengidini ezi-2,2 ngomnyaka wee-2008 ukufikela eengidini ezintathu.
ven: u alusa vhukateli na phambano ya zwithu, kharikhuḽamu ya luambo lwa tswayo lwa afurika tshipembe i ḓo iswa zwikoloni ubva ṅwaha u ḓaho, 2015. ro engedza nomboro ya vhaaluwa vhano kona u vhala na u ṅwala nga kha mbekanyamushumo ya kha ri gude ubva kha vhathu vha 2,2 miḽioni nga 2008 uya kha vha 3 miḽioni.

nbl: sitjalile nekubandulweni kwabotitjhere begodu sivula kabutjha amakholiji wokubandula abotitjhere ukuhlangabezana nesidingo.
ven: ro dovha ra bindudza kha vhugudisi ha vhadededzi na uri ri khou vula hafhu magudedzi a vhugudisi ha vhadededzi uri ri swikelele ṱhoḓea.

nbl: ukuze senze ubujamo bokufunda obuhle, sakhe iinkolo ezitja ezima-370 ezijamiselela iinkolo ezakhiwe ngokukikitela ngedaka nezinye izakhiwo ezingakalungeli ukufunda ngelizweni zombelele.
ven: kha u bveledza vhupo havhuḓi ha u guda, ro ṋetshedza zwikolo zwiswa zwa 370 zwo dzhenaho vhuimoni ha zwikolo zwe zwa vha zwo fhaṱwa nga mavu na zwiṅwe zwiimiswa zwe zwa vha zwi siho kha nzulele yavhuḓi u mona na shango.

nbl: bakwethusineendaba ezimnandi esingazidemba mayelana nezefundo ephakemeko nokubandula.
ven: vha hashuri na lungano lwavhuḓi lwa u anetshela na kha pfunzo ya nṱha.

nbl: ukutloliswa kwabafundi emayunivesithi kukhule ngamaphesende ali-12 kanti ukutlolisa emakholiji wefundo eragela phambili nokubandula (ama-fet) kukhule ngama-90%.
ven: u ṅwalisa ha matshudeni kha dziyunivesithi ho engedzea nga 12% ngeno u ṅwalisa kha magudedzi a pfunzo ya phanḓa na vhugudisi zwo engedzea nga 90%.

nbl: singezelele isabelomali sesikhwama senarha sesizo leemali kubafundi safika kumabhiliyoni ali-r9 ngomnqopho wokuhlangabezana nesidingo esikhulako.
ven: ro engedza mugaganyagwama wa tshikimu tsha lushaka tsha thuso ya masheleni ya matshudeni uya kha 9 biḽioni ya dzirannda uri ri kone u swikelela ṱhoḓea dzine dza khou engedzea.

nbl: enye ipumelelo ekulu ebekhona embusweni wehlandla lesine lo kube kukwakhiwa kwamayunivesithi amabili amatjha.
ven: iṅwe tswikelelo khulwane ya themo ino ho vha u thomiwa ha yunivesithi mbili ntswa, sol plaatje ya ngei kapa devhula na yunivesithi ya mpumalanga.

nbl: i-sol plaatje ngetlhagwini kapa kanye neyunivesithi yempumalanga.
ven: ri ḓo dovha ra fhaṱa magudedzi maswa a 12 ngei limpopo, mpumalanga, kwazulu-natal na kapa vhubvaḓuvha.

nbl: begodu sizokwakha amakholiji amatjha we-fet ali-12 e-limpopo, empumalanga, kwazulu-natal nepumalanga kapa.
ven: vha hashu, u rwelwaṱari ha mutheo wa ṱhanganelo ya pfunzo ya lushaka mahoḽa zwo vha mveledziso ya ndeme kha shango.

nbl: bakwethu,ukuhlonywa kwetlhatlha lelizwe lokusebenzisana ngonyaka ophelileko kwaba ligadango eliqakathekileko ngelizweni.
ven: ri tamela mashudu tshigwada itsho kha mushumo wavho wa lushaka.

nbl: sifisela isiqhema lesi okuhle ekusebenzeleni ilizwe.
ven: vha hashu,ri na lungano lwavhuḓi lune ra nga anetshela kha u khwinifhala ha ndondolamutakalo.

nbl: bakwethu,sineendaba ezimnandi godu esingazidemba mayelana netuthuko kezamaphilo.
ven: kha miṅwaha miṱanu yo fhiraho, ho fhaṱwa zwiimiswa zwiswa zwa mutakalo zwa 300, hu tshi katelwa kiḽiniki ntswa dza 160. ho fhaṱwa zwibadela zwiswa zwa fumi kana u vusuluswa ngei ladybrand, germiston, mamelodi, natalspruit, ethekwini, zola, bojanala, tshiṱiriki tsha vryburg, swartruggens, khayelitsha na mitchell’s plain.

nbl: eminyakeni emihlanu edluleko, sekwakhiwe amaziko amatjha wezamaphilo ama-300, nakufaka hlangana imitholapilo emitjha eli-160.
ven: mulangadzulo a ṱhonifheahomudzulatshidulo a ṱhonifheaho wa ncop,tshanduko kha hiv na aids ndi iṅwe ya tswikelelo khulwanesa kha vhuvhusi uvhu na uri ri dzhiiwa sa shango ḽa modele nga mbekanyamushumo dza aids dza yuno (unaids).
