nbl: bakwethu,indawana lapho imali isetjenziswa khona khulu, esizokubawa ipalamende bonyana iyiyelele, kutjhejana neenhlokodorobha zombuso ezimbili, ipitori njehlokodorobha yezokukuphatha nekapa njengehlokodorobha yesibethamthetho.
ven: nga tshifhinga tsha mulaedza wa lushaka nga luhuhi 2015ndo ḓivhadza pulane dza mbuno dza ṱahe dzine dza vha phindulo ya nyaluwo i ongolowaho.

nbl: sikholwa bonyana indaba le itlhoga itjhejo lepalamende lamsinyana.
ven: mbuno dza ṱahe dzi katela:a. mbuedzedzo ya zwa vhulimi na ndeme ya mudzedze wa zwibveledzwa zwa vhulimi, vhureakhovhe na vhusimamiri.

nbl: bakwethukunengi okufuze sikwenze sisoke ukutjhugulula ubujamo bezomnotho nokuphelisa ukumotjha imali.
ven: b. u bveledza u vhuelwa kana u engedza ndeme kha lupfumo lwa minerala yashu.

nbl: sizokudlula esikhathini esibudisi, kodwana nasele umnotho uhluma sizazikhakhazisa ngokwenza okufaneleko.
ven: c. u shumiswa nga mannḓa ha pulane ya mbekanyamaitele ya nḓowetshumo nga nḓila khulwane.

nbl: bakwethu,ngifuna ukubika ngeembopho zanyakenye.
ven: d. u khinulula vhukoni ha mabindu maṱuku na a vhukati (dzismme), miṱanganelano, mabindu a ḽokhishini na a vhupo ha mahayani.

nbl: ihlelo lamaphuzu alithoba amhlahlandlela karhulumende lifaka hlangana:kunendima ebonakalako neqakathekileko esele siyikhambile ekuphunyelelisweni kwehlelweli.
ven: e. u tandulula khaedu ya muḓagasi.

nbl: kuneragelophambili elenziweko ukunzinzisa ukunikelwa kwegezi.
ven: f. u dzikisa maraga wa zwa mishumo.

nbl: akhange khekucime igezi ukusukela ngorhoboyi wanyakenye okuyinto ebelisizo elikhulu emakhaya nebubulweni ngokufanako.
ven: g. u engedza vhubindudzi ha sekithara ya tshitshavha na ya phuraivethe.

nbl: amanye amayunithi angezelelweko wesitetjhi samandla se-ingula azakukhanyiswa ngonyaka wee-2017, nofana amanye azakuthoma ukulungelelaniswa enyakeni wona lo.
ven: i. masia a phungudzo kha tshanduko, u engedza na u fhambanyisa ikonomi.

nbl: iimbawo zeentjhukumiso zizakukhutjhwa ngamathuba wokuthoma werhasi kubakhiqizi.
ven: maḓi na vhuthathatshiliiii.

nbl: mangigandelele ukuthi sizakuthenga kwaphela inyukliya ngokwezinga nangekghono lelizwe lekhethu.
ven: khamphani dzi langwaho nga muvhuso.

nbl: bakwethu,urhulumende wethu ngomnyango wezerhwebo namabubulo wethule iimbonelelo eminyakeni edlulileko ukukhuthaza ukutjalwa kweemali emazikweni wemikhiqizo, khulukhulu kezamatjhila, isikhumba nezeenkoloyi.
ven: ho vha na mvelaphanḓa i vhonalaho kha u shumisa pulane idzi.

nbl: kuneragelophambili elenziweko emikhakheni le.
ven: ho vha na mvelaphanḓa kha u khwaṱhisedza ṋetshedzo ya muḓagasi.

nbl: iimbonelelo zomkhakha weenkoloyi zidose ukutjalwa kweemali okungaphezu kwamabhiliyoni ama-r25 eminyakeni emihlanu edlulileko.
ven: ahu athu vha na u tumuwa ha muḓagasi ubva ṱhangule mahoḽa zwine zwo thusa miṱa na nḓowetshumo.

nbl: samukela ukutjalwa kweemali okuqakathekieko okuvela kwa-mercedes, i-general motors, i-ford, i-beijing auto works, isiqhema se-metair, i-bmw, i-goodyear kunye ne-vw.
ven: muvhuso wo isa r83 biḽioni kha eskom yo konisaho uri vhubindudzi vhu ye phanḓa ngei medupi na kusile, ngeno mbekanyamushumo ya u vhona uri muḓagasi u dzule u hone itshi khou ya phanḓa.

nbl: amakhamphani weentjhabatjhaba njengabo-nestle, i-unilever, i-samsung kunye ne- hisense nawo aqinisekise bonyana isewula afrika lilizwe eliphambili kezokukhiqiza e-afrika.
ven: minango ya dzibidi dzo vhalaho dza mbekanyamushumo ya vhubveledzi ha muḓagasi wo ḓiimisaho u vhuyedzedzeaho yo kunga vhubindudzi r194 biḽioni.

nbl: bandise ukusisa ngeemali ngokuvula amanye amaziko womkhiqizo amatjha.
ven: vhurangeli uvhu vhu tou vha tsumbo yo dziaho ya uri muvhuso u nga shumisana hani na sekithara ya phuraivethe kha u ḓisa thandululo dzi vhonalaho kha khaedu ya tshihaḓu ine shango ḽashu ḽa ṱangana nayo.

nbl: iragelophambili elenziweko kezomkhiqizo litjengise kwamambala amahlelo wokubonelela ayasebenza begodu ayakghona ukudosa abatjalimali.
ven: nga 2016, muvhuso u ḓo nanga vho rankhonṱhiraka vho teaho vha vhubveledzi ha muḓagasi wo ḓiimisaho wa malasha.

nbl: bakwethu,nyakenye ngamemezela amahlelo wokuvuselelwa kwezokulima.
ven: khumbelo dza makumedzwa dzi ḓo bveledzwa kha luṱa lwa u thoma lwa bidi ya gese u ya kha ya muḓagasi.

nbl: sethula ihlelo lamaphaga wezokulima anqophe ukwandisa ukuzibandakanya kwabalimi abasakhasako kezokulima.
ven: mbekanyamushumo ya nyengedzo ya fulufulu ḽa nyukiḽia i kha ḓi vha tshipiḓa tsha ṱhanganyelo ya fulufulu ḽa matshelo.

nbl: ngivumelani ngethule umthumbi kanongorwana kanomabubulo wonyaka wee-2015, umma ujulia shungube, obuya kumasipala wenkomazi empumalanga.
ven: pulane yashu ndi u thoma 9600 megawatsi ya fulufulu ḽa nyukiḽia kha miṅwaha ya fumi i ḓaho, u engedza kha u tshimbidza puḽanti ya muḓagasi wa nyukiḽia wa koeberg.

nbl: somlomo ohloniphekileko nosihlalo ohloniphekileko,ukulungiswa kobunini benarha kuhlala kuyinto eqakathekileko njengalokha sirhuluphele itjhuguluko.
ven: ri ḓo linga makete ri tshi itela u wana mutengo wa vhukuma wa u fhaṱa pulanti dza tshimodeni dza nyukiḽia.

nbl: nyakenye ngakhuluma ngomthethomtlamo wokulingana (i-50/50) otjhukumisa amalungelo afanako wabantu abahlala nabasebenza emaplasini.
ven: kha vha ri ndi khwaṱhisedze uri ri ḓo wana nyukiḽia nga tshikalo na tshikhala tshine shango ḽashu ḽa ḓo kona u swikelela.

nbl: kwemukelwe iintjhukumiso ezima-27 ezibuya kubalimi abathengisako ezine zazo ziyaphunyeleliswa epumalanga kapa nefreyistata.
ven: vha hashu,muvhuso washu nga kha muhasho wa mbambadzo na nḓowetshumo wo thoma ṱhuṱhuwedzo dzi na tshivhalo miṅwahani i si gathi yo fhiraho hu u itela u engedza vhubindudzi kha sekithara ya vhubveledzi nga mannḓa kha zwa malabi, mikumba na sekithara ya dzigoloi.

nbl: ngabuye ngamemezela umthethomlingwa wobunini benarha ozakubeka umkhawulo wobunini benarha ukufikela okungenani kumahekthara azii-12 000 begodu uzakukhandela amaphandle ukuba banini benarha.
ven: ho vha na mvelaphanḓa yo itwaho kha sekithara idzi.ṱhuṱhuwedzo ya sekithara ya dzigoloi yo kunga vhubindudzi hu fhiraho r25 biḽioni kha miṅwaha miṱanu yo fhiraho.

nbl: bazakuvunyelwa kwaphela ukuqatjha inarha isikhathi eside.
ven: khamphani dza tshaka dzo ṱanganelaho sa nestle, unilever samsung na hisense dzo vhona afrika tshipembe sa fhethu ha dzingu ḽa vhubveledzi.

nbl: umthethomtlamo womthethomlingwa lo uzakwethulwa kukhabinethi esiquntwini sokuthoma sonyaka.
ven: dzo engedza na u isa phanḓa na vhubveledzi kha puḽanti ntswa.

nbl: siye samemezela ukuvulwa kwethuba lokwenza iimbawo zenarha ebantwini abaphundwako ngonyaka we-1988.
ven: mvelaphanḓa yo vhaho hone kha vhubveledzi yo sumbedzisa vhukuma uri mbekanyamushumo dza ṱhuṱhuwedzo dzi a shuma na u kunga vhabindudzi.

nbl: isibalo seembawo zenarha esele zifakiwe gade zifikelela ee-130 000 ngonobayeni wanyakenye.
ven: vha hashu,ndo ḓivhadza mbekanyamushumo dza mvusuludzo ya zwa vhulimi mahoḽa.

nbl: bakwethu,njengalokha sazi, iimfunda ezihlanu, zithinteke khulu sisomiso, zona yitlhagwini tjhingalanga, kwazulu-natal, ifreyistata, i-limpopo nempumalanga.
ven: ro ḓivhadza mbekanyamushumo ya agri-parks, ndivho iya u engedza vhudzheneleli ha vhorabulasi vha sa athu bvelelaho kha zwa vhulimi.

nbl: lezi ziinkhathi ezibudisi kwamambala.
ven: mulangadzulo na mudzulatshidulo,tshanduko ya mavu i kha ḓi vha ya ndeme musi ri tshi khou ya phanḓa na u shandukisa zwithu.

nbl: mangithathe ithubeli ukubuka umzamo wemiphakathi, ngejima lokunikela ngamanzi, i- operation hydrate, nabanye ngokusiza imiphakathi etlhoga amanzi.
ven: mahoḽa ndo amba ngaha muhanga wa mbekanyamaitele ya 50/50, ine ya sumbedzisa pfanelo dzi elanaho kha vhathu vha dzulaho na u shuma mabulasini.

nbl: ukwakhiwa komthangalasisekelo wamanzi kuqakathekile bonyana sikhulise ukufumaneka kwamanzi kubantu bekhethu namabubulo.
ven: ho ṱanganedzwa makumedzwa a 27 ubva kha vhorabulasi vha rengiselaho mbuelo na uri makumedzwa maṋa a khou shumiswa ngei kapa vhukovhela na free state.

nbl: isigaba sokuthoma sephrojekthi i-mokolo and crocodile water augmentation e-lephalale ese-limpopo siyaraga.
ven: ndo dovha nda ḓivhadza ndango ya mulayotibe wa u fara mavu une wa ḓo takusela nṱha vhuṋe ha mavu uya kha egere dza 12 000 wa ḓo thivhela vhabvannḓa uri vha lange mavu.

nbl: izakunikela umthamo wamanzi wamakhyubikhimitha aziingidi ezima-30 ngomnyaka.
ven: vha ḓo kona u wana ḽizi dza tshifhinga tshilapfu.

nbl: ukukhuliswa komthangala wedamu le-clan william ngetjhingalanga kapa ngamamitha ali-13 kuzakusiza ngamanzi angezelelweko.
ven: mulayotibe wa mvetamveto u ḓo iswa kha khabinethe kha simesiṱa ya u thoma ya ṅwaha.

nbl: kuqakathekile ukugandelela bonyana isilinganiso somrholo selizwe loke kufuze sisetjenziswe ngendlela engazukuqalela phasi ukuvulwa kwemisebenzi, ituthuko yamabhizinisi amancani nanyana kuphazamise ukukhula komnotho okunzinzileko.
ven: gomelelo ḽine ḽa vha hone kha vhunzhi ha mavunḓu ashu a ḽi khou ri fara zwavhuḓi.

nbl: sikhuthazwa mibiko ebuya ku-nedlac ethi kuphethwa itlhatlha lokunzinzisa amamakethe wemisebenzi ngokwehlisa ubude besikhathi semitjhagalo nokuphelisa inturhu lokha nakunemitjhagalo.
ven: zwifuwo zwi khou fa na sekithara ya zwa vhulimi i khou konḓelwa vhukuma.

nbl: sizwile ngeminako yeenhlangano zabasebenzi ngesikhibelelo somthetho womthelo esele ngiwutlikitlele ukuba mthetho ngonobayeni, ngemva kokuphasiswa kwawo yipalamende.
ven: muvhuso u ḓo isa phanḓa na u thusa vhorabulasi khathihi na u isa tshumelo dza maḓi nga mathannge zwitshavhani.

nbl: urhulumende ukhulumisana ne-cosatu mayelana nendaba le begodu kusafunanwa nepengu.
ven: kha vhari ndi dzhie tshikhala itshi ndi khoḓe vhurangeli ha tshitshavha zwatsho, operation hydrate na dziṅwe kha thuso ya ṋetshedzo ya maḓi kha zwitshavha zwinzhi zwire kha mutsiko.

nbl: iragela phambili imikhulumiswano hlangana norhulumende, idoswa phambili mnyango wezokuthuthukiswa komphakathi neziko leemali zenarha, mayelana nokuqedelelwa komthethomgomo weembonelelo zezehlalakuhle.
ven: u fhaṱa themamveledziso ya maḓi zwi kha ḓi vha zwa ndeme uri ri kone u engedza tswikelelo kha vhathu vhashu na kha nḓowetshumo.

nbl: bakwethu,eminyakeni eyadlulako iziko lezeemayini gade liqalene nobudisi khulukhulu eendaweni zeplathinamu.
ven: luṱa lwa u thoma lwa thandela ya mokolo na crocodile water augmentation ngei vhuponi ha lephalale kha ḽa limpopo lu khou shuma lwa tshothe.

nbl: okhunye okuthabisako kezeemayini sivumelwano sabarholi sokuphulukisa imisebenzi esatlikitlwa babambisani bebubulo lezeemayini ngorhoboyi wee-2015.
ven: i ḓo ṋetshedza 30 miḽioni ya mithara dza khyubiki dza maḓi nga ṅwaha.

nbl: sikhuthaza amahlangothi ukuphumelelisa isivumelwano nokuragela phambili ukuphulukisa imisebenzi.
ven: u takuswa ha luvhondo lwa damu ḽa clan william ngei kapa vhukovhela zwi katela u takusa ḽeveḽe ya damu nga mithara dza 13 u itela u engedza ṋetshedzo ya maḓi.

nbl: sibawa amabhizinisi bonyana angarhabeli ukudiliza abantu nawaqalene nobudisi lokho kufuze kube siqunto sokugcina nasele kubhale koke.
ven: u fhelisa ndozwo ya maḓi, muhasho wa maḓi na vhuthatshili wo thoma mbekanyamushumo ya u pfumbudza vhaswa vha linganaho 15 000 sa vhatsila.

nbl: bakwethu,ngonyaka wee-2014 sahloma ijima le-operation phakisa eligandelela imiphumela ebonakalako nerhabako sayisebenzisa emikhakheni yomnotho welwandle, zamaphilo, zefundo nakezeemayini.
ven: mulangadzulo na mudzulatshidulo,kha u khwinisa vhushaka kha zwa mishumo, ri ṱanganedza thendelano yo swikelelwaho nga vhaḽedzani vha matshilisano kha nedlac kha mulayo wa miholo ya fhasisa ya lushaka.

nbl: kuthenjiswe amabhiliyoni alikhomba kunsetjenziswa ezitjha zamadoyelo ngemva kokwamukelwa kwetjhebiswano lombuso namakhampani wangeqadi lomthangalasisekelo wabaphathi bamadoyelo ngaphasi kwe-transnet.
ven: ndi zwa ndeme u khwaṱhisedza uri muholo wa fhasisa wa lushaka u shumiswe nga nḓila ine ya sa ḓo dzhiela fhasi tsiko ya kutholele, u bvelela ha mabindu maṱuku kana nyaluwo ya ikonomi i yaho phanḓa.

nbl: bakwethu, gade sitshwenyekile ngokuthi isewula afrika ayinankepe ekungezayo kanti sizombelezwe makhilomitha azii-3 000 zeendawo ezimagega nelwandle.
ven: ri khou dovha hafhu ra ṱuṱuwedzwa nga mivhigo ibvaho kha nedlac ya uri muhanga wa u dzikisa makete wa zwa vhashumi nga u fhungudza vhulapfu ha zwiṱereke na u fhelisa khakhathi nga tshifhinga tsha zwiṱereke u khou khunyeledzwa.

nbl: sizama ukurarulula isitjhijilwesi ngokusebenzisa umkhakha womnotho welwandle le-operation phakisa.
ven: ro pfa ngaha mbilaelo dza zwa mishumo ngaha mulayo wa khwinisedzo ya muthelo ye nda saina mulayoni nga nyendavhusiku, zwi tshi tevhela u phasiswa hawo phalamenndeni.

nbl: ngiyathaba bonyana iinkepe ezimbili ezithwala umthwalo omkhulu zitlolisiwe ebhayi kanti isikepe sesithathu sitloliswe ekapa ngaphasi kweflarha yesewula afrika.
ven: muvhuso u kha nyambedzano na cosathu ngaha fhungo iḽo na thandululo yo wanala.

nbl: enye ituthuko ekarisako ye-operation phakisa kube kuhlonywa kwesimumathi samafutha lapha ekapa okuzokungenisa iingidi ezima-r660.
ven: nyambedzano dzi khou ya phanḓa muvhusoni, dzo rangwa phanḓa nga muhasho wa mveledziso ya matshilisano na vhufaragwama ha lushaka, zwi tshi elana na u khunyeledza mbekanyamaitele ya vhutsireledzi ho engedzwaho ha matshilisano.

nbl: iimila zemanzini zibonakala ziyingcenye eqakathekileko yomnotho wemanzini ngaphasi kwe-operation phakisa.
ven: vha hashu,miṅwahani isi gathi yo fhiraho, sekithara yashu ya migodi yo vha isiho kha tshiimo tshavhuḓi nga mannḓa kha puḽatinamu.

nbl: amaplasi la asepumalanga kapa, kwazulu-natal, etjingalanga kapa netlhagwini kapa.
ven: ri dovha ra humbela hafhu kha mabindu uri u nothisa kana u fhelisa mishumo zwi songo vha yone thandululo musi vha tshi ṱangana na vhukonḓi.

nbl: siragela phambili nokukhuthaza ubukghwari ukuya ngokwehlelo lamaphuzu alithoba.
ven: vha hashu,nga 2014 ro thoma operation phakisa ine ya vha na maitele mahulwane a u ṱavhanyisa zwithu ra i shumisa kha ikonomi ya zwa lwanzhe, mutakalo, pfunzo na kha sekithara ya migodini.

nbl: umnyango wezesayensi netheknoloji uzakuphetha ukuhlonywa kwesikhwama esisekela amaqhinga, itjhebiswano lombuso namakhampani wangeqadi esinqophe ukungenisa imali namaqhinga womphakathi namabubulo wangeqadi.
ven: r7 biḽioni yo iswa kha zwiimiswa zwiswa zwa vhuimazwikepe, zwi tshi tevhela u ṱanganedzwa ha modele wa vhuḽedzani ha tshitshavha na phuraivethe wa mveledziso ya themamveledziso ya vhuimazwikepe nga manḓalanga a vhuimazwikepe ha lushaka ha transnet.

nbl: kubekelwe ngeqadi iingidi ezima-r740 esikhathini esiminyaka emithathu.
ven: iṅwe mvelaphanḓa yavhuḓi ya operation phakisa yo rwelwa ṱari ya tshiimiswa tsha u vhulunga fuele hanefha doroboni ya kapa, zwine zwa ḓisa vhubindudzi ha r660 miḽioni.

nbl: bakwethu,kunengi okwenziwako kezehlalakuhle emnyakeni odlulileko.
ven: zwibveledzwa zwa maḓini zwi khou sumbedzisa u vha sia ḽa nyaluwo ya ndeme kha khethekanyo ya operation phakisa ya lwanzhe.

nbl: urhulumende uphendulile eemalini ezitlhayeleko ngokungakhutjhulwa kwemali yabafundi emayunivesithi, njengokuvumelana emhlanganweni owabanjwa nabafundi neenhloko zamayunivesithi.
ven: vhubindudzi ha sekithara ya phuraivethe vhu yaho kha r350 000 ho iswa kha sekithara ya zwibveledzwa zwa maḓini.

nbl: ungqongqotjhe wezeemali uzakunikela imininingwane yemali ezokuvala isikhala sesikolodo sezefundo lokha nakethula ikulumo yesabelo seemali.
ven: mabulasi a ṱahe a zwibveledzwa izwo ono thoma u bveledza.

nbl: ngihlome ikomitjhini yokuphenya ezokudoswa lijaji ezokuphenya ngefundo ephakemeko.
ven: mabulasi aya a wanala kapa vhubvaḓuvha, kwazulu-natal, kapa vhukovhela na kapa devhula.

nbl: kezamaphilo, isikhathi sokuphila samasewula afrika abaduna nabasikazi sithuthuke ngokubonakalako njenganje sifikela eminyakeni ema-62 kibo boke ubulili, okuyikomba yoyesibalo esikhule ngeminyaka ebunane nesiquntu ukusukela ngonyaka wee-2005.
ven: muhasho wa saintsi na thekhinoḽodzhi u ḓo khunyeledza tshikwama tshihulwane tsha tshanduko ya mveledziso, vhuḽedzani ha tshitshavha na phuraivethe vhu ḓo sedza kha mbuelo dza tshanduko ya mveledziso zwi bvaho kha mihumbulo ya sekithara dza tshitshavha na dza phuraivethe.

nbl: umthethomgomo wokuqalana nengogwana yentumbantonga (i-hiv) wee-2009 wadosela ekusatjalalisweni kokuhlolelwa umulwana nokulatjhwa kwabantu abazii-3.2 abanomulwana.
ven: muvhuso u ḓo ṱavhanyisa luṱa lwa u thoma lwa u phaḓaladzwa ha burodibennde ine ya ḓo ḓumanya zwiimiswa zwa muvhuso zwi fhiraho 5000 kha zwiṱiriki zwa masipala zwa malo kha tshikhala tsha miṅwaha miraru.

nbl: lokhu kusize khulu bonyana labo abatshwayelekileko baphile kuhle isikhathi eside.
ven: ho ṋetshedzwa masheleni a ndambedzo a linganaho r740 miḽioni ane a ḓo shumiswa kha miṅwaha miraru iyo.

nbl: sithokoza ukufakwa kwesandla batjhebisani bomkhandlu wenarha wentumbantonga wesewula afrika edoswa phambili lisekela likamengameli.
ven: vha hashu,ho itwa mushumo munzhi kha sekithara ya matshilisano kha ṅwaha wo fhiraho.

nbl: igadango elilandelako kuvuselela amajima wokuvikela khulukhulu hlangana nelutjha.
ven: muvhuso wo fhindula kha u tsela fhasi ha masheleni ho takuwaho ubva kha u sa ya nṱha ha mbadelo dza yunivesithi, sa zwo tendelanwaho muṱanganoni na matshudeni na vhathusa dzikhantselara mahoḽa.

nbl: ngiyathaba ukumemezela bonyana ikhampani yeenhlahla yombuso, i-ketlaphela seyihlonyiwe.
ven: minisiṱa wa gwama vha ḓo ṋetshedza zwidodombedzwa zwa u tsela fhasi ha masheleni kha zwa pfunzo kha tshipitshi tsha mugaganyagwama.

nbl: bakwethu,amakhetho karhulumende wekhaya azakubanjwa eenyangeni ezintathu ngemva komhla ali-18 kumrhayili, ekulilanga lamakhetho adlulako.
ven: ri ṱuṱuwedza vhashumisani na riṋe vhoṱhe uri vha tevhedzele na u pfa khomishini kha u thusa uri hu vhe na mvelaphanḓa.

nbl: iqhinga lethu lokubuyela emirajini ekuvuseleleni urhulumende wekhaya lahlonywa ngokhukhulamungu wee-2014 kanti unyaka wee-2015 gade kumnyaka wokuphunyeleliswa kwalo.
ven: kha zwa mutakalo, ndavhelelo ya vhutshilo ha muthu kha vhadzulapo vha afrika tshipembe kha vhoṱhe vhanna na vhafumakadzi yo khwinifhala na uri i kha minwaha ya 62 kha mbeu dzoṱhe, ine ya vha nyengedzeo ya miṅwaha ya malo na hafu u bva 2005. mbekanyamaitele ya hiv ya 2009 yo ita uri hu vhe na nyalafho na u itwa ndingo ha vhathu vha linganaho 3.2 miḽioni vhane vho kavhiwa nga tshitzhili.

nbl: esigabeni sesibili sokuphunyeleliswa, urhulumende welizwe loke uzakungezelela iindlela zokutjhejisisa nokuziphendulela.
ven: izwi zwo ita uri hu vhe na mutakalo na vhutshilo ha tshifhinga tshilapfu kha avho vho kavhiwaho.

nbl: kutlanywe iqhinga lamaphuzu ali-10 wokubuyela emirajini elitjhejwaqangi ukuhlahla isigaba lesi esilandelako.
ven: ri livhuwa u shela mulenzhe ha vhaḽedzani na rine kha khantsele ya aids ya lushaka ya afrika tshipembe ine ya rangwa phanḓa nga mufarisa phuresidennde.ḽiga ḽashu ḽi tevhelaho ndi u vusuludza mafulo a u thivhela nga mannḓa kha vhaswa.

nbl: iqhinga leli lifaka hlangana ukukhuthazwa kokukhulumisana nemiphakathi okuyinto eqakatheke khulu ukusiza imiphakathi ukuletha imibiko ngepatho abayifumana kurhulumende wemakhaya.
ven: minisiṱa wa mutakalo hu si kale vha ḓo ḓivhadza ngaha fulo ḽihulwane maelana na izwi.

nbl: ngikhe ngaba nethuba lokukhulumisana nabantu erenke yamateksi neembhesi emarabastata ngomvulo ngakhulumisana nabathengisa eendleleni kunye nabakhweli beenthuthi.
ven: ndi pfa ndo takala hafhu musi ndi tshi ḓivhadza ngaha khamphani ya mishonga i langwaho nga muvhuso ine ya pfi ketlaphela, yo thomiwaho.

nbl: bafuna umasipala wetshwane ahlwengise indawo leya nokulungisa amaphayiphi aphukileko akhambisa indle.
ven: khamphani iyi i ḓo dzhenelela kha ṋetshedzo ya philisi ya antirethirovairaḽa kha muhasho wa mutakalo ubva nga ṅwaha wa muvhalelano wa 2016/17.

nbl: abathengisi bathi bafuna iinkghudlhwana zokuthengisela begodu bazimisele ukubhadela.
ven: honeha, nḓivhadzamulayotibe kha ndindakhombo ya mutakalo wa lushaka (nhi) yo bva nga nyendavhusiku hu tshi itelwa u khwinisa ndondola mutakalo kha mudzulapo muṅwe na muṅwe wa afrika tshipembe.

nbl: bangiyelelise bonyana abantu abanengi e-elandspoort bafumana izindlu ze-rdp kodwana kunokobana bangene bahlale ngakizo bayazithengisa nanyana baziqatjhisele abanye abantu.
ven: vha hashu,khetho dza muvhuso wapo dzi ḓo vha hone vhukati ha miṅwedzi miraru nga murahu ha dzi 18 shundunthule, datumu ya u fhedza ya khetho.

nbl: umma ubaloyi onesikghudlhwana sokuthengisela ulile ngabeswa abakhokha i-nyaope bonyana bayabebela.
ven: ri tama vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vhane vha vha na miṅwaha ya nṱha ha 18 uri vha ṅwalisele u voutha kha mafhelo a vhege a u thoma a u ṅwalisa nga dzi 5 na dzi 6 ṱhafamuhwe 2016. ri ṱuṱuwedza na vhaswa vhane vha khou fara miṅwaha ya 18 ṋaṅwaha, uri vha ṅwalise lwa u tou thoma uri vha kone u voutha.

nbl: abanye abakhweli bathe kufuze ngivakatjhele ekwaggafontein, indawo yesabelo sangaphambilini sakwandebele ngibone ukutlhayela kokulethwa kwezenzelo.
ven: pulane yashu ya u vusuludza ya muvhuso wapo ya u humela kha zwa mutheo yo rwelwa ṱari nga khubvumedzi 2014 na uri ṅwaha wa 2015 wo vha ṅwaha wa u shuma ro khwaṱhisa.

nbl: ngikghonile ukukhuluma nezakhamuzi zamanye amazwe abathe bajama umjeje qobelanga ukwenza iimbawo zamaphepha emnyangweni wezangekhaya.
ven: izwi zwi katela madalo a u ya kha mimasipala hu songo ḓivhadzwa, u sedzuluswa ha maitele a ndango ya supply chain, u shumiswa ha khwaṱhisedzo dza mivhigo ya forensiki, u dalela dzisaithi dza thandela dzo lambedzwaho nga magavhelo a themamveledziso ya masipala, na u engedza vhudzheneleli ha u thusa masipala ine ya khou kundelwa.

nbl: sizakuragela phambili nokuvakatjhela imiphakathi nokulalela iminako yabo nemibonwabo.
ven: maga a dzhielwaho nṱha a pulane ya mbuno dza 10 ya u humela kha zwa mutheo o bveledzwa uri a konise luṱa lutevhelaho.

nbl: iindaba abazivezako zizakulandelelwa minyango ethintekako.
ven: pulane i katela u khwiniswa ha vhudzheneleli ha tshitshavha, zwine zwa vha zwa ndeme kha u konisa zwitshavha uri zwi ṋetshedze muvhigo ngaha tshenzhemo yavho ya muvhuso wapo.

nbl: bakwethu,ibutho lamaipholisa wesewula afrika (i-saps) siletha amatjhuguluko begogodu sisebenzisa umgomo wokubuyela emirajini kubalawuli ukuvuselela iziko leli nokuthuthukisa ukusebenza kwazo zoke iintetjhi ezingasebenzi kuhle.
ven: ndo ya nda mona mona na rennge ya mabasi na dzithekhisi ya marabastad ngei pretoria nga musumbuluwo nda amba na vharengisi na vhaṋameli.

nbl: sitjhejile ngokudana amapholisa ama-57 abuleweko ukufikela gadesi enyakeni weemali wee-2015/16.
ven: vhunzhi ha mbialelo dzo ṱahiswaho dzi elana na tshumelo dza masipala.

nbl: sikhuthaza amapholisa ukuzivikela nakasahlelwako.
ven: vha tama masipala wa tshwane u tshi kulumaga na u lugisa phaiphi dza soredzhi dzo phamuwaho.

nbl: lokhu bakwenze ngokulandela umthetho.
ven: vharengisi vhari vhone vho dzula vho luga na uri vha ya ṱoḓa u badela tshumelo.

nbl: bakwethu,inarhakazi ye-afrika ihlala iqakathekile kumithethomgomo yethu yezangaphandle.
ven: vho mmbudza uri vhunzhi ha vhathu vha elandspoort vha wana nnḓu dza rdp fhedzi nṱhani ha uri vha dzule khadzo, vha ya dzirengisa kana vha hirisa vhaṅwe vhathu.

nbl: isewula afrika iragela phambili nokusekela ukuthula nokuvikeleka kwesifunda se-afrika nokuhlanganyelwa emnothweni ehlanganweni yobunye be-afrika (i-au) nehlangano yokuthuthukisa imiphakathi ese-afrika engesewula (i-sadc).
ven: vho mme baloyi vha na makete wavho, vha vhilaedzwa nga vhathu vhane vhadaha tshidzidzivhadzi tsha nyaope vhane vha tswela vharengisi thundu dzavho.

nbl: siye saraga ngokusiza amazwe esinesikhozi nawo ekurarululeni ukurarana abanakho njengelesotho ne-south sudan.
ven: vhaṅwe vha vhanameli vhori ndi tea u dalela kwaggafontein he ha vha kale hu kwandebele uri ndi vhone u shayea ha ṋetshedzo ya tshumelo.

nbl: bazokutjengisa amakghono wabo ebhayi ukuthoma nakali-13 ukuya nkama-21 kumhlolanja, kugidingwa ilanga lamajoni wepi.
ven: ndo kona hafhu nda dovha u amba na vhabvannḓa vhe vha amba uri vha fola miduba ḓuvha na ḓuvha vha tshi ita khumbelo dza maṅwalo kha muhasho wa zwa muno.

nbl: i-china yamemezela itjalomali lamabhiliyoni ama-r50 usd lapho isewula afrika izokuhlomula ngamabhiliyoni ali-r10 usd yomthangalasisekelo, ukuvuselela amabubulo nokuthuthukiswa kwamakghonofundwa.
ven: ri ḓo isa phanḓa na u dalela zwitshavha uri ri pfe mbialelo dzavho na makumedzwa.

nbl: mayelana netjhebiswano letlhagwini nesewula, nehlangano yobunye beyuropu (i-eu) okumamazwe esitjhebisana nawo khulu ngezerhwebo netjalomali.
ven: mbilaelo dzine za ḓo ṱahiswa nga tshifhinga tsha madalo dzi ḓo shumanwa nadzo nga mihasho yo teaho.

nbl: amakhampani wamazwe we-eu angaphezu kwee-2000 asebenza ngesewula afrika avule imisebenzi engaphezu kwee-350 000. itjhebiswano lesewula afrika ne-usa ne-canada liyaraga nokuqina khulukhulu kezomnotho, zamaphilo, zefundo, amandla, amanzi, ukuphepha nokuvikeleka, ukukhulisa amakghono nokusekela abomma kezomnotho.
ven: vha hashu,tshumelo ya mapholisa ya afrika tshipembe i kha tshifhinga tsha tshanduko na uri yo ṱanganedza maitele a u humela kha zwa mutheo uri vhalangi vha kone u fhaṱulula dzangano na u khwinisa kushumele kha zwiṱitshi zwa mapholisa zwoṱhe zwi sa shumiho zwavhuḓi.

nbl: ukuvuselelwa nokwandiswa komthetho wethuba lokukhula kwe-afrika (i-agoa) kunikela ikundla yokuqinisa amabubulo nokuhlanganyela kwesifunda se-afrika.
ven: u swika zwino ho no lovha mapholisa a 57 kha ṅwaha wa muvhalelano wa 2015/16.

nbl: zoke iingcenyana ezisaleleko ze-agoa ziyatjhejwa.
ven: ri lwa na zwiito zwa vhugevhenga nga nḓila khulwane.

nbl: bakwethu,sidlulisela iimfiselakuhle zethu kibo boke abagijimi abalungelwe ukuya emidlalweni ye-olimphikhi ezokubanjelwa e-rio de janeiro.
ven: ri ṱuṱuwedza mapholisa uri vha ḓilwele musi vha tshi ṱhaselwa, nga nḓila ya mulayo.

nbl: sikhuthaza boke ababambindima emahlelweni ahlukeneko anqophe ukukhuthaza ipilo ehle nokukwakhana kwesitjhaba.
ven: vha hashu,dzhango ḽa afrka ḽi kha ḓi vha senthara kha vhudzheneleli ha mbekanyamaitele ya mashango a nnḓa.

nbl: lokhu kufaka hlangana ilanga lenarha lokuzithabisa, ilanga lemidlalo namasiko likanelson mandela.
ven: afrika tshipembe ḽi khou isa phaḓa na u tikedzza mulalo na vhutsireledzi na ṱhanganyelo ya ikonomi ya dzingu nga kha u shela mulenzhe kha mbumbano ya afrika na vhurangeli ha tshitshavha tsha mveledziso ya tshipembe ha afrika.

ven: a hu khou tea u vha na tshilengo na u humiselana murahu zwi songo tea.

nbl: njenganje iinkolo ezitjha ezima-895 zinikela abantabethu indawo enobujamo obuvumako bokufundela.

nbl: ukusukela ekunikeleni amalaysensi nama-visa, kufanele senze kube lula ukuvula ibhizinisi esewula afrika.
ven: ri khou ṱuṱuwedzwa nga mvelelo dza ndingo dza u fhedzisela dza dzitshakatshaka.

nbl: sikhuthazwa miphumela yamhlapha yeentjhabatjhaba.
ven: kha mashango o dzhenelelaho, afrika tshipembe ḽo sumbedzisa khwinifhadzo khulwanesa nga phoindi dza 87 dza mbalo na dza 90 kha saintsi.

nbl: hlangana namazwe ahlanganyelako, isewula afrika itjengise ukukhuphuka kwemiphumela okubonakalako ngamaphuzu ama-87% esifundweni sembalonamaphuzu ama-90% kesesayensi.
ven: hezwi zwi a ṱuṱuwedza vhukuma, vhunga ri sa ṱoḓi vhana vhashu vha tshi salela murahu.

nbl: lokhu kukhuthaza khulu ngombana asifuni abantabethu basalele emva.
ven: vhubindudzi hashu kha saintsi na thekhinoḽodzhi vhu khou aṋwa mitshelo.

nbl: isisomali lethu kezesayensi nethekhnoloji litjengisa imiphumela emihle.
ven: u bva tshe afrika tshipembe ḽa wina bidi ya u fara theḽesikoupu ya square kilometre array (ska), ḽo tikwa nga vhafarani naḽo vha mashango a malo, ho no vha na mvelaphanḓa i vhonalaho kha u fhaṱa thandela khulwane dza saintsi na u kaṋa mbuelo dzayo.

nbl: selokhu isewula afrika, ngokusekelwa batjhebisani bayo be-afrika ababunane, yathumba imvumo yokuba msingathi wetheleskophu ye-square kilometre array (i-ska), sele kube neragelophambili eliqakathekileko ekwakheni lephrojekthi ekulukazi yesayensi nokuzuza ngemiphumela yayo.
ven: thandela ya ska i khou isa phanḓa na u shela mulenzhe kha mveledziso ya ikonomi afrika tshipembe yo ṱangana na theḽesikoupu ya meerkat.

nbl: ngokuhlanganyela netheleskophu eyandulelako ekuyi-meerkat, iphrojekthi ye-ska iyaraga ngokusiza okuqakathekileko etuthukweni yezomnotho nezehlalakuhle esewula afrika.
ven: muhasho wa saintsi na thekhinoḽodzhi, une wa khou shuma tshoṱhe na nḓowetshumo, u khou thoma maano a thekhinoḽodzhi yapo.

nbl: ngokusebenzisana nebubulweli, umnyango wezesayensi nethekhnoloji uhloma iqhinga lobunini bethekhnoloji ngelizweni.
ven: hezwi zwo vhona uri theḽesikopu ya meerkat yo ḓuraho r2 biḽioni i fhaṱwe ho shumiswa zwishumiswa zwapo zwi linganaho 75%.

nbl: lokhu kuqinisekise itheleskophu ye-meerkat ebize amabhiliyoni amabili wamaranda bonyana ama-75% wayo kwakhiwe zizandla zangekhaya.
ven: izwi zwo ita uri hu sikwe mishumo ngei kapa devhula na u fhambana ha ikonomi nga kha u sikwa ha mishumo ya vhatsila na u lugisa, na u khwisiwa ha saintsi sa buḓo ḽine wa tou ḓikhethela iwe muṋe.

nbl: mayelana nomthangalasisekelo weendlela, i-sanral ithomile ngesigaba sokuhlela sephrojekthi yamabhiliyoni ama-r4.5 yokukhulisa indlela ye-moloto.
ven: kha themamveledziso ya bada, sanral yo thoma u pulana luṱa lwa thandela ya r4.5 biḽioni ya u khwinisa bada ya moloto.

nbl: sikhulisa indlela ye-moloto besakha isiporo sesitimela kobana kuphephe amaphilo wabantu njengombana iingozi sezidlule namaphilo wabantu abanengi kileyandawo.
ven: hu khou shumiwa bada ya moloto na tshiporo zwazwino hu tshi itelwa tsireledzo kha vhashumisi vha bada na u fhelisa khombo dza badani dzi dzhiaho matshilo a vhathu vhanzhi.

nbl: ngomnyaka wee-2016 isewula afrika yatlikitla isivumelwano setjhebiswano ne-people’s republic of china (i-prc) ngomnqopho wokwakha isiporo sesitimela se-moloto.
ven: nga 2016, afrika tshipembe ḽo saina mulanga wa tshumisano na vhathu vha peoples republic of china (prc) wa u fhaṱa mveledziso ya tshiporo tsha moloto.

nbl: ngomnyaka wee-2014 sahloma i-operation phakisa big fast results methodology emnothweni welwandle, zamaphilo, zefundo eni weemayini.
ven: nga 2014, ro thoma maitele a mvelelo khulu dziṱavhanyaho a operation phakisa kha sekithara ya ikonomi ya maḓanzhe, mutakalo, pfunzo na kha zwa migodi.

nbl: umnqopho kufumana amaphrojekthi ambalwa aqakathekileko lapho singatjhaphulula ukukhula komnotho ekuhlomeni i-ndp.
ven: ndivho khulwane ya izwi ho vha hu u itela u wana thandela dza ndeme dzi si gathi hune ra nga vula nyaluwo kha u thomiwa ha ndp.

nbl: ibutho lamajoni wemanzini lesewula afrika nalo lafaka isandla kuphrojekthi ye-operation phakisa begodu lilungiselela ukuhloma iziko lombuso lokubulungela iinkebhe e-simon’s town, kufaka hlangana ukutjheja nokulungisa iinkebhe zombuso ngetjhebiswano elitlanywe mhlapha lebutho lamajoni wemanzini/i-armscor ne-denel.
ven: vha navy ya afrika tshipembe na vhone vho dzhenelela kha thandela ya operation phakisa na uri vha khou ḓidzudzanyela u vha ṋemuṱa wa zwa fhethu ha garatshi ya muvhuso vha tshi itela ngalavha dza muvhuso ngei simon’s town, hu tshi katelwa vhalugisi vha ngalavha dzoṱhe dza muvhuso, nga kha vhufarani vhuswa ho thomiwaho ha navy ya afrika tshipembe /armscor/denel.

nbl: sitshwaye zevakatjhobukelo njengomthombo wokuvula imisebenzi.
ven: ro topola vhuendelamashango sa tshone tshitshimbidzi tsha ndeme tsha mishumo.

nbl: siyathaba bonyana iimbalo zeenthekeli ezifikako esikhathini sikatjhirhweni ukufikela kusinyikhaba ngomnyaka wee-2016 sikhule safika eengidini ezilithoba okutjho ukukhula okungaphezulu kwesigidi nakumadaniswa nangomnyaka wee-2015.
ven: zwo ralo ro takalela uri tshivhalo tsha vhaendelamashango vha ḓaho fhano u bva nga phando u swika lara 2016 tsho engedzea u ya kha miḽioni dza ṱahe, zwine zwa vha nyengedzedzo i fhiraho miḽioni u bva 2015. izwi zwi sumbedzisa nyaluwo nga 13% ya vhaendelamashango vho dalaho.

nbl: lokhu kutjengisa ukukhula ngama-13% weenthekeli ezifikako.
ven: muvhuso u tshimbidza mbekanyamushumo dza u fhelisa vhushai dzi shumaho vhukuma, dzi ngaho mbekanyamushumo dza mishumo ya tshitshavha yo engedzwaho (epwp).

nbl: urhulumende ulawula ihlelo eliqinileko lokulwisana nomtlhago njengehlelo lokunatjiswa kwemisebenzi yomphakathi (i-epwp).
ven: zwiṅwe hafhu, magavhelo zwazwino a khou wanwa nga vhathu vha 17 miḽioni, nga mannḓa vhaaluwa na vhana.

nbl: ukusukela ngomnyaka wee-2014 i-epwp ivule amathuba wemisebenzi angaphezu kweengidi ezimbili, kanti kunqotjhwe ukufikelelwa emathubeni wemisebenzi aziingidi ezisithandathu ekupheleni kukantaka wee-2019.
ven: u bva nga 2014, epwp yo sika zwikhala zwa mishumo zwi fhiraho miḽioni mbili zwi tshi iswa kha u swikelela tshipikwa tsha zwikhala zwa mishumo ya miḽioni dza rathi mafheloni a ṱhafamuhwe 2019. kha zwikhala zwa mishumo yo sikwaho, zwi fhiraho miḽioni zwo dzhiiwa nga vhaswa.

nbl: emathubeni wemisebenzi avuliweko engaphezulu kwesigidi kwazuza lilutjha.
ven: nga 2015/2016, ho sikwa zwikhala zwa mishumo zwi fhiraho 61 000 nga kha mbekanyamushumo dza mupo sa u shuma maḓini, u shuma madzhesini, u shuma muliloni na u shuma nga sisiṱeme ya vhushaka ha zwi tshilaho na zwi sa tshili.

nbl: eminyakeni yee-2015/16, kwavulwa amathuba wemisebenzi engaphezu kwee-61 000 ngamahlelo wezebhoduluko njengele-working for water, i-working for wetlands, i-working on fire ne-working for ecosystems.
ven: vhaswa vha fhiraho 60% ndi vhone vho vhuelwaho nga kha mbekanyamushumo idzi.

nbl: abazuzi abangaphezulu kwama-60% kwaba lilutjha.
ven: muvhuso, u tshi khou shumisana na tshitshavha u khou lwisana na zwiito zwo bvaho zwine zwa khou kwashekanya zwitshavha zwashu, sa u shumiswa ha zwidzidzivhadzi nga nḓila i si yone.

nbl: urhulumende ngokusebenzisana nomphakathi ulwisana nezenzo ezimbi nezihlubayezako kezehlalakuhle emphakathini, ngeendakamizwa namarhugu.
ven: u bva soshanguve u ya rosettenville kana kwamashu u ya cape flats, vhadzulapo vha khakhathini nga nṱhani ha zwidzidzivhadzi.

nbl: ukusuka esoshanguve ukuya e-rosettenville ngahlanye kwamashu ukufikela e-cape flats, imiphakathi isebudisini ngonobangela weendakamizwa.
ven: nga nnḓa ha vha mbofho ya mulayo, tshumelo ya ṋetshedzo ya dzilafho na thivhelo ndi ya ndeme.

nbl: ngaphandle kokusebenzisa umthetho, kuqakathekile ukunikela ngemitjhoga nokuvikela.
ven: muhasho wa mveledziso ya matshilisano u khou fhaṱa senthara ntswa dza u lafhela mavunduni hune zwiimiswa izwo zwa sa vhe hone, ngei kapa devhula, devhula vhukovhela, limpopo, free state na kapa vhubvaḓuvha.

nbl: ngokusebenzisana sizakukghona ukuphulukisa ilutjha lethu ebukghobeni beendakamizwa.
ven: nga u shuma roṱhe ri ḓo phulusa vhaswa vhashu kha zwidzidzivhadzi.

nbl: mayelana nezamaphilo, itjhorensi yezamaphilo yelizweloke (i-nhi) iyiphrojekthi yethu elingwako enqophe ukusiza isewula afrika ifikelele kutjhorensi yezokwelatjhwa yelizweloke.
ven: kha zwa mutakalo, ndindakhombo ya mutakalo ya lushaka (nhi) ndi thandela yashu khulwane ine yo sedza kha u bveledza afrika tshipembe phanḓa kha uri hu vhe na mukatelo wa mutakalo wa ḽifhasi.

nbl: i-nhi izokuhlonywa esikhathini esiminyaka eli-14 ngeengaba ezintathu.
ven: nhi i ḓo thoma u shuma kha miṅwaha ya 14 nga kha zwipiḓa zwiraru.

nbl: siphakathi kwesigaba sokuthoma, ekusigaba sokuzilungiselela, esithome ngomnyaka wee-2012.
ven: ri kati na u shumana na luṱa lwa u thoma, lune lwa vha lwa ndugiselo, lwo thomaho nga 2012. vhafunashango,ro vhaiswa vhukuma nga u fhira shangoni ha vhalwadze vha muhumbulo kha ḽa gauteng.

nbl: bakwethu,sibuhlungu khulu ngokuhlongakala kwesibalo esingaka sabantu ebebagula ngokomkhumbulo be-gauteng.
ven: ndo vhudza minisiṱa wa mutakalo uri themendelo dzo itwaho nga ṋenḓila vhukati ha muvhuso na tshitshavha dzi thome u shumiswa nga u ṱavhanya.

nbl: iingulani ezigula ngokomkhumbulo ziyingcenye yabantu ababogabogako emphakathini, abatlhoga ukuvikelwa mbuso ngokwawo nomphakathi woke.
ven: ri ṱanganedza themendelo ya ṋenḓila vhukati ha muvhuso na tshitshavha tsha zwa mutakalo ya uri hu na ṱhoḓea ya u sedzulusa hafhu mulayo wa mutakalo wa lushaka, 2003 (mulayo 61 wa 2003) na mulayo wa ndondolo ya mutakalo wa muhumbulo, 2002 (mulayo 17 wa 2002) muhumbulo muhulwane u wa uri ndango na miṅwe mishumo i ye kha minisiṱa wa mutakalo.

nbl: ngiyalele ungqongqotjhe wezamaphilo ukuqinisekisa bonyana iintjhukumiso zomlamuli kezamaphilo ziyasetjenziswa zoke, msinyana nangaphandle kokuzaza.
ven: zwiṅwe hafhu, ri livhisa ndiliso dzashu nga mbilu vhuṱungu kha miṱa yoṱhe na mashaka a vho ri siaho.

nbl: samukela isitjhukumiso somlamuli kezamaphilo bonyana kunesidingo esirhabako sokubuyekeza umthetho wezamaphilo welizweloke wee-2003 (umthetho nomboro 61 wee-2003) nomthetho wobulwele bomkhumbulo wee- 2002 (umthetho nomboro 17 wee-2002) kobana amanye amagunya nemisebenzi ibuyele ngaphasi kwelawulo likangqongqotjhe wezamaphilo.
ven: muvhuso u ḓo isa thikhedzo uri miṱa iyi isa hwale mutsiko nga yoṱhe.

nbl: undunakulu we-gauteng nongqongqotjhe wezamaphilo sele banikele imindeni isiqinisekwesi.
ven: mulangavundu wa gauteng na minisiṱa wa mutakalo vho no ṋetshedza pfuluphedziso iyi.

nbl: abongqongqotjhe bazokunikela imininingwana edephileko ngesikhathi samavowudu wesabelo seemali.
ven: dziminisiṱa dzi ḓo ṋetshedza muvhigo nga ha mbekanyamushumo idzo kha vouthu ya mugaganyagwama.

nbl: u-oliver tambo wakhuluma ngokuhlathulukileko ngalomsebenzi emhlanganweni wokugidinga umnyaka we-south african communist party (i-sacp) e-london ngomnyaka we-1981.
ven: mbofholowo ya polotiki yone iṋe a i vhi yo khunyelelaho hu sina mbofholowo ya ikonomi.

nbl: wathi:“umnqopho womzabalazo wethu esewula afrika ohlathululwe emtlolweni wekululeko, ufaka hlangana ikululeko yezomnotho.
ven: vho oliver tambo vho amba vhe khagala nga ha mushumo uyu kha muṱangano wa anivesari ya ḽihoro ḽa makomunisi a afrika tshipembe ngei london nga 1981. vho ri:“ndivho ya nndwa yashu afrika tshipembe, sa zwe zwa sumbedzwa ngaho nga thendelonzwiwa ya mbofholowo, i katela mbofholowo ya ikonomi.

nbl: akuzwakali bonyana ikululeko iqakatheke ngaphandle kokubuyisela umnotho welizwe kibo boke abantu.“ukuvumela abaphethe umnotho gadesi ukutjheja amakareko wabo kufana nokusekela umrabhu wesiqhema esiba ngaphezulu kwesinye ngokobutjhaba nokudlelezela begodu lokhu akufani nekululeko.“kulitshwayo nesisekelo seqhinga lethu bonyana ipumelelo kufuze ifake hlangana ngaphezu kwepolotiki yentando yenengi.
ven: mbofholowo a i ambi tshithu arali hu si na lupfumo lu wanalaho kha shango lu tshi ya kha vhathu nga u angaredza.“u tendela maano a ikonomi ya zwino i tshi isa phanḓa na u khwaṱhisa dzangalelo ḽao ndi u i fha maanḓa a u dzula kha ndango na u ri tambudza, na u ri a zwi vhuyi zwa sumbedza hu na mbofholowo.“zwo ralo ndi zwa ndeme uri maano a gundo ḽashu a vhe na zwi fhirisaho demokirasi ya polotiki.

nbl: ijima lethu lokutjhaphulula ilizwe kufuze lifake ikululeko yezomnotho.”sinqophe ini nasikhuluma ngamatjhuguluko wezehlalakuhle newezomnotho adephileko?
ven: na uri mushumo une ra khou ita wa u vhofholola lushaka u tea u katela mbofholowo ya ikonomi.”ri tshi ri tshanduko yo fhelelaho ya ikonomi ya matshilisano ri vha ri tshi khou amba mini?

nbl: sinqophe amatjhuguluko asisekelo kusakhiwo, amahlelo, amaziko namaphetheni wobunini, ukuphatha nokulawula umnotho ehlangothini lawo woke amasewula afrika, khulukhulu abatlhagako inengi labo bomma nabantu abanzima, njengokuhlathulula kwehlangano ebusako, ekungiyo eyenza umthethokambiso karhulumende wentando yenengi.
ven: ri vha ri tshi khou amba nga ha tshanduko ya ndeme kha zwivhumbeo, dzisisiṱeme, zwiimiswa na phetheni ya vhuṋe, vhulangi na ndango ya ikonomi zwine zwa vhuedza maafrika tshipembe vhoṱhe, nga maanḓa vha shayaho, vhane vhunzhi havho ndi vharema vha vhafumakadzi, sa zwo ambiwaho nga ḽihoro ḽivhusi, ḽi itaho mbekanyamaitele dza muvhuso wa demokirasi.

nbl: ngemva kweminyaka ema-22 yekululeko yethu nentando yenengi, inengi labantu abanzima basadinywe amathuba kezomnotho.
ven: kha miṅwaha ya 22 ya mbofholowo na demokirasi yashu, vhunzhi ha vharema a vha athu vha na ndango ya ikonomi.

nbl: abakaneli ngenzuzo eyafika nekululeko.
ven: avha athu fushea nga zwiḓaho na mbofholowo ya ikonomi.

nbl: umehluko phakathi kwemirholo yomnyaka erholiswaimindeni yabanzima nerholiswa imindeni yabamhlophe mkhulu ngokusabekako.
ven: phambano ire hone vhukati ha muholo u wanwaho miṱani ya vharema na vhatshena i kha ḓi mangadza vhukuma.

nbl: ukuya ngeziko leembalobalo lesewula afrika (i-statistics sa), imizi yabamhlophe irhola okubuyelelwe kahlanu ngaphezu kwemizi yabanzima.
ven: miṱa ya vhatshena i wana miholo i fhiraho ya vharema kaṱanu, u ya nga mbalombalo ya afrika tshipembe.

nbl: ubujamo mayelana nobunini bezomnotho busitjengiso sengeniso yemindeni.
ven: nyimele malugana na vhuṋe ha ikonomi i fana na ya miholo ya miṱani.10% ya khamphani dza 100 dza nṱhesa kha tshiimiswa tsha thengiselano ya ndaka dzi langwa nga vharema vha afrika tshipembe, dzine dzo swikelela nga kha mulayo wa u manḓafhadzwa ha vharema, u ya nga ndambedzo ya u manḓafhadzwa ha lushaka.

nbl: ama-10% kwaphela kumakhamphani ali-100 amakhamphani atloliswe e-johannesburg stock exchange alawulwa babantu abanzima besewula afrika, nabo abaphumelele ngokwamakhowudi wokwabelwa kwabanzima amandla wezomnotho ukuya ngokwesikhwama sokunikela amandla sesitjhaba (i-nef).
ven: phimo ya tshanduko ya mveledziso mishumoni, u shumiswa ha mbekanyamaitele ya ndinganyiso sa zwine zwa ṱoḓiswa zwone nga mulayo wa ndinganyo ya u thola, 1998 (mulayo 55 wa 1998) i kha ḓi ongolowa vhukuma.

nbl: ibelo lamatjhuguluko emisebenzini, ukusetjenziswa kwemithethomgomo yokunikelwa amandla kezomnotho njengokulayela komthetho wokuqatjha ngokulingana we-1998 (umthetho nomboro 55 we-1998) ukhamba kabuthaka.
ven: u ya nga vhuṱanzi ho ṋetshedzwaho khomishini ya ndinganyo ya u thola nga 2015/16, vhatshena vha khou vhonala vha kha maimo a vhulangi ha nṱha vhukuma nga 72% ngeno maafrika vha tshi kha 10%.

nbl: ukuya ngelwazi lomnyaka wee-2015/16 elithunyelwe yikomitjhini yezokuqatjha ngokulingana, inani labamhlophe emazingeni wokuphatha aphakemeko lifika ema-72% kanti abanzima bali-10%.
ven: makhaḽadi vha khou vhonala vha tshi kha ḓi vha kha 4.5% ngeno maindia vha kha 8.7%.

nbl: umbiko uhlathulula bonyana amasewula afrika amhlophe, khulukhulu abaduna, banikelwa amathuba wokuqatjhwa asezingeni eliphakemeko, ukukhutjhulwa eenkhundleni namathuba wokubandulwa nabamadaniswa nabantu abebadinywe amathuba ngaphambilini.
ven: muvhigo uyo u dovha wa sumbedzisa uri vhatshena vha afrika tshipembe, nga maanḓa vha vhanna, ndi vhone vha no tholeswa, u takuselwa nṱha mushumoni na u fhiwa zwikhala zwa u pfumbudza musi vha tshi vhambedzwa na vhathu vha zwiṅwe zwigwada.

nbl: kezobulili ezingeni lokuphatha eliphakemeko, abaduna ngibo abanengi ngama-67% bengubo bama-32%.
ven: kha tshiimo tsha mbeu kha poswo dza vhulangi ha nṱha, vhanna vha kha ḓi vha nṱha nga 67.6% ngeno vhafumakadzi vha kha 32.4%.

nbl: ubunini obutjhigamilekobu namaphetheni woburholi bufanele bulungiswe.
ven: mvelo ya vhuṋe na vhurangaphanḓa i songo imaho zwavhuḓi i khou tea u khakhululwa.

nbl: angeze kwaba nokunzinza kinanyana ngimuphi umnotho lapho inengi labantu lininwa ngalendlela.
ven: kha nyambedzano dzanga na vhoramabindu, vho ṱanganedza tshanduko idzi dza ndeme.ṋamusi ri khou thoma ndima ntswa ya tshanduko ya mveledziso ya ikonomi ya matshilisano.

nbl: emikhulumiswaneni engibe nayo nabosomabhizinisi bazamukele leziintjhukumiso zamatjhuguluko.
ven: ri khou amba zwa uri ri tea u sumbedza nga kha nyito u fhirisa u amba nga ha mbekanyamushumo idzi.

nbl: namhlanjesi sithoma isigaba esitjha samatjhuguluko wezomnotho adephileko.
ven: muvhuso u ḓo shela mulenzhe kha ikonomi uri hu vhe na tshanduko iyi.

nbl: lokhu kufaka hlangana umthetho, imileyo, ukunikela amalayisensi, isabelo seemali, ukuthenga kunye nokusebenzisa imitlolomgomo yokuthuthukiswa okubanzi kwabanzima ngokomnotho (i-bbbee) ngendlela yokukhuthaza amakhamphani wangeqadi ukuletha amatjhuguluko.
ven: izwi zwi katela thendelonzwiwa ya vhusimamulayo, ndango, u ṋetshedza ḽaisentsi, mugaganyagwama na khethekanyo ya zwirengwa khathihi na u manḓafhadza ikonomi ya vharema yo tewaho kha nyengedzedzo uri zwi ṱuṱuwedze vhuḓifari kha sekithara ya phuraivethe na uri hu vhe na tshanduko.

nbl: umbuso usebenzisa amabhiliyoni ama-r500 ngonyaka ukuthenga iinsetjenziswa.
ven: muvhuso u fhedza r500 biḽioni nga ṅwaha kha u renga thundu na tshumelo.

nbl: kungezelelwe ngamabhiliyoni ama-r900 wesabelomali somthangalasisekelo.
ven: nga nṱha ha izwo ha vha na r900 biḽioni ya mugaganyagwama wa themamveledziso.

nbl: lezizabelomali kufuze zisetjenziselwe amatjhuguluko wezomnotho.
ven: migaganyagwama iyi i tea u shumiswa uri hu swikelelwe tshanduko ya ikonomi.

nbl: okokuthoma, imithetholawulo ekatelela bonyana abosokontraka abakhulu banikele amabhizinisi wabanzima umsebenzi wama-30% sele iswaphelisiwe yatlolwa nakugazede yamhlana ama-20 kutjhirhweni.
ven: mulayo muswa une wa khou tou thomiwa une wa vhona uri khonṱhiraka khulwane dzi fhe mushumo u linganaho 30% kha mabindu a vharema wo khunyeledzwa wa gazetiwa nga ḽa 20 phando.

nbl: ngemithetholawulo le namahlelo, urhulumende uzakukghona ukusebenzisa ikghono lombuso lokuthenga ukusekela amabubulo amancani wemalokitjhini newemakhaya, iinqhema ezikhethiweko nokuthuthukisa amabubulo welizwe.
ven: nga kha milayo na mbekanyamushumo dzenedzo, muvhuso u ḓo kona u shumisa maanḓa a u renga a muvhuso kha u manḓafhadza mabindu maṱuku, mabindu a vhupo ha mahayani na a zwikolobulasi, zwigwada zwo tiwaho na u alusa mveledziso ya nḓowetshumo yapo.

nbl: iintjhijilo ezimbili eziqakathekileko esiqalene nazo yikinga yomnotho osezandleni zedlanzana kanye neyokusebenzisana ngekohlakalo kwamakhamphani athileko, ekusisenzo esikghama abosomabhizinisi abancani nokuwakhandela ukuba nethuba lokungena kezomnotho kwabosomabhizinisi abancani nabosomabubulo abanzima.
ven: khaedu mbili dza ndeme dze ra livhana nadzo ndi u sedzesa kha tshikalo tsha nṱha kha ikonomi na zwiito zwa zwidzumbe zwine vha vha pfana mitengo na gennge dza vhugevhenga zwi thivhelisaho mabindu maṱuku u takuwa na vhaswa uri vha dzhene kha zwa mabindu na nḓowetshumo dza vharema .

nbl: iimphathimandla eziqalene nephaliswano zenze umsebenzi omuhle wokuziveza epanyameni iinqhemezi nokuzithathela amagadango womthetho.
ven: maanḓalanga a vhuṱaṱisani o ita mushumo wa nṱhesa wa u bvukulula gennge dza vhugevhenga na u ṋea ndaṱiso ya u pfuka mulayo.

nbl: ngomnyaka ogadungileko ngatlikitla umthetho wesiqalelelo esenza kube mlandu ukusebenzisana kwamakhamphani ngekohlakalo, uthome ukusebenza mhla lili-1 kumrhayili.
ven: mahoḽa ndo saina uri zwi vhe mulayo, ṋetshedzo i khwaṱhisedzaho uri zwa dzigennge na zwiito zwa zwidzumbe zwine vha pfana mitengo, ndi vhutshinyi, une wo thoma u shuma nga ḽa 1 shundunthule.

nbl: siphakamisa izinga lokuqalana nenye ikinga, yomnotho osezandleni zedlanzana, lapho abantu abambalwa baphethe umnotho welizweloke.
ven: une wa gwevhelwa u swika kha miṅwaha ya 10. zwazwino takutshedza uri ri kone u shumana na dziṅwe khaedu, dzi ngaho u sedza kha ikonomi, hune zwigwada zwiṱuku zwa langa vhunzhi ha maraga.ṋaṅwaha, muhasho wa mveledziso ya ikonomi u ḓo ḓisa mulayo kha khabinethe une wa ḓo khwaṱhisedza mulayo wa vhuṱaṱisani, 1998 (mulayo 89 wa 1998).

nbl: nonyaka umnyango wezokuthuthukiswa komnotho uzakwethula umthetho kukhabinethi onqophe ukukhibelela umthetho wezamaphaliswano we-1998 (umthetho nomboro 89 we-1998), hlangana nokhunye uzakutjheja isidingo sokuba nomnotho ofaka boke abantu kwehliswe izinga eliphezulu lobunini nokulawula esikubonako emikhakheni eminengi.
ven: une vhukati ha miṅwe, wa ḓo sedza kha ṱhoḓea ya uri hu vhe na ikonomi i katelaho na u fhungudza ḽevele dza nṱha dza vhuṋe na ndango zwine ra vhona kha sekithara nnzhi.

nbl: ngemva kwalokho sizakwethula isitjhukumiso salomthetho ngepalamende.
ven: mulayo uyu ri ḓo u isa phalamenndeni hune ha ḓo dzhiwa hone tsheo.

nbl: sinqophe ngalendlela ukuvulela abosomabhizinisi abatjha amathuba wezomnotho, sinikela amasewula afrika anzima amathuba wezomnotho nokwenza bonyana umnotho utjhugutjhuguluke, ube nephaliswano kodwana ufake woke umuntu.
ven: zwo rali, ri tama u vulela ikonomi kha vhashela mulenzhe vhaswa, hu tshi ṋewa zwikhala vharema vha afrika tshipembe kha ikonomi na u thusa uri ikonomi ivhe i shandukaho, i ṱaṱisanaho nahone i katelaho.

nbl: le kuyinembombono yethu yamatjhuguluko adephileko womnotho.
ven: heḽi ndi bono ḽashu ḽa tshanduko yo fhelelaho ya ikonomi.

nbl: bakwethu,urhulumende usebenza ngamandla emkhakheni weenkumba ngombana sele anikele ngeenkumba ezingaphezu kweengidi ezine ukusekela ngomnyaka we-1994.
ven: vhafunashango,muvhuso u shela mulenzhe nga nḓila i vhonalaho kha sekithara ya ndaka, zwazwino wo no ṋetshedza nnḓu dza miḽioni u bva nga 1994. sekithara heyi kha shango ḽashu i na ndeme i swikaho kha r7 ṱhiriḽioni, na sekithara yo to tikedzwaho i na ndeme ya r1.5 ṱhiriḽioni.

nbl: lomkhakha ngelizweni lekhethu ulinganiselwa kumathriliyoni alikhomba kanti umkhakha osekelwe ngeemali ulinganiselwa kumathriliyoni ali-r1.5.
ven: fhedziha, vharema na maafrika nga n maanḓa, vha langa phesenthe dzi re fhasi ha ṱhanu kha hei sekithara.

nbl: nanyana kunjalo bangaphasi kwe-5% abantu abanzima ababanini emkhakheni lo.
ven: mvetamveto ya mulayotibe wa vha shumaho nga ndaka u ḓo ganḓiswa nga muhasho wa madzulo a vhathu u itela vhupfiwa ha tshitshavha ndivho i ya u thoma sekithara ya vhuimeleli i katelaho u ya kha tshanduko yo fhelelaho ya ikonomi.

nbl: hlangana namaqaloqangi wanonyaka, urhulumende uzakuqalana nokuriyada okurhageleko ekutlolisweni kweencwadi zobunini kubazuzi bamaphrojekthi wezindlu ezisekelwe ngeemali zombuso.
ven: vhafunashango,ri khwaṱhisedza hafhu uri tshanduko yo fhelelaho ya ikonomi i tea u amba u ya kha zwi fhirisaho zwikimu zwa mukovhe wa vhuṋe.

nbl: bakwethu,sibuyelela kobana amatjhuguluko adephileko wezomnotho kufanele atjho ubunini obungaphezulu kweenkimu zobunini kwaphela.
ven: ri tama u vhona vharema vho dzhenelela thwii kha mabindu na u vha vhaṋe vha dzifeme.

nbl: sithanda ukubona abantu abanzima bangenelele bunqopha kumabhizinisi, bebabe banini bamafemu.
ven: u bvelela ha mbekanyamushumo ya nḓowetshumo ya vharema ndi zwa ndeme.

nbl: ihlelo lokuthuthukisa abosomabubulo abanzima liqakathekile.
ven: u bva tshe mbekanyamushumo ya vha hone yo thusa vhoramabindu vha fhiraho 22. muvhuso u na zwiṅwe zwikhala kha thandela dza u vusuludza ndaka dza muhasho wa mishumo ya tshitshavha.

nbl: lelihlelo selisekele abosomabubulo abama-22 solo lathomako.
ven: muhasho u ḓo bindudza masheleni a swikaho r100 miḽioni ṋaṅwaha kha mbekanyamushumo dza ndeme dza u vusuludza na u nakisa vhuima zwikepe.

nbl: umnyango uzakusisa okungasenani iingidi ezili-r100 emahlelweni aqakathekileko wokutjhejisisa nokuvuselela amadoyelo weenkebhe.
ven: muvhuso u ḓo dovha wa isa phanḓa na u bveledza mbekanyamaitele dzi ḓisaho nyengedzedzo kha u shela mulenzhe ha vhathu vharema na dzismme, hu tshi katelwa dzi langwaho nga vhafumakadzi na vhaswa, kha sekithara ya thekhinoḽodzhi ya mafhungo na vhudavhidzani.

nbl: azakuraga nokungenisa imali ngokuqatjhisa amadoyelo, iinkumba nenarha yombuso emagega neligu ekuyinto ezakusiza ama-smme wabanzima.
ven: ri fulufhedzisa vhaswa uri zwa u tsitsa mutengo wa datha ndi zwa ndeme kha mbekanyamaitele na pulane dzashu.

nbl: urhulumende uzakuraga nokulandela imithethomgomo enqophe ukunabisa ukuzibandakanya kwabantu abanzima nama-smme, kufaka hlangana layo alawulwa bomma nelutjha emkhakheni wethekhnoloji yelwazithintano.
ven: vhafunashango,zwa mugodi zwi ḓi dzula zwi thikho ya ikonomi yashu na u vha muṱanganedzi wa thengiselano ya mashangoḓavha.

nbl: sinikela ilutjha isiqiniseko bonyana ukwehliswa kwentengo yamadatha kuliqaloqangi kumithethomgomo nemahlewlenethu.
ven: ri ṱanganedza u vhuelela ha mitengo ya zwivhambadzwa, zwo itaho uri hu vhe na nyaluwo kha zwa migodi.

nbl: bakwethu,zeemayini zihlala zimgogodlha womnotho wethu nendlela enenzuzo ekulu ngetjintjiselwano namazwe wangaphandle.
ven: hezwi zwi sumbedzisa zwithu zwavhuḓi kha nḓowetshumo.

nbl: samukela itjhuguluko elihle entengweni yezenjiwa, okwenze bonyana kube nokukhula emikhiqizweni yeemayini.
ven: thendelonzwiwa i ṱoḓa u dzhiela nṱha pfanelo yo ṱanganedzwaho ya dzitshakatshaka ya muvhuso ya u vha na ndango ya zwiko zwoṱhe zwa mineraḽa na peṱiroḽiamu kha riphabuḽiki.

nbl: unqophe ukukhambisana nelungelo elaziwa liphasi loke lokobana umbuso ulawula zoke izenjiwa nemikhiqizo yephethroliyamu ngaphakathi kwenarha yekhethu.
ven: ri fulufhela uri nyambedzano vhukati ha muvhuso na mabindu kha thendelonzwiwa dzi ḓo ḓisa mvelelo dzavhuḓi uri maitele aya a khunyeledzwe.

nbl: unqophe ukusiza ilizwe ukuphelisa ukubandlululwa ngokobutjhaba ebujameni bobunini balelibubulo.
ven: ri ḓo isa phanḓa na u vhona uri muvhuso u dzhenelela thwii kha zwa migodi.

nbl: lokhu kuzakuletha ukunzinza kilelibubulo.
ven: mulayotibe wa afrika tshipembe wa khamphani ya migodi u ḓo ṋetshedzwa kha khabinethe na phalamenndeni vhukati ha ṅwaha.

nbl: siyathemba bonyana imikhulumiswano hlangana norhulumendenebamabhizinisi mayelana nomtlolo lo izakuba nemiphula emihle.
ven: mulayotibe wa khwaṱhisedzo ya mveledziso ya zwiko zwa mineraḽa na peṱiroḽiamu wo rumelwa murahu phalamenndeni uri mafhungo a elanaho na maitele a u davhidzana na tshitshavha ane a khou tshimbidzwa nga vhusimamulayo ha mavundu a tandululwe.

nbl: sizakuraga nokufuna ukuzibandakanya bunqopha kombuso kezeemayini.
ven: ri khou fhulufhela uri u ḓo lavheleswa wa humiselwa murahu uri u khunyeledzwe hu sa athu fhela tshifhinga uri mbilaelo dzi kwamanaho na zwo ṱahiswaho nga vha mabindu dzi tandululwe.

nbl: umthethomlingwa wekhamphani yeemayini yesewula afrika uzakuthulelwa ikhabinethi nepalamende nonyaka.
ven: muvhuso u isa phanḓa na u shumisana na vhafaramikovhe kha u fhelisa migodi isiho mulayoni u itela u vhulunga matshilo na u thivhela u rengiswa ha methala na diamane yavhuḓi zwi siho mulayoni.

nbl: umthethomlingwa wokuthuthukiswa kwezenjiwa nemikhiqizo yephethroliyamu ubuyiselwe epalamende kobana iindaba zemihlangano yokulalelwa komphakathi edoswa phambili ziimbethamthetho zeemfunda ilungiswe.
ven: ri dovha ra isa phanḓa na u isa khwaṱhisedzo khulwane kha mutakalo na tsireledzo ya vhashumi vha migodini, zwine zwa dovha zwa vha zwa ndeme kha uri sekithara ya migodi i ye phanḓa na u shuma.

nbl: sithemba kobana uzakutjhejwa ubuyiswe ngaphandle kokuriyada kobana iminako evezwe kuzaza kwabosomabhizinisi ilungiswe.
ven: nga u shumisana na khamphani dza migodini ri nga vhona uri matshilo o tsireledzea tshifhinga tshoṱhe.

nbl: urhulumende uyaraga nokusebenzisana nabathintekako ekulwisaneni neemayini ezingasi semthethweni ngomnqopho wokuphephisa amaphilo nokuvikela ukukhukhuthiswa kwezenjiwa eziligugu namadayimani.
ven: khombo i shushaho yo iteaho ngei mugodini wa lily kha ḽa mpumalanga mathomoni a 2016, i tou vha tshiwo tsha mufuda wo raloho we ra tshenzhema lwa u tou thoma u bva tshe demokirasi ya vha hone.

nbl: siyaraga nokugandelela ukuqakatheka kwezamaphilo nokuphepha kwabasebenza eemayini, ekuyinto eqakathekileko ekusebenzeni komkhakha weemayini.
ven: miṱa i kha vhuṱungu vhu vhavhavho na nḓaḓo.

nbl: ingozi emasikizi eyenzeka e-lily mine empumalanga ekuthomeni komnyaka wee-2016 ingeyokuthoma efana nayo selokhu kwafika intando yenengi.
ven: vhafunashango,zwi ḓo konḓa arali hu si uri zwi tou vha zwi sa konadzei, uri ri swikelele vhupfumedzani ha vhukuma u swika fhungo ḽa mavu ḽi tshi tandululwa.

nbl: imindeni izwa ibuhlungu obukhulu beyasala ikhahlumezekile.
ven: egere dzi linganaho miḽioni dza malo fhedzi dza mavu a limeaho dzo humiselwa kha vhathu vharema, ine ya vha 9.8% ya egere dza 82 miḽioni dza mavu a limeaho afrika tshipembe.

nbl: bakwethu,kuzakuba budisi nanyana akuzukukghonakala ukuba nokubuyisana okuzeleko kungakalungiswa indaba yenarha.
ven: ho vha na u tsela fhasi hu linganaho 19% kha miṱa ire kha zwa vhulimi u bva kha miṱa ya 2.9 miḽioni nga 2011 uya kha 2.3 miḽioni nga 2016. ro amba ngaha ndivho yashu ya u shumisa mulayo wa u dzhiulula mavu, 1975 (mulayo 63 wa 1975) uri hu vhe na tshanduko ya mavu na u humiselwa murahu ha mavu, zwi tshi elana na ndayotewa.

nbl: kudluliselwe ebantwini abanzima kwaphela amahagere wenarha evundileko nelimekako eziingidi ezibunane, ekuyi-9.8% kilawo aziingidi ezima-82 zamahagere wenarha evundileko nelimekako esewula afrika.
ven: zwazwino ndo dzhia tsheo ya u humisela mulayotibe murahu phalamenndeni uri u sedzwe hafhu ngauri zwi nga itea wa si phase kha muhulwane wa ndayotewa.

nbl: kukhona nokwehla kwesibalo semizi ebandakanyeka kezokulima sisuka eengidini ezi-2.9 ngomnyaka wee-2011 ukufikela eengidini ezi-2.3 ngomnyaka wee-2016.
ven: hezwi zwi khou vhangwa nga u dzhenelela ha tshitshavha hu songo fhelelaho musi mulayo u tshi khou shumiwa.

nbl: gadesi ngiqunte ukubuyisela epalamende umthethomlingwa bonyana utjhejisiswe ngombana angeze waphumelela ekhotho yomthethosisekelo.
ven: u vulwa hafhu ha mbilo dza mavu zwi tshe zwo ima nga nṱhani ha mulayo wa khwaṱhisedzo ya mbuedzedzo ya pfanelo dza mavu, 2014 (mulayo 15 wa 2014) wo bulwa sa u sa shumiho nga khothe a ndayotewa.

nbl: sithemba bonyana ipalamende izakwenza msinyana ukuhlangabezana neendingwezi kobana umthetho upheleliswe kulethwe amatjhuguluko.
ven: khothe ya ndayotewa yo wana uri maitele a nyambedzano na tshitshavha o tshimbidzwaho nga ncop na vhusimamulayo ha mavundu, ha ngo swikelela tshiimo tsho tiwaho kha ndayotewa.

nbl: ukuvulwa kabutjha kwethuba lokwenza iimbawo zenarha kusajanyisiwe ngombana umthetho wesikhibelelo wamalungelo wokuthatha inarha wee-2014 (umthetho nomboro 15 wee-2014) wararhwa yikhotho yomthethosisekelo.
ven: hu tshi yiwa phanḓa, muvhuso u ḓo isa phanḓa na u shumisa mbekanyamushumo dziṅwe dzi ngaho mbekanyamushumo ya u khwaṱhisedza pfanelo dza vhushaka dza vhathu vha shumaho kha zwa mavu, i ḓivhiwaho sa mbekanyamushumo ya 50-50. kha mbekanyamushumo iyi, vhashumi vha mabulasini vha ṱangana vha vha tshithu tshithihi kha tshiimiswa tsha mulayo khathihi na muṋe wa bulasi, ha thomiwa khamphani ntswa hune vhashumi na muṋe wa bulasi vha vha vhaṋe vha khaphani iyo.

nbl: ikhotho yomthethosisekelo yafumana bonyana ikambiso yokulalelwa komphakathi eyayidoswa phambili yi-ncop nezinye iimbethamthetho zeemifunda akhange yanelise iindingo zomthethosisekelo.
ven: u swika zwino, hu na makumedzwa a 13 o no tendelwaho, ane a ḓo vhuedza miṱa i dzulaho mabulasini ya 921 zwine zwa vha na ndeme ya r631 miḽioni.

nbl: urhulumende uzakuraga nokusebenzisa amanye amahlelo njengehlelo lokuqinisa amalungelo wokuhlobana wabantu abasebenza ngenarha elaziwa ngehlelo le-50-50.
ven: ri khoḓa zwihulu vhorabulasi na vhashumi vha bulasini kha vhurangeli uvhu.

nbl: kilelihlelo abasebenzi bamaplasi bahlanganyela isakhiwo sangokomthetho banomniniplasi, kutlanywa ikhamphani etjha abasebenzi nomniniplasi bahlanganyela ubunini.
ven: nga maanḓesa, ri humbela vhaiti vha mbilo dza mavu uri vha dzhie mavu u fhirisa u dzhia tshelede.

nbl: bekube gadesi, kuphasiswe iintjhukumiso ezili-13, lapho kuzuze khona imizi yemaplasini ema-921 ngemali elinganiselwa eengidini ezima-r631.
ven: mbilo dzi fhiraho 90% zwazwino dzi khou dzudzanywa nga kha ndifho ya masheleni, zwine a zwi thusi na luthihi kha maitele aya.

nbl: sithokozisa abalimi nabasebenzi bemaplasini ngamano la.
ven: zwi dovha zwa sedzelisa fhasi u manḓafhadzwa ha ikonomi.

nbl: okuqakatheke khulu, sikhombela abafakiimbawo zenarha ukwamukela inarha kunesibonelelo semali.
ven: muvhuso wo ḓikumedzela u tikedza vhorabulasi vha vharema vha sa athu bvelelaho.

nbl: iimbawo ezingaphezu kwama-90% zibhadelwe ngemali okungasizi ngalitho, lokhu kurhagalisa ukuthathelwa kwenarha begodu kuqalela phasi ukunikelwa kwamandla kezomnotho.
ven: ndo ṱanganedza memorandumu u bva kha dzangano ḽa vhorabulasi vha afrika tshipembe u ambaho uri ṅwaha wa 2017 kha u vhe ṅwaha wa mbambadzo kha vhorabulasi vha vharema vha sa athu bvelelaho.

nbl: ngifumene imemorandamu ibuya ehlanganweni yabalimi abanzima yesewula afrika abathi umnyaka wee-2017 kufuze kube mnyaka wokwenza abalimi abanzima abakhasako babe bososomabhizinisi.
ven: ngangoho, muvhuso u ḓo thoma mbekanyamushumo ya thikhedzo ya mbambadzo kha vhorabulasi vha vharema vha sa athu bvelelaho vha 450. ri ṱuṱuwedza vhunzhi ha vhafumakadzi uri vha dzhene kha zwa vhulimi.

nbl: kwamambala urhulumende uzakusebenzisa ihlelo lokusekekela amabhizinisi ukusiza abalimi abanzima abakhasako abama-450.
ven: ndi na mueni o khetheaho ṋamusi, rabulasi wa mufumakadzi wa ṅwaha wa 2016, vho vanecia janse u bva kha masipala wa koukamma ngei kapa vhubvaḓuvha.

nbl: sikhuthaza abomma abanengi kobana bangenele umsebenzi wokulima.
ven: vhafunashango,vhorabulasi vhashu vho ṱangana na zwi konḓaho mahoḽa nga nṱhani ha gomelelo.

nbl: nginesithekeli esikhethekileko namhlanjesi, umthumbi kanongorwana womlimi wengubo womnyaka wee-2016, u-vanecia janse owakhele umasipala we-koukamma epumalanga kapa.
ven: u swika zwino, hu na masheleni a anganyelwaho kha r2.5 biḽioni o iswaho kha uri zwifuwo zwi wane zwa uḽa, themamveledziso ya maḓi, u vhora, u vusuludzwa ha magwedzho, thengiso ya murengi a badelesaho na vhuṅwe vhudzheneleli.

nbl: bakwethu,abalimi bethu baqalana nobujamo obubudisi nyakenye ngonobangela wesomiso.
ven: zwiṅwe hafhu, tshumisano ya mveledziso ya nḓowetshumo na land bank yo ṋetshedza masheleni a linganaho r500 miḽioni kha vhorabulasi vho tsikwaho uri vha lange zwiimiswa zwavho zwa zwikolodo na u vha tikedza nga khadzimiso.

nbl: ihlangano ethuthukisa amabubulo (i-idc) neland bank zinikele ngesekelo leengidi ezima-r500 kubalimi abatlhagileko kobana babhadele iinkwelede zabo basizwa ngesikwelede esingadiseliko.
ven: vhafunashango,muphuresidennde vho oliver reginald tambo vho vha vha tshi ima na pfanelo dza vhafumakadzi.

nbl: bakwethu,umengameli u-oliver reginald tambo gade ayikutani etjhotjhozela amalungelo wabomma.
ven: ri ḓo isa phanḓa na u manḓafhadza vhafumakadzi kha mbekanyamushumo dzoṱhe dza muvhuso.

nbl: sizakuraga nokunikela abomma amandla kiwo woke amahlelo karhulumende.
ven: muvhuso u ḓo isa phanḓa na u dzhiela nṱha u swikelela ha vhafumakadzi kha zwikhala zwa ikonomi na u lambedza mabindu na zwikolodo.

nbl: ngiyathaba ukwethula indodanakhe umongezi tamana, njengesithekeli namhlanjesi.
ven: heyi ndi yone mbofholowo ye mulwela mbofholowo, mufumakadzi wa vhaṋe vho dora tamana vha gugulethu, vha fhano ḓoroboni ya kapa vha lwela yone.

nbl: bakwethu,ngonobayeni wee-2015, abafundi bemayunivesithi baveza iminako yabo ngemali eyimbadela yefundo ephakemeko.
ven: ndo takala uri ri na ṅwana wavho fhano vho mongezi tamanasa mueni ṋamusi.

nbl: kungebangelo lokha abafundi bemayunivesithi nabaveza iminako yabo ezwakalako ngokukhutjhelwa ngeqadi emayunivesithi, urhulumende wethu othejako waphendula ngokunqophileko ngokuthwala umsebenzi wokubhadela imali engezelelweko yomnyaka wee-2016.
ven: vhafunashango,nga nyendavhusiku 2015, matshudeni vha yunivesithi vho ṱahisa mbilaelo dzavho nga ha mbadelo dza pfunzo ya nṱha.

nbl: urhulumende wabhadela godu soke isikwelede sabafundi abafundiswa sikhwama sesizo leemali kubafundi selizweloke (i-nsfas) wangezelela nenani labafundi kunangaphambilini.
ven: vho sumbedzisa uri zwikolodo zwine zwo ṱhophana zwa gonya na mbadelo dzine dza khou gonya zwi khou isa phanḓa u konḓisela avho vha bvaho miṱani i shayaho uri vha dzhene na u vha kha sisiṱeme ya pfunzo u swika vha tshi khunyeledza pfunzo dzavho.

nbl: ngesikhathi sokwethulwa kwesitatimende somthethomgomo sesabelo seemali saphakathi nomnyaka, urhulumende wethu wamemezela amagadango angezelelweko anqophe ukwenza ifundo ephakemeko ifikelelwe bafundi bemindeni erhola imirholo ephasi.
ven: ndi nga kha zwenezwi he musi matshudeni vha tshi ṱahisa mbilaelo dzavho dzi pfadzaho dza nga ha u sa katelwa kha dziyunivesithhi, muvhuso washu u londaho wa fhindula nga maga a u dzhia vhuḓifhinduleli ha u badela nyengedzeo ya mbadelo dza ṅwaha wa akhademiki wa 2016. muvhuso wo dovha wa badela tshikolodo tshoṱhe tsha matshudeni tsha tshikimu tsha thuso ya masheleni ya matshudeni a lushaka (nsfas) wa dovha wa engedza tshivhalo tsha matshudeni ane a tea u thuswa nga nomboro khulwanesa zwine a zwi athu vhuya zwa vha hone.

nbl: urhulumende unikele ngeemali ngomnqopho wokuqinisekisa bonyana kungabi nomfundi ingeniso yekhabo ehlanganyelweko efika ee-r600 000 ngomnyaka ozakuqalana nemali yeyunivesithi engezelelweko nemakholiji wefundo yetheknikhali nebandulo (i-tvet) emnyakeni wee-2017.
ven: nga tshifhinga tsha u ṋetshedza tshiṱatamende tsha mbekanyamaitele ya mugaganyagwama wa vhukati wa 2016, muvhuso washu wo ḓivhadza maṅwe maga o sedzaho kha u ita uri pfunzo ya nṱha i swikelele kha vhunzhi ha matshudeni vha bvaho miṱani ya vha shumaho.

nbl: boke abafundi abalungelwe lisizo le-nsfas nabamukelwe mayunivesithi namakholiji we-tvet bazakusekelwa ngeemali.
ven: muvhuso wo ṋetshedza masheleni u vhona uri hu sa vhe na mutshudeni na muthihi ane nyangarelo ya muholo wa muṱa wa hawe wa lingana r600 000 nga ṅwaha ane a ḓo vha na khaedu ya u gonya ha mbadelo yunivesithi na magudedzini a tvet nga 2017. matshudeni vhoṱhe vho tewaho nga u wana thikhedzo ya nsfas na vhane vho ṱanganedzwa nga dziyunivesithi na magudedzi a tvet, vha ḓo thusiwa nga mbadelo.

nbl: iinkwelede zabafundi abalungelweko ze-nsfas zeminyaka yee-2013, 2014 newee-2015 zibhadelwe.
ven: tshikolodo tsha yunivesithi tsha nsfas tsha matshudeni vhe vha wana thuso nga ṅwaha wa akhademiki wa 2013, 2014 na 2015 tsho badelwa.

nbl: urhulumende ubeke ngeqadi amabhiliyoni ama-r32 emalini karhulumende khona azakusekela ifundo ephakemeko.
ven: nga u angaredza, muvhuso wo ṋetshedza masheleni a linganaho r32 biḽioni a bvaho kha mitheo ya muvhuso uri a thuse kha pfunzo ya nṱha.

nbl: eminyakeni eseleko yalombuso owathatha iintambo kusukela emnyakeni wee-2014, imithethomgomo yethu izakunqophana neminako yabafundi elandelako abayivezileko:kokuthoma, abafundi babenomnako bonyana inani le-nsfas lee-r122 000 liphasi khulu.
ven: ri ḓo tea u lavhelesa fhungo iḽi ro sedza kha u engedza muelo wa mutheo wa luṱa lwa tshifhinga tshi ḓaho.

nbl: kufanele sitjheje indaba le ngokukhuphula inani ngokweengaba esikhathini esizako.
ven: tsha vhuvhili, matshudeni vho sumbedzisa uri mbadelo yo fhelelaho ya pfunzo kha dziṅwe yunivesithi i nṱha u fhira masheleni a ṋetshedzwaho nga nsfas.

nbl: kwesibili, abafundi baveze bonyana inani elipheleleko lokufunda kamanye amayunivesithi liphezulu kunesibonelelo esikhutjhwa yi-nsfas.
ven: zwo ralo, matshudeni vha nsfas vha dzhenaho kha yunivesithi dza mbadelo dzi re nṱha vha fhedza vha na zwikolodo.

nbl: abafundi abafundiswa yi-nsfas kamanye amayunivesithi abiza imali engaphezulu bagcina baqalene nesikwelede esingapheliko.
ven: maitele a tshimbidzwaho nga muvhuso washu o no thoma u sedza kha fhungo iḽi.

nbl: urhulumende wethu selathome ukuqalisisa ubujamobu.
ven: miraḓo i ṱhonifheaho na maafrika tshipembe nga nṋe, matshudeni na vhabebi vha khou tea u pfesesa uri ṱhoḓea dza tshumelo dzi nga ho maḓi, vhuthathatshili, mveledziso ya vhana na vhuendi ha nnyi na nnyi havhuḓi nazwone zwi khou tea u sedzwa khazwo, khathihi na tswikelelo ya ndeme ya pfunzo ya nṱha na vhupfumbudzi.

nbl: malunga ahloniphekileko namasewula afrika, kufanele abafundi nababelethi babo bazwisise bonyana iindingo zeensetjenziswa ezifana namanzi, iindlwana zamanzi, ifundo yabantwana abancani (i-ecd) neenthuthi ezihle zomphakathi nazo kufanele zitjhejwe ngokukhambisana nefundo ephakemeko nokubandulwa okunekhwalithi.
ven: fhedzi vhuḓikumedzeli hashu ha u wana thandululo dzi yaho phanḓa kha ndambedzo ya muholo wa matshilisano nga u angaredza, nga maanḓa na pfunzo, a vhu timatimisi.

nbl: nokho ukuzimisela kwethu ukufumana ipengu ngokusekela ngeemali isibonelelo sezehlalakuhle, khulukhulu zefundo, kuyaraga.
ven: vhunga maitele e ra thoma o no vha tsini, sa khomishini ya heher, tshigwada tsha dziminisiṱa tshi shumaho, miṱangano na matshudeni, yunivesithi na vharangaphanḓa vha vhupfumbudzi na pfunzo dza mishumo ya zwanḓa magudedzini khathihi na tshitshavha zwatsho, ri ḓo wana zwishumiswa zwi itaho uri mbekanyamaitele dzashu dzi ambe.

nbl: njengalokha ikambiso esiyitlamileko iya ekupheleni, njengekomitjhini ka-heher, isiqhema somsebenzi sabonqongqotjhe, imikhulumiswano enabileko nabafundi, abarholi bemayunivesithi nebemakholiji we-tvet nomphakathi, sizakufumana iinsetjenziswa zokuphumelelisa imithethomgomo yethu.
ven: ndi ramba vhakwamei vhoṱhe uri vha vhe tshipiḓa kha mushumo u re kati uri hu sa vhe na makumedzwa a songo pfiwaho.

nbl: ngimema boke abathintekako ukuzibandakanya ekambisweni eragako kobana kungabi nombono ongalalelwako.
ven: hu songo vha na makumedzwa kana muhumbulo wavhuḓi na muthihi une wa sa ṱahiswe.

nbl: akunamkhumbulo omuhle ozakuqalelwa phasi.
ven: khethekanyo khulwane dza tshitshavha tshashu dza vhuya dza tendelana na zwine ra khou ita, muvhuso washu u ḓo dzhia maga a u dzhiela nṱha hafhu zwishumiswa zwine zwa ḓo shumiswa kha luṱa lwa mutheo.

nbl: nasele umphakathi ngokunabileko uvumelana ngokufanele kwenziwe, urhulumende wethu uzakuthatha amagadango wokutjheja qangi iinsetjenziswa ngokweengaba.
ven: kha ri sedzese kha ṱhoḓea dza ndeme ri shumise zwiṱukuṱuku zwine ra vha nazwo nga nḓila yone.

nbl: asikhulumisane ukutshwaya iindingo eziqakatheke khulu bese kwabiwa iinsetjenziswa zethu eziyindlala ngefanelo.
ven: vhafunashango,zwa u lwa na vhutshinyi a ri khou zwi sedzela fhasi na luthihi nahone ndi zwa ndemesa.

nbl: amapholisa azakwandisa ukubonakala kwawo emiphakathini, ukwakhelela phezu kwesibonelo esihle sokusatjalaliswa kwamapholisa ngepumelelo okwenziwa ngesikhathi sejima lamaholideyi kakresmusi aphephileko.
ven: mapholisa vha ḓo engedza mbonalo yavho, vha tshi shumisa maitele aneaḽa e vha a shumisa nga tshifhinga tsha fulo ḽa khalaṅwaha ya madakalo yo tsireledzeaho.

nbl: bazakusebenzisa iinqhema zamapholisa ezikhethekileko, njengeenqhema ezitjheja ubujamo oburhabako namakoro angenelelako welizwe loke, ukusiza eendaweni ezinobulelesi oburhageleko.
ven: vha ḓo shumisa vhukoni ho khetheaho, sa zwigwada zwi fhindulaho nga u ṱavhanya na yunithi dza vhudzheneleli ha lushaka, u thusa kha u tandulula khaedu ya vhutshinyi vhuponi vhune ho hulela.

nbl: ngeveke ephelileko sifumene umlayezo obuya e-soshanguve bonyana ubulelesi burhagele e-block l nokuthi izinga lokudlelezela abantu iinkoloyi nokubamba ikunzi liphakeme.
ven: ro ṱanganedza mulaedza vhege yo fhiraho u bva soshanguve uri vhutshinyi ho kalula ngei block l na uri u hombokwa ha dzigoloi na vhufhura zwo kalula.

nbl: imiphakathi le kufanele yakhe itjhebiswano nesipholisa ukuqinisekisa bonyana iinlelesi azizenzeli umathanda phezu kwezakhamuzi.
ven: ndi zwitshavha zwi nga ho izwi zwine zwa tea u fhaṱa vhushaka ho khwaṱhaho na mapholisa u vhona uri mavemu a sa zwime vhadzulapo.

nbl: amanye amagadango wokulwisana nobulelesi ngelizweni azakufaka ukuhlonywa kwamakoro akhethekileko, azokuqalana nobulelesi beendakamizwa elizweni loke, inturhu yebubulweni lamateksi neyeengidi nokusetjenziswa okuqinileko kokuphenya njengokusebenzisa isayensi.
ven: maṅwe maga a u lwa na vhutshinyi kha lushaka a ḓo katela u thomiwa ha yunithi dzo khetheaho, ho sedzwa kha vhutshinyi vhu kwamaho zwa zwidzidzivhadzi, khakhathi dza dzithekhisini na zwigidi, khathihi na u engedza zwishumiswa zwi thusaho kha u ita tsedzuluso sa mvelelo dza tsedzuluso dzi itwaho nga maitele a saintsi.

nbl: amapholisa azakuqinisa ukusetjenziswa kwebuthelelomininingwana lamaseli wefuzo (i-dna) ekutshwayeni abasolwa.
ven: mapholisa vha ḓo dovha vha khwaṱhisa kha u shumiswa ha dathabeizi ya dna kha u ṱalusa vhahumbulelwa.

nbl: sikhuthaza umphakathi ukusebenzisana namapholisa khona sizakuba nemiphakathi ephephileko.
ven: ri ṱuṱuwedza tshitshavha uri tshi shumisane na mapholisa u vhona uri vhadzulapo vho tsireledzea.

nbl: bakwethu,samukela ukwehla kwezinga lezehlakalo zokucwiywa kwabobhejani ukusukela ngosewula wee-2015, ekungekokuthoma eminyakeni elitjhumi.
ven: vhafunashango,ri ṱanganedza u tsela fhasi ha phimo ya u tswiwa ha maṋanga a tshugulu u bva tshimedzi 2015, zwine zwa tou vha zwa u thoma nga murahu ha miṅwaha ya fumi.

nbl: lokhu kumphumela wokusebenzisana ngokudephileko kwama-ejensi aqinisekisa ukuthotjelwa komthetho.
ven: izwi zwi khou vha hone nga kha mushumo une wa khou itwa nga mazhendezi a mulayo ane a khou shuma o khwaṱhisa vhukuma.

nbl: bakwethu,enye yamaqhinga wokulwisana nobulelesi kuqinisekisa bona labo abatjhatjhululwa ejele bangasabuyela ebulelesini.
ven: vhafunashango,maṅwe a maano a u lwa na vhutshinyi ndi u vhona uri havho vho vhofhololwaho dzhele vha sa dovhe vha tshinya.

nbl: umnyango wezokuvuselelwa kweemilo uyaraga nokusebenza ngamandla ukutjhugulula amajele abe maziko wokuvuselelwa kweemilo ngokunikela imisebenzi ehlukileko.
ven: muhasho wa tshumelo dza ndulamiso u khou isa phanḓa na u shuma wo ḓifunga kha u shandukisa dzhele uri dzi vhe senthara dza ndulamiso nga kha ṋetshedzo ya tshumelo dzo fhambanaho.

nbl: ngebangelo izinga lokuthobela imigomo yokulitjalelwa nokudosa isigwebo ngaphandle likhuphuke belafikelela ema-98%.
ven: nga kha zwenezwo, zwa vhutevhedzeli ha nyimele dza u vhofhololwa ha zwivhotshwa zwi tshe fhasi ha mulayo zwo khwinifhala u swika kha 98% ine ya tou vha luswayo kha ḓivhazwakale.

nbl: ilizwe lithuthukile ekwehliseni isibalo sabentwana ababotjhiweko.
ven: shango ḽo vha na mvelaphanḓa kha u fhungudza tshivhalo tsha vhana kha dzisenthara dza ndulamiso.

nbl: bakwethu,ukukhuthazwa kokufikelela ubulungiswa kube netlha ngomnyaka ophelileko ngosinyikhaba lokha nakuvulwa iphiko lekhotho ephakemeko e-limpopo.
ven: vhafunashango,u khwiniswa ha tswikelelo ya vhulamukanyi ho ṋewa ṱhaluso ntswa mahoḽa musi hu tshi vulwa davhi ḽa khothe khulwane ngei limpopo.

nbl: ikhotho ephakemeko yempumalanga izokuqedwa kiwo umnyaka ophezulu weemali.
ven: khothe khulwane ya mpumalanga i ḓo khunyeledzwa kha ṅwaha uno wa muvhalelano.

nbl: ukuthoma ukusebenza kwamakhotho aphakemeko la kutjho bonyana sesifikelele umnqopho wokobana isifunda ngasinye sibe nekhotho ephakemeko ngelizweni.
ven: u shuma ha khothe khulwane idzi mbili zwi amba uri zwazwino ro limuwa nga ha tshipikwa tsha khothe khulwane kha vundu ḽinwe na ḽinwe kha shango ḽashu.

nbl: ngaphakathi kwebandla lezokutjhutjhisa lelizwe (i-npa), iyunithi edla ipahla (i-afu) iqede imilandu yokudla ipahla ema-389 ebiza iingidi ezima-r349.
ven: manḓalanga a vhutshutshisi ha lushaka na yunithi ya ndozwo ya ndaka dzo khunyeledza milandu ya 389 ya zwa ndozwo ine ya vha na ndeme ya r349 miḽioni.

nbl: bafumana amadarhfara wokuvalela ipahla ama-326 wepahla ebiza iingidi ezima-r799.
ven: vho wana u swikela u imisa oda dza 326 dza ndeme ya r779 miḽioni.

nbl: inani leengidi ezi-r13 lifunyenwe emilandwini efaka abasebenzi bombuso egade benza ikohlakalo neminye imilandu emnyakeni ogadungileko.
ven: kha milandu ye vhaofisiri vha muvhuso vha ita vhufhura na miṅwe milandu i elanaho na izwo ho vhuedzedzwa masheleni a linganaho r13 miḽioni mahoḽa.

nbl: bakwethu,u-oliver tambo wavula ikundla ngomgomo wezangaphandle welizwe ngeminyaka ye-1977 nagade akhuluma kukhonferensi yokuthoma yehlangano ebusako e-angola, i-mpla, nakathi:“sifuna ukuphila ngokuthula namazwe abomakhelwana bethu nabantu bephasi ebujameni bokulingana, ukuhloniphana namathuba alinganako”.
ven: vhafunashango,vho oliver tambo vho vhea mutsindo wa mbekanyamaitele ya vhabvannḓa ya shango nga 1977 musi vha tshi khou amba kha khongiresi ya u thoma ya ḽihoro ḽivhusi ḽa mpla ngei angola vhari:“ri ṱoḓa u tshila nga mulalo na vhadzulatsini na vhathu vha bvaho ḽifhasini nga vhuphara nga nḓila i linganaho, ri tshi ṱhonifhana na u wana zwi fanaho”.

nbl: isewula afrika ihloniphekile ngokuba ngusihlalo wehlangano yokuthuthukisa imiphakathi ese-afrika engesewula (i-sadc) ukuthoma ngorhoboyi wee-2017.
ven: afrika tshipembe ḽo hulisea vhukuma nga u vha mudzulatshidulo wa tshitshavha tsha mveledziso ya tshipembe ha afrika (sadc) u bva nga ṱhangule 2017. ri ḓo shumisa themo iyi u ṱavhanyisa u thoma u shuma ha maano a nḓowetshumo ya sadc.

nbl: sizakusebenzisa ihlandla lethu lokuphatha ukurhabisa ukusetjenziswa kweqhinga lamabubulo we-sadc.
ven: ri khou engedza adzhenda ya u ṱanganelana nga kha u thomiwa ha vhupo ha mbambadzo ya mahala ya tshitshavha tsha vhubvaḓuvha ha afrika ya sadc-comesa.

nbl: sirhabisa ihlelo elihlanganyelweko ngokuhloma isifunda sokurhwebelana simahla phakathi kwe-sadc, i-comesa nenhlangano yamazwe asepumalanga ye-afrika.
ven: ri ḓo isa phanḓa na u ḓidzhenisa kha u lwisa u lamula, mushumo wa u vhona uri hu na mulalo na vhurangeli ha u ḓisa mulalo ngei lesotho, democratic republic of congo, burundi, mozambique, south sudan, somalia na libya.

nbl: sizakuraga nemizamo yethu yokulamula, amajima wokuletha nokunzinzisa ukuthula, nemizamo yokwakha ukuthula e-lesotho, e-democratic republic of congo, eburundi, e-mozambique, e-south sudan, e-somalia ne-libya.
ven: mmbi ya vhupileli ha lushaka ya afrika tshipembe i khou imelela shango zwavhuḓi kha mushumo wa u ḓisa mulalo.

nbl: ibutho lamajoni lesewula afrika (i-sandf) lilijamele kuhle ilizwe emisebenzini yokuqinisekisa ukuthula.
ven: zwiṅwe hafhu, u vhambadza na vhafarisani nga riṋe vha sialala ngei tshipembe zwi kha ḓivha zwa ndeme kha ikonomi yashu.

nbl: ukurhwebelana namazwe abatjhebisani bethu abajayelekileko ngetjingalanga kufaka isandla ngokubonakalako emnothweni wethu.
ven: ri ḓo isa phanḓa na u shumisana na united states ra shuma roṱhe kha mafhungo ane roṱhe ra vhuelwa u fana na u vusuluswa ha mulayo wa tshikhala na nyaluwo ya afrika (agoa).

nbl: sizakuraga nokutjhebisana ne-united states nokusebenzisana eendabeni esinekareko ngokufananako kizo njengokuvuselelwa ngokuzeleko komthetho wokukhula namathuba we-afrika (i-agoa).
ven: ri dzhiela vhukonani hashu na peoples republic of china nṱha vhukuma.

nbl: sihlonipha ubuhlobo bethu ne-peoples republic of china.
ven: china ndi mufarani wa ndeme vhukuma na afrika tshipembe.

nbl: i-china imtjhebisani wesewula afrika omkhulu noqakathekileko.
ven: ri dzhia china ‘sa muvhuso wo imaho na u vha manḓalanga o imelelaho china ḽoṱhe’.

nbl: sihlonipha i-china njengesiphathimandla sombuso nekungiso sodwa esinegunya esijamele ilizwe loke le-china.
ven: afrika tshipembe ḽi khou khwaṱhisedza vhuimo haḽo na vhuḓikumedzeli kha thendelano ya mbambadzo na china’ na uri ri dzhia taiwan sa tshipiḓa tsha ndeme tsha peoples republic of china.

nbl: isewula afrika ibuyelela ubujamo bayo nokuzibophelela kwayo phezu komthethokambiso munye ophakathi kwayo ne-china yinye (i-one china policy) begodu ngalokho sithatha bona i-taiwan isiphande esiyingcenye ye-china.
ven: kha vhuimo ha vhufarani ha kha dzhango, maano o ṱanganelaho a afrika na yuropa (eu) a kha ḓi vha muhanga wa ndeme wa tshifhinga tshilapfu kha tshumisano ine ya khou ya phanḓa.

nbl: ezingeni letjhebiswano lekhonthinenthi, iqhinga lehlanganyela ye-afrika ne-european union (i-joint africa-european union) lihlala liqakathekile njengetlhatlha letjhebiswano eliragako.
ven: thendelano ya vhufarani ha ikonomi na eu yo vha hone nga khubvumedzi 2016, izwi zwi ḓisa zwikhala zwiswa zwa tswikelelo ya makete kha zwibveledzwa zwa afrika tshipembe.

nbl: isivumelwano setjhebiswano lezomnotho ne-eu sithome ukusebenza ngokhukhulamungu wee-2017, okuvule amathuba amatjha wokufikelela amamakethe wemikhiqizo yesewula afrika.
ven: ho ṱodou vha zwibveledzwa zwoṱhe zwa afrika tshipembe, 99% yazwo zwi ḓo kona u swikelela maragae wa eu.

nbl: pheze yoke imikhiqizo yesewula afrika, elinganiselwa ema-99% azakufumana itjhejoqangi ku-eu.
ven: ngeno 96% ya zwibveledzwa zwi tshi ḓo dzhena kha maraga wa eu hu songo sedzwa thivhelo dza tshivhalo.

nbl: imikhiqizo elinganiselwa kema-96% izakungena kumamakethe we-eu ngaphandle kokubhadeliswa intela nanyana ukuqalana neenqabo.
ven: thendelano ya mbambadzo ya tshipembe ha afrika ya vhuthihi ha mercosur na yone i khou shuma, hune ya ṋetshedza tswikelelo i tameaho kha muthelo dzi fhiraho 1 000. heyi ndi thendelano i alusaho mbambadzo dza mashango a re kha tshipembe ha malinganye.

nbl: isivumelwano sokurhwebelana simahla sehlangano yemithelo ye-afrika engesewula (i-sacu) ne-mercosur sithomile ukusebenza, okunikela itjhejoqangi ukufikeleleka kwemithelo engaphezu kwe-1 000. isivumelwanesi sikhuphula izinga lokurhwebelana phakathi kwamazwe angesewula ye-ikhweyitha.
