ven: zwigwada zwa themamveledziso ya ikonomi zwa u dzhia vhukando zwo fhambanaho zwazwino zwi khou shuma kha vhupo ho ṱaluswaho ha 20. ṅwaha wo fhelaho , ndo vhona tshinyalelo khulwane yo vhangwaho nga u tswiwa ha koporo na tsimbi kha sisṱeme yashu ya muḓagasi, zwiporo na dziṅwe themamveledziso dza tshitshavha.

nbl: umphakathi weendawo ngeendawo uhlala uhlezi macuphe, ngevalo lokuthi imindeni yoke ayikaphephi.
ven: ubva tshenetsho, mapholisa vho mbo thoma u tevhelela zwiito zwa u tswiwa ha khebulu.

nbl: lobubujamo bezinto obunje abukwazi ukuliselelwa bunjengobanyana bunje.
ven: nga nyendavhusiku, muvhuso wo imisa lwa tshifhinganyana mbambadzelannḓa ya matshetshelo a khebulu ya koporo na maṅwe matshetshele u tshi thithisa sindikheithi dza vhutshinyi na u konisa uri sisṱeme ntswa ya mbambadzo i shumiswe.

nbl: siqinisa i-saps kobanyana sizokukhandela ubulelesi besenze nokuthi ibandla lezokutjhutjhisa lelizweloke (i-npa) likghone ukusebenza ngcono, namakhotho aqinisekise ukuthi izephulamthetho ziya ejele.
ven: musi ri tshi kha ḓi tou bva u dzhena kha tshandukiso ya ikonomi kha muḓagasi, maḓi, vhudavhidzani ha ṱhingo na logistics nga kha operation vulindlela, ri khou dzhena kha maitele a tshanduko u itela u khwinisa vhubveledzisi ha u lwa na vhutshinyi.

nbl: lapha-ke sibala nokwandisa amapholisa eentradeni kunye nokusungula iinqhema ezikhethekileko ezizakuqalana namacala athileko kwaphela.
ven: ri ḓo shumisa vhuṱaṱisani kha kushumele kwa senthara ya luṱingo u tikedza u shuma havhuḓi ha ḽaini ya thuso ya 10111, ri tshi khou shumisana na sekithara ya phuraivethe.

nbl: nyakenye sithembise ukuqatjha amapholisa amatjha ali-12 000. ukusukela lokho, angaphezulu kwee-10 000 amapholisa aqede ukuthwasela umsebenzi emakholeji wokufundela ubupholisa, kanti-ke amanye azii-10 000 azakufundiselwa umsebenzi nonyaka.
ven: hezwi ndi u itela u vhona uri musi vhathu vha tshi kwama mapholisa, ṱhingo dzavho dzia fhindulwa na u wana thuso ya zwine vha khou ṱoḓa.

nbl: iinqhema zamapholisa ezikhethekileko eziqalene nemilandu enjengeyokuthumba, ukwenzisa okuphambene nomthetho nokukatelela kunye nokumayina ngokungamthetho, sezibe nendima ebonakalako emsebenzini wazo ngokubopha amatjhumitjhumi wabasolwa abanengi babo abagcine balahlwe mlandu bayokudosa ejele.
ven: ri ḓo dovha ra shumisa ngona dzi tshimbidzwaho nga data nga nḓila yo bveledzeaho u itela u topola na u wana vhupo hune vhutshinyi ha iteesa hone.

nbl: kuthathwa amagadango aqinileko ukulwa nemilandu yokugiribeza umnotho neminye ekhambisana nalokho, yona eyenza umonakalo omkhulu emnothweni welizwe lekhethu.
ven: zwa ndemesa, hu ḓo vha na ndambedzo nnzhi ine ya ḓo vha hone kha mugaganyagwama hu tshi itelwa mapholisa, npa na yunithi yo khetheaho ya vhusedzulusi.

nbl: iinqhema zamapholisa wemisebenzi yomthangalasisekelo emvango, njenganje sezithomile ukusebenza eendaweni ezima-20 ezikhonjwe njengezidlangelwe bulelesi.
ven: vhutshinyi vhu itwaho kha vhafumakadzi na vhana vhu kha ḓi vha tshithithisi tshihulwanesa kha matshelo ashu sa lushaka.

nbl: nyakenye ngakhuluma ngomonakalo omkhulu obangwa kukwetjiwa kwemikhungo yekoporo nesimbi ehlelweni lethu lethungelelwano legezi, esiporweni nakomunye umthangalasisekelo womphakathi.
ven: mahola nga ḽara, ro fara samithi ya vhuphuresidennde kha gbvf hu u itela u ṱola mvelaphanḓa kha u shumiswa ha pulane ya maano ya lushaka, yo dzhiiwaho sa phindulo khulwane, i bveledzaho ya vhuthihi kha dwadze iḽi.

nbl: lokhu-ke kwenzelelwe ukudunga iinqhema zehlanganyela yezelelesi, bese kuvuleka ithuba lokubeka ihlelo elitjha lokurhwebelana.
ven: tshiṅwe tsha zwo swikelelwaho tshihulwanesa kha vhuḓidini hashu ha u lwa na gbv ndi nḓila ine vhafarani vha matshilisano vhashu vha ṱangana ngayo kha pulane ya maano ya lushaka.

nbl: njengoba sesithome ukuhlela ngobutjha umsebenzi neendaba zegezi, zamanzi, zethintwanoliqha kunye nezeentlabagelo ngejima le-operation vulindlela nje, sithoma ihlelo lokuhlela imisebenzi ngobutjha, ngomnqopho wokuwenza wenziwe ngcono umsebenzi wokulwa nobulelesi.
ven: ṅwaha wo fhelaho nga phando, ndo sainela zwipiḓa zwiraru zwa ndeme kha theo ya milayo zwi swikelaho tsireledzo khulwane kha vho ponyaho gbv na u vhona uri vhaiti vha milandu iyo vha sa tsha kona u shumisa tshaedzo dza mulayo uri vha ponye u fariwa.

nbl: sizakusebenzisa ubunjalo bethu beendleko ezingalilisiko emaziko ama-call centre ukusekela ukusebenza kuhle kwefowuni yesizo lemapholiseni i-10111, ngokusebenzisana nekoro yangeqadi.
ven: ri isa phanḓa na u khwinisa tswikelelo na u shumiswa ha khothe dza milandu ya vhudzekani na u engedza nethiweke ya senthara dza ndondolo dza thuthuzela.

nbl: lokhu-ke ngokokuqinisekisa ukuthi lokhuya abantu nabafowunela amapholisa, bayaphendulwa, nemiraro yabo erhabako amapholisa ayayitjheja.
ven: ubva tshe ra ḓivhadza vhuḓiimiseli hashu ha u livhisa 40% ya tshumelo na zwibveledzwa zwa tshitshavha kha mabindu a langwaho nga vhafumakadzi, ro kona u wana tikedza vhoramabindu vha vhafumakadzi.

nbl: sizakusebenzisa iindlela ezisebenza ngedatha ngezinye iindlela ezizasisiza ukuthola iindawo ezidlangelwe bulelesi bese siqothela zona.
ven: ro pfumbudza mabindu a langwaho nga vhafumakadzi a fhiraho 3 400 u vha dzudzanyela uri vha kone u dzhia zwikhala zwa tshumelo na zwibveledzwa.

nbl: okuqakathekileko-ke kukuthi kilesisabelo semali izokwandiswa imali ezakusetjenziselwa umsebenzi wobupholisa, newe-npa kunye newesiqhema sephenyo elikhethekileko (i-siu).
ven: nga kha buthano ḽa vhafumakadzi ḽa zwa ikonomi, ro vhona madzangano a nḓowetshumo na dzikhamphani zwi tshi ḓikumedzela kha magemo a tshandukiso ya nḓowetshumo ya mbeu nga vhuphara.

nbl: ubulelesi obenziwa ebantwini abasikazi nabantwana solo busese yinto ehlupha khulu epilweni yethu elizweni lokeli.
ven: koporasi ya mveledziso ya nḓowetshumo yo vhetshela thungo r9 biḽioni ya u bindudza kha mabindu a rangwaho phanḓa nga vhafumakadzi.

nbl: ngosinyikhaba nyakenye sibambe umhlangano weenkhulu wobengameli wesibili ngeze-gbvf lapho besilinganisa khona indima esele ikhanjiwe ekuphunyelelisweni kwehlelo lamaqhinga welizweloke, elithethe amagadango wokubumbana kwesitjhaba soke kuliwe nalomraro orhageleko.
ven: zwiṅwe zwiimiswa, hu tshi katelwa koporasi ya vhubindudzi ha tshitshavha, zwo ḓikumedzela u thoma zhendedzi ḽa ndivho yo khetheaho u itela u thusa mabindu a langwaho nga vhafumakadzi.

nbl: elinye lamaqha wepumelelo ekulu emzameni wethu wokulwa ne-gbv yindima abasebenzisani bethu bomphakathi ababumbene ngayo ehlelweni lamaqhinga welizwe.
ven: roṱhe ri tea u shela mulenzhe, sa vhathu, zwiimiswa na vharangaphanḓa u mona na tshitshavha, u itela u fhelisa vhutshinyi vhu itwaho kha vhafumakadzi na vhana.

nbl: ngotjhirhweni nyakenye ngitlikitle imithetho emithathu eqakathekileko evikela abantu abaphunyurhe ezenzweni ze-gbv eqinisekisa ukuthi izephulamthetho azisakghoni ukusebenzisa iintunja zomthetho ukuphunyurha emacaleni.
ven: ṅwaha wo fhelaho , ndo amba uri ri ḓo dzhia maga a tsheo a u lwa na tshanḓanguvhoni na u phuḓunya kha u thubiwa ha muvhuso.

nbl: siragela phambili ukwenza ukuthi abantu bakghone ngcono ukusebenzisa amakhotho wemilandu yezomseme nokusebenza kwawo, sibe sinabise nethungelelwano lokusebenza kwamaziko abizwa ngokuthi mathuthuzela care centre.
ven: khomishini ya u thubiwa ha muvhuso yo rangwaho phanḓa nga muhulwane wa vhulamukayi vho raymond zondo yo khunyeledza mushumo wayo ya ṋetshedza tshipiḓa tsha u fhedza tsha muvhigo wayo nga fulwi ṅwaha wo fhelaho .

nbl: iphuzu eliqakathekileko lehlelo lamaqhinga welizwe ngelokuhlonyiswa kwabantu abasikazi ngamandla.
ven: sa shango, ri koloda dzindivhuwo khulwane muhulwane wa vhulamukayi vho justice zondo, tshiṱafu tsha khomishini na havho vhoṱhe vho ḓisaho vhuṱanzi kha tshumelo ya tshitshavha yo kalulwaho.

nbl: solo simemezele umnqopho wethu wokutjheja ukuthengwa kwepahla yombuso ema-40% ubuncani bakhona emabhizinisini wabantu abasikazi, sifune ukwakha ubujamo obuvumela ukusekelwa kwabosomabhizinisi babantu abasikazi.
ven: themendelo dza khomishini dzi khou shumiwa u ya nga pulane ye nda ṋetshedza phalamenndeni nga tshimedzi ṅwaha wo fhelaho uri vhutepe ha sisṱeme ho topolwaho nga khomishini vhu tanduluwe na uri u thubiwa ha muvhuso hu sa tsha tendelwa u ri hu iteye naluthihi.

nbl: sithwasise amabhizinisi wabantu abasikazi angaphezulu kwee-3 400, sibalungiselela ukuthatha amathuba wokuthengwa kwepahla nofana kweensetjenziswa.
ven: khoro ya vhutsivhudzi ha lushaka i lwaho na tshanḓanguvhoni, ine ya vha na vhathu vha bvaho kha zwitshavha u mona na shango, i hone u itela u tsivhudza kha kushumele kwo teaho kwa u tupula zwiito zwa tshanḓanguvhoni, hu tshi katelwa vhuimiswa ha vhufhaṱi ha u lwa na tshanḓanguvhoni.

nbl: nge-women’s economic assembly sibone ukuhlangana kwamabubulo neenkhampani kuthembisa ukuphumelelisa inani eliqothelweko lamatjhuguluko wobulili emabhizinisini.
ven: ri khou shuma na u engedza yunithi ya tsireledzo ya ṱhanzi na uri ri ḓo thoma khwiṋisedzo kha mulayo wa u bvisela khagala hu na tsireledzo, 2000 (mulayo 26 wa 2000) na mulayo wa tsireledzo ya ṱhanzi, 1998 (mulayo 112 wa 1998) u khwaṱhisedza tsireledzo kha vha ḓisaho vhuṱanzi.

nbl: ihlangano ethuthukisa amabubulo iqothele ukusebenzisa imali emabhiliyoni alithoba wamaranda emabhizinisini aphethwe babantu abasikazi.
ven: mushumo u kati wa u khwinisa tswikelelo kha mbekanyamushumo ya tsiredzo ya ṱhanzi kha vhashumi vha muvhuso vhane vha ṱana zwiito zwo khakheaho, tshanḓanguvhoni na vhuḓifari hu si hone.

nbl: ezinye iinjamiso, ekubalwa hlangana nazo yihlangano yokutjalwa kweemali zombuso (i-pic) kunye nesikhwama selizweloke sokuhlomisa ngamandla nazo ezithembise iinkoloyi zemisebenzi ekhethekileko ekuzakusizwa ngazo amabhizinisi wabantu abasikazi.
ven: tshanḓa tsha vhusedzulusi tsha npa, tshe ra thoma nga 2019, tsho isa vhahumbulelwa vha 187 khothe kha milandu ya u thuba muvhuso ya 32. u swika zwino masheleni a linganaho r7 biḽioni o no humiselwa muvhusoni ubva kha milandu ya u thuba muvhuso.

nbl: soke kufuze silime indimethu, njengabantu ngamunye ngamunye, njengeenjamiso nabarholi emphakathini woke, siqede amacala wobulelesi lawa ebantwini abasikazi nabantwana.
ven: u swika zwino, ho omiswa ndaka na masheleni a lingano r12.9 biḽioni.

nbl: nyakenye ngithe ubukhohlakali sizobuthathela amagadango abonakalako, kubonakale kuhle ukuthi sihlukene nesikhathi sokuthunjwa kombuso.
ven: ṋaṅwaha, tshanḓa tsha vhusedzulusi tshi ḓo thomiwa sa tshiimiswa tsha tshoṱhe kha npa.

nbl: ikomitjhini yokuthunjwa kombuso eyayithwelwe lijaji elikhulu u-raymond zondo iqede umsebenzayo yabe yadlulisela kumengameli ingcenye yokugcina yombiko wayo ngomgwengweni nyakenye.
ven: maafrika tshipembe nga nṋe, uri ri swikelele mvelaphanḓa iṅwe na iṅwe kha u tandulula khaedu dza tshihaḓu, ri ṱoḓa muvhuso u konaho na u bveledzaho.

nbl: njengelizwe-ke, ijaji elikhulu uzondo, nabasebenzi bekomitjhini yakhe ebeyiphenya ngokuthunjwa kombuso, nabo boke abethule ubufakazi kumelee sibathokoze singaqedi ngomsebenzabo ongakavami, omuhle okubabazekako abawenzele ilizwe.
ven: vhutepe hashu vhuhulwanesa vhu kha mabindu a langwaho nga muvhuso na kha muvhuso wapo.

nbl: sewukhona umkhandlu obonisa ngemisebenzi yokulwa nobukhohlakali (i-national advisory anti-corruption council), amalunga wawo avela kiwo woke amakoro womphakathi.
ven: vhunzhi ha dzisoe dzashu dzi khou kundelwa nga zwikolodo zwihulwane, u sa bindudza kha themamveledziso, masiandaitwa a u thubwa ha muvhuso na u shayea ha zwikili.

nbl: lo-ke mkhandlu ozakulayela ngeendlela ezilungileko ezingasetjenziswa ukucitha ubukhohlakali, ekubalwa hlangana nalokho nokulungiswa komsebenzi woke wokucitha ubukhohlakali.
ven: ri ḓo shumisa themendelo dza khoro ya soe dza muphuresidennde u itela u thoma khamphani i langwaho nga muvhuso sa tshipiḓa tsha modele wa vhufaramukovhe ha vhukati dzine dza ḓo vhona uri hu na vhulangi vhu bveledzaho ha dzisoe.

nbl: sisebenzela ukuhlomisa ngamandla isiqhema sokuvikelwa kwabofakazi, kanti-ke malungana nalokhu sizokwethula amatjhuguluko emthethweni wee-200 wokuvikelwa kokuveza (umthetho 26 wee-2000) nomthetho we-1998 ovikela abofakazi (umthetho 112 we-1998) ukuqinisa ukuvikelwa kwabahlabimkhosi.
ven: nga thungo, ndo ṋea ndaela ya uri ofisi ya muphuresidende na ya gwama ḽa lushaka dzi shumisane kha u dzudzanya mihasho ya muvhuso, zwiimiswa na mbekanyamushumo kha miṅwaha miraru i ḓaho.

nbl: sewuthomile umsebenzi wokwenza ubulula bokutholakala kwehlelo lokuvikelwa kwabofakazi ebasebenzini bombuso abaveza ubukhohlakali neminye imisebenzi ephambuke endleleni, kunye nokuziphatha okuphambene nokulunga okwenziwa embusweni.
ven: muhasho wa zwa gwama ḽa lushaka u anganyela uri ri nga swikelela u vhulunga masheleni a lingaho r27 biḽioni kha themo ya vhukati arali ra nga shumana na ndaela dzo pfukelaho, mbekanyamushumo dza tsini dzi sa shumi lu bveledzaho na u khwaṱhisa zwiimiswa ho teaho.

nbl: sizakuqedelela umtlamo womthethomlingwa wokuthengwa kweensetjenziswa zembusweni ukulungisa itlhayelo evezwe yikomitjhini yephenyo ngokuthunjwa kombuso, nokwenza ubungcono bokusebenza, nokuphakanyiswa kwamazinga kunye nokusebenzela izinto emkhanyweni.
ven: vhunzhi ha mimasipala yashu, 163 kha ya 257, a i khou shuma zwavhuḓi nga ṅwambo wa tshaedzo ya vhuvhusi, u sa bveledza, tshiṅwe tshifhinga nga ṅwambo wa vhalanguli vha magalatshane na nḓisedzo ya tshumelo ya fhasi.

nbl: abathobelisimthetho bethu bazithathela amagadango aqinileko iinkhampani nabantu ngamunye ekuzwakala ukuthi babe nesandla ekuthunjweni kombuso.
ven: muvhuso u khou thoma vhudzhenelei ha tshivhalo ha u tandulula he muvhuso wapo wa kundelwa hone na u khwinisa nḓisedzo ya tshumelo.

nbl: ibandla lephenyo le-npa, engalivula ngomnyaka we-2019, selise ekhotho abasolwa abali-187 ngemilandu yokuthunjwa kombuso newobukhohlakali ama-32.
ven: hezwi zwi katela u engedza ndadzo ya vhuimeleli vha tshisthva navhaofisiri, u thogomela na u khwinisa themamveledziso yapo, na u dzikusa mannda a muvhuso wa hukati uri u dzheneleli hune masipala ya kundelwa u swikelela vhuḓifhinduleli hayo.

nbl: bekube nje, ingaphezulu kwamabhiliyoni alikhomba wamaranda imali esele ibuyiselwe embusweni malungana nemilandu yokuthunjwa kombuso.
ven: tshumelo ya tshitshavha ya phurofeshinaḽa, ine ya vha na vhashumi vha na zwikili, vho ḓikumedzelaho na u tevhedza mulayo, ndi ya ndeme kha muvhuso u bveledzaho na u fhelisa vhutshinyi na ndozwo.

nbl: bekube kunamhlanje, ili-r12.9 wamabhiliyoni imali nepahla ekghadzisiweko.
ven: kha u fhindula khomishini ya u thubiwa ha muvhuso na u tshimbilelana na muhanga wa uri tshumelo ya muvhuso i ṋetshedzwe nga vho gudaho, ndingo ya u fulufhedzea i ḓo vha ṱhoḓea ya khombekhombe musi hu tshi tholwa kha tshumelo ya muvhuso ha dovha ha ṅwaliwa na milingo.

nbl: masewula afrika wekhethu, ukwenza indima ekulungisweni kweentjhijilo ezirhabako esiqalene nazwezi, kufuze sibe nombuso onekghono nosebenzako.
ven: ri khou khwinisa theo ya mulayo na khwaṱhisedza mushumo wa khomishini ya tshumelo ya tshitshvha u vhona uri hu tholwe vho teaho kha maimo a ndangulo ya nṱha na u shuma ri tshi ya kha tshumelo ya muvhuso ya vhuthihi.

nbl: sizokuphumelelisa isiphakamiso somkhandlu wobengameli bama-soe kobanyana sizokusungula ikhamphani yombuso emlawuliinkhampani njengengcenye yehlelo lokwabelana elizakuqinisekisa ukweluswa nokulawulwa kwama-soe.
ven: miraḓo i ṱhonifheaho, vhunga ro ḓikumedzela kha u khwinisa zwikhala zwa vhanna na vhafumakadzi vha ḽino shango na u bveledza tswikelelo kha vhoṱhe, vhu dovha ha vha vhuḓikumedzeli hashu ha u swikelela afrika ḽa khwine na ḽifhasi ḽa khwine.

nbl: ngahlanye, ngilayele i-ofisi lobungameli neziko leemali lelizweloke ukuthi leziinjamiso zombili zisebenzisane ukulungisa iminyango karhulumende, neenjamiso kunye namahlelo karhulumende ngesikhathi esiminyaka emithathu ukusukela nje.
ven: ri khou vhilaedzwa zwihulu nga khuḓano dzine dza khou engedzea vhukati ha vhaisiraele na vhapalestina, na u ita khuwelelo ya u fhelisa khakhathi idzi vha dzhene kha maitele a u ḓisa mulalo.

nbl: ukubhalelwa kusebenza kuhle kombuso esigabeni saborhulumende beendawo abanengi solo kusese yinto esihlubayezako.
ven: afrika tshipembe ḽi livhisa ndiliso dzaḽo kha muvhuso na vhathu vha türkiye zwi tshi tevhela mudzinginyo we wa vha hone mathomoni a ino vhege.

nbl: banengi khulu abomasipala bethu, bali-163 kabama-257 abangasebenzi kuhle namkha abadosa emhlweni ngenca yokungaphathwa kuhle, nokungasebenzi kuhle, laphokhunye babhedlhwa bukhohlakali bokudliwa kweemali kunye nokungasebenzeli umphakathi kuhle.
ven: sa shago ri dihudza vhukuma nga vhuḓidini ha gift of the givers kha u thusa avho bvho kwameaho nga mudzzinginyo.

nbl: urhulumende uthatha amagadango ambadlwana ukulungisa lapho aborhulumende beendawo babhalelwa khona, enze nobungcono ekusetjenzelweni kwezakhamuzi ngokuthi ziphethelwe izenzelwa zombuso.
ven: ri kha ḓi vhilaedzwa vhukuma nga khuḓano ine ya khou ya phanḓa ngei russia-ukraine na u ṱuṱuwedza mahoro oṱhe uri a litshe u sa anḓana vha wane thandululo ya mulalo nga kha nyambedzano.

nbl: lapha-ke kubalwa nokukhutjhulwa kwamandla wabajameli bomphakathi neemphathimandla zakhona, ukulungiswa komthangalasisekelo wendawo, nokusetjenziswa kwamandla karhulumende welizwe loke lapho abomasipala babhalelwa khona kukwenza umsebenzabo.
ven: mashudu a afrika tshipembe o ṱumana na a dzhango ḽashu, na tshitshavha tsha mveledziso ya tshipembe ha afrika nga vhuphara.

nbl: ikoro yembusweni esebenza ngokuzibophelela, enabasebenzi abanamakghonofundwa, enabantu abazibopheleleko nabanemikghwa emihle yokusebenza, iqakathekile embusweni osebenza kuhle nencamele ukuqeda ubukhohlakali, nokuqeda umukghwa wokudlala ngemithombo yamandla kunye nekhuthaza isekelo lokusiza ngobuhle.
ven: u itela vhudziki na u bvelela hashu, ri tou kombetshedzea u isa phanḓa na vhudzheneleli vhu ne ha nga ḓisa mulalo, vhudziki na mvelaphanḓa kha dzhango ḽashu.

nbl: sitjhugulula umthetho, siqinisa nendima yekomitjhini yezabasebenzi bembusweni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abaqatjhelwa iinkhundla zokuphatha eziphezulu ngabakufaneleko lokho, sisebenzela godu nokuthi sakhe ikoro yembusweni yinye, elungelelene kuhle ngokuzwana.
ven: ri ḓo isa phanḓa na u engedza zwikhala zwa mbambadzo na vhubindudzi na vhafarani vhashu vha mbambadzo ya ḽifhasi ra sedza kha u kunga vhuvhambadzi na u lambedza afrika tshipembe kha vhudzheneleli hashu kha foramu dza tshivhalo sa g20, ine ya ḓo farwa nga riṋe nga 2025. ṋaṅwaha afrika tshipembe ḽo dzhia vhurangaphanḓa ha britain, russia, india, china na mashango a tshigwada tsha afrika tshipembe.

nbl: malunga ahloniphekileko, njengoba sizibophelele ekwenzeni ukuthi abantu bekhethu baphile ngcono besithuthukise nomnotho wabo boke, sizimisele kangako nangokwakha i-afrika engcono nephasi elingcono.
ven: ri ḓo sedzesa kha u ṱanganelana ha mveledziso i yaho phanḓa, tshandukiso ya fulufulu zwaḽo, nḓowetshumo na u shumiswa ha african continental free trade area.

nbl: siphatheke kumbi khulu ngesiga samhlapha sokutjhuba kobudlelwana hlangana kwama-israyeli namapalestina, nje sikhombela ukuthi kuphele ubutha, kubuyelwe ehlelweni lokuthula eliriyadiswa kuliyeka hlangana nalesisitjhaba.
ven: afrika tshipembe, khathihi na mashango a vhadzulatsini kha southern african customs union, a ḓo khunyeledza ṋetshedzeo yashu ya nḓowetshumo kha african continental free trade area.

nbl: isewula afrika imlilela imbiko urhulumende we-türkiye ngehlekelele emveleleko yokuzamazama komhlaba emalangeni kiyo iveke le.
ven: ya vhuya ya thoma u shumiswa, mbambadzo ya mahala ya dzhango i ḓo ṋetshedza tshikhala tshi sa vhambedzwi u itela u khwaṱhisa ṱhanganelo ya ikonomi ya afrika, u alusa dziikonomi dza lushaka, na u vula mikaṋo miswa na mimaraga ya khamphani dza afrika tshipembe.

nbl: njengelizwe, siyazikhakhazisa ngemizamo yehlangano i-gift of the givers ngokusiza abazanyazanyelwe mhlaba khona e-türkiye.
ven: maafrika tshipembe nga nṋe, mvumbo ya vhukuma ya lushaka i dzumbuluwa nga tshifhinga tsha thaidzo.

nbl: solo sisezwa ubuhlungu ngepi ephikeleleko ye-russia ne-ukraine, begodu sikhuthaza boke abathinteka kilepi ukuthi babeke iinkhali phasi, bafunisane isisombululo ngokukhulumisana.
ven: shango ḽi ṱaluswa nga nḓila ine vhathu vhaḽo vha swikelela vhudzivha ha vhukonḓi haḽo – vha nga shumisana kha u livhana na khaedu vha tshithu tshihihi, vho ṱanganywa nga ndivho nthihi, kana vha tenda u kundwa nga thaidzo dze vha livhana nadzo.

nbl: umnotho wesewula afrika ulungelelene nowamazwe asekhonthinenthini ye-afrika le, khulukhulu ihlangano yokuthuthukisa imiphakathi yamazwe ase-afrika esesewula (i-sadc).
ven: ri shango ḽo ḓalaho dzikhaedu dza zwino, fhedzi ri dovha ra vha shango ḽine ḽa khou lwela u khunyeledza pfuluphedziso dza vhumatshelo hashu.

nbl: ngoba sincamele ukunzinza netuthuko, sibotjhwa msebenzi ukulandelela amagadango azakuletha ukuthula, ubunzinzo netuthuko ekhonthinenthini yekhethu.
ven: musi ri tshi dzhia maga ashu a u thoma kha nḓila ya u ya kha demokirasi, ro vha na bono ḽi re khagala kha uri nḓila iyo i nga ri isa gai.

nbl: nonyaka lidlhego lesewula afrika lokuba ngusihlalo wehlanganisela yamazwe i-brazil, ne-russia, ne-indiya, ne-china kunye nesewula afrika (i-brics).
ven: ro vhona shango ḽine ri nga tshilisana roṱhe nga mulalo, hune ra nga shumisana kha u fhaṱa vhuthihi na vhumatshelo ha vhukovhelano.

nbl: isewula afrika, namazwe abomakhelwana bethu ehlanganweni i-southern african customs union, khona duze izokuqedelela isebenziswano lethu lezamabubulo ku-af cfta.
ven: maga a vhuitwa e ra a sumbedzisa madekwana ano, a tshi khou engedza kha mushumo une ro no u thoma, a ḓo ri sendedza tsini na heḽi bono.

nbl: ingathoma ukusebenza ngokupheleleko, i-af cfta izokuvula ithuba elingakhange libe khona phambilini lokunabisa nokuqinisa ukulungelelana komnotho we-afrika, nokuhlunyiswa kweminotho yamazwe, kuvuleke namathuba nemakethe etja eenkhampanini zesewula afrika.
ven: a ḓo ri konisa uri ri bve kha thaidzo iḽi sa shango ḽo shandukiswaho, arali ra shumisana ri na ndivho.

nbl: masewula afrika wekhethu, ubunjalo bamambala besitjhaba buvela lokhuya isitjhabeso nasisebudisini.
ven: ri ḓo bva kha thaidzo iḽi ri na sisṱeme ya muḓagasi i bveledzaho, i fulufheleaho nahone i na vhuṱatisani.

nbl: isitjhaba sihlathululwa ngokuthi abantu baso bajamelana njani nemiraro ebudisi khulu – nanyana bayasebenzisana baqalane neentjhijilo zabo ngokuhlanganyela bayinyanda yinye, bahlanganiswe mnqopho munye ofanako, namkha bayanyefa bazinikele emrarweni loyo abaqalene nawo.
ven: ri ḓo takuwa na dzingalavha, zwiporo zwa nṱhesa u mona na ḽifhasi, na tswikelelo ya burodibennde kha maafrika tshipembe kha zwipiḓa zwinzhi zwa shango, na ṋetshedzo ya maḓi iyaho phanḓa.

nbl: sisitjhaba esibhudungelwe ziintjhijilo zanje, kodwana sinjalo nje godu sisitjhaba esisiphalazela ukugcina isithembiso sengomuso lethu.
ven: ri ḓo ṱanganedza vhaendelamashango vhanzhi kha shango ḽashu, ra bveledza na u kunga zwikili zwi ṱoḓiwaho nga ikonomi yashu.

nbl: sasibona ilizwe lapho umnotho wemithombo yethu yamandla wawuzakujabulelwa khona mumuntu woke.
ven: ri ḓo sikela mushumo avho vha si na, ra ṋea fulufhelo avho vhane ndi kale vho lindela.

nbl: sasibona ilizwe lapho sasizokuphilisana khona ngokuthula, lapho sasizakusebenza khona ndawonye ukwakha indlela efanako esaziwa ngayo kunye nengomuso esilihlanganyeleko.
ven: tshivhalo tshinzhi tsha mapholisa zwiṱaratani, na foramu ya tshipholisa tsha tshitshavha dzine dza khou shuma na manḓalanga a vhutshutshisi ho ḓiimisaho, vhathu vhashu vha ḓo kona u fulufhela tsireledzo i bvaho kha muvhuso.

nbl: isitjhaba sekhethu sakhelwe phezu komthethosisekelo ofakazela amagugu wentando yenengi ngesithunzi, ngokulingana nangekululeko, nangamalungelo womunye nomunye wethu.
ven: nga u lwa na u ṱhaselwa ha muvhuso na vhutshinyi ho dzudzanywaho, themamveledziso yashu i ḓo ṋana u tsireledzea na mabindu a ḓo kona u shuma o vhofholowa.

nbl: amagadango esiwethule sabe sawahlathulula kilentambama, ngokwakhelela phezu komsebenzi esele siwenzile, azasitjhideza eduze naleyo nembombono.
ven: nga kha sisṱeme ya tsireledzo ya matshilisano yo khwaṱhiswaho na yo engedzwaho, vhathu vha si vhanzhi vha ḓo tshila vha tshi shaya na miṱa isi minzhi i ḓo tshenzhema nḓala.

nbl: amagadango lawo azasenza sikghone ukusebenzisana ngehloso esiyinqophileko, siphumele ngale komraro lo njengesitjhaba nelizwe elihlelwe ngobutjha.
ven: ri tea u ita hezwi zwothe, hu si u tela u kunda khaedu dzire hone zwino, fhedzi u itela u vhuyedzedza mulanga wa afrika tshipembe.

nbl: sizakuphumela ngale kwalomraro sesinehlelo legezi elisebenza kuhle, elithembekako, nelingalilisiko ngemali.
ven: ṋaṅwaha, ndi ṅwaha wa vhufumi ubva tshe ra onesana na vho nelson mandela, muphuresidennde wa u thoma wa demokirasi afrika tshipembe, mufunwa nga riṋe vho madiba.
